analyzed: ka ādayaḥ pañca pañcakāḥ vagga nāma honti tena kvatthaḥ vagge vagga antaḥ iccādi
bindu niggahītam

original: Yvāyaṃ vaṇṇo bindumatto, so niggahītasañño hoti. Tena kvattho? “Niggahītaṃ” 1,38 icādi. Garusaññākaraṇaṃ anvatthasaññatthaṃ.
analyzed: yvā ayam vaṇṇaḥ bindu matto saḥ niggahīta saññaḥ hoti tena kvatthaḥ niggahītam i c ādi garu saññā karaṇam anvattha saññattham
iyu vaṇṇāḥ jha lāḥ nāmassante

original: Nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ, tassaante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṃ. Tena kvattho? “Jhalā vā” 2,111 iccādi.
analyzed: nāmam pāṭipadikam tassa ante vattamānāḥ jha l a saññāḥ honti yathākkamam tena ku atthaḥ jha lāḥ vā iccādi
pitthiyam

original: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa-nte vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā pasaññā honti. Tena kvattho? Ye passivaṇṇassa” 2,116 iccādi.
analyzed: itthiyam vattamānassa vattamānāḥ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāḥ pasaññāḥ honti tena kvatthaḥ ye iccādi
ghā

original: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa-nte vatthamāno ākāro ghasañño hoti. Tena kvattho? “Ghabrahmādite” 2,60 iccādi.
analyzed: itthiyam vattamānassa nāma ssa ante vatthamānaḥ ākāraḥ gha saññaḥ hoti tena kvatthaḥ gha brahma ādite iccādi
goḥ syā ā lapane
ālapane si ga saññaḥ hoti
tena kvatthaḥ gevā i ccādi
saññā
vidhip bisesana antassa

original: Yaṃ visesanaṃ, tadantassa vidhi ñātabbo “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe” 2,41 narānare.
analyzed: yam visesanam tad antassa vidhi ñātabbaḥ atas ya ūnam ṭa āṭe nara anare
sattamiyam pubbassa

original: Sattamīniddese pubbasseva kāriyaṃ ñātabbaṃ “saro lopo sare” 1,26 veḷaggaṃ. ‘Tamaha’ntīdha kasmā na hoti?, Saretopasilesikādhāro tatthetāva vuccate ‘pubbasseva hoti na parassā’ti.
analyzed: sattamī niddese pubbassa iva kāriyam ñātabbam saraḥ lopaḥ sare veḷaggam tam ahanti idha kasmā na hoti tattha iti ava vuccate pubbassa iva hoti na parassa ati
pañcamiyam parassa

original: Pañcamīniddese parassa kāriyaṃ ñātabbaṃ “atoyonaṃ ṭāṭe” 2,41 narānare. Idha na hotaṃ ‘jantuho anattā’. Idha kasmā na hoti? Osakhyo, anantare katatthatāya na byavahitassa kāriyaṃ.
analyzed: pañcamī niddese parassa kāriyam ñātabbam a taḥ yaḥ ūnam ṭāṭe nara anare idha na hotam jantu haḥ anattā idha kasmā na hoti anantare katatthatāya na byavahitassa kāriyam
ādissa

original: Parassa ssissamānaṃ kāriyamādivaṇṇassa ñātabbaṃ “ra saṅkhyāto vā” 3,103 terasa.
analyzed: parassa ssissamānam kāriyam ādi vaṇṇassa ñātabbam ra saṅkhyātaḥ vā terasa
chaṭṭhiyantassa

original: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ, tadantassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyaṃ “rājassi nāmhi” 2,23 rājinā.
analyzed: chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa yam kāriyam tad antassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyam rājassi nāmhi rājinā
ṅānubandhaḥ

original: Ṅakāro anubandho yassa, so antassa hoti “gossā vaṅa” 1,32 gavāssaṃ.
analyzed: ṅakāraḥ anubandhaḥ yassa saḥ antassa hoti gossā gavāssam
ṭa anubandhā aneka vaṇṇā sabbassa

original: Ṭakāro-nubandho yassa, so-nekakkharo cādeso sabbassa hoti “imassānitthiyaṃ ṭe” 2,128 esu, “nāmha-nimi” 2,126 anena.
analyzed: ṭakāraḥ anubandhaḥ yassa saḥ neka kkharaḥ ca ādesaḥ sabbassa hoti imassa anitthiyam ṭe esu anena
ñaka anubandha ādi antā

original: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa ñānubandhakānubandhā ādyantā honti “brūto tissīña” 6,36 bravīti, “bhūssa vuka” 6,17 babhūva.
analyzed: chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa ña anubandhaka anubandhāḥ ādi antāḥ honti brūto bravīti bhūssa babhūva
mā anubandho paraḥ

original: Makāro-nubandho yassa, so sarā namantā sarā paro hoti “mañca rudhādīnaṃ” 5-19 rundhati.
analyzed: makāraḥ anubandhaḥ yassa saḥ sarā namantā sarā paras hoti rudhā ādīnam rundhati
vippaṭisedhe

original: Dvinnaṃ sāvakāsānamekatthappasaṅge paro hoti. Yathā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vāpurisānaṃ sahappattiyaṃ
analyzed: dvinnam sa avakāsānam ekattha ppasaṅge paras hoti yathā dvinnam tiṇṇam vāpurisānam sahappattiyam

original: paro, so ca (gacchati) tvaṃ ca (gacchasi, tumhe) gacchatha. So ca (gacchati,) tvaṃ
analyzed: paras saḥ ca gacchati tvam ca gacchasi tumhe gacchatha saḥ ca gacchati tvam
ca gacchasi aham ca gacchāmi mayam gacchāma
saṅketaḥ ūna avayavaḥ nubandho
yaḥ nava yava bhūtaḥ u saṅketaḥ saḥ nubandho ti ñātabbaḥ lupita ādīnam āsimhi kattā

original: Saṅketaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Pakatiyādisamudāyassānubandhatā mā hotūti, anavayavohi samudāyo… samudāyarūpattāyeva.
analyzed: saṅketa ggahaṇam kim pakatiya ādi samudāyassa anubandha tā mā hotu iti anavayavaḥ hi samudāyaḥ samudāya rūpattāya iva

original: Anavayavaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? “Atena” 2-108 janena. Imināva lopassāvagatattā nānubandhalopāya vacanamāraddhaṃ.
analyzed: an avayava ggahaṇam kim atena janena na anubandha lopāya vacanam āraddham
vaṇṇa parena sa vaṇṇaḥ api

original: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā tena savaṇṇopi gayhati saṃca rūpaṃ “yuvaṇṇānameo luttā” 1-29 vākeritaṃ, samonā.
analyzed: vaṇṇa saddo paraḥ yasmā tena savaṇṇaḥ api saṃ ca rūpam vāka īritam sama ūnā

original: Vantvādisambandhīyevantu gayhati, “ntantūnaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame” 2-215 guṇavanto.
analyzed: vantu ādi sambandhīya ivantu paṭhame guṇavantaḥ
vantu ādi sambandhi iti kim jantū tantū
paribhāsāyo
saraḥ lopaḥ sare

original: Sare saro lopanīyo hoti. Tatri-me, saddhi-ndriyaṃ, nohe-taṃ, bhikkhuno-vādo, sametā-yasmā, abhibhā-yatanaṃ, puttāma-tthi, asante-ttha.
analyzed: sare saraḥ lopanīyaḥ hoti tatra ime saddhi indriyam bhikkhunā uvādaḥ sameta ayasmai abhibhāyatanam asantā ittha
paraḥ kvaci

original: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti. So-pi, sāva, yato-dakaṃ, tato-va. Kvacītikiṃ? Saddhi-ndriyaṃ, ayamadhikāro āparicchedāvasānā, tena nātippasaṅgo.
analyzed: paraḥ saraḥ kvaci lopanīyaḥ hoti saḥ api yatas udakam kvaci iti kim saddhindriyam ayam adhikāraḥ tena na ati pasaṅgo
na dvā iva

original: Pubbaparasarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante, latā iva, late-va, latā-va.
analyzed: dve api vā kvaci na lupyante latāḥ iva latā iva latā ava
yuvan ṇā nameḥ luttā

original: Luttā sarā paresaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ eo honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: luttā sarā paresam honti vā yathākkamam

original: Tasse-daṃ, vāte-ritaṃ, no-peti, vāmo-rū, ate-vaññehi, vo-dakaṃ. Kathaṃ “paccorasmi”nti? Yogavibhāgā. Vātveva? Tassidaṃ.
analyzed: tassa idam vāta īritam na upeti vāma ūrū vā udakam katham pacca urasmin ti yogavibhāgāḥ tassa idam
luttā iti kim latāḥ iva
yavā sare

original: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Byākato, iccassa, ajjhiṇamutto, svāgataṃ, svāpanalānilaṃ, vātveva? Iti-ssa. Kvacitveva? Yānī-dha, sū-paṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: sare pare yakāra vakārāḥ honti vā yathākkamam iccassa svāgatam svāpa nala anilam vā tvā iva iti ssa su upaṭṭhitam
e ū nam

original: Eonaṃyavāyonti vā sare yathākkamaṃ. Tyajja te-jja, svāhaṃ so-haṃ. Kvacitveva? Puttāma-tthi, asante-ttha.
analyzed: vā sare yathākkamam tyajja svāham soham
gossāvaṅa

original: Sare gossa avaṅa hoti. Gavā-ssaṃ. ‘Yatharīva, tatharive’ti nipātāva, ‘bhusāmive’ti ivasaddo evattho.
analyzed: sare gossa hoti gavāssam yathari iva tathari iva iti nipāta ava bhusām iva iti iva saddaḥ eva atthaḥ
byañjane dīgha ras sā

original: Rassadīghānaṃ kvaci dīgharassā honti byañjane. Tatrā-yaṃ, munīcare, sammadeva, mālabhārī.
analyzed: rassa dīghānam kvaci dīgha rassāḥ honti byañjane tatra ayam munīcare sammadā iva mālabhārī
saramhā dve

original: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti. Paggaho. Saramhāti kiṃ? Taṃ khaṇaṃ.
analyzed: saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti paggahaḥ saramhā iti kim tam khaṇam
tatiya paṭhamā

original: Catutthadutiyesu paresvesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiya paṭhamā honti. Paccāsatthyā,
analyzed: catuttha dutiyesu paresu esam catuttha dutiyānam tad bagge paṭhamāḥ honti

original: nigghoso, akkhanti, bojjhaṅgā, setacchattaṃ, daḍḍho, niṭṭhānaṃ, mahaddhano, yasatthero,
analyzed: nigghosaḥ akkhanti bojjhaṅgā setacchattam daḍḍhaḥ niṭṭhānam mahat dhanaḥ yasa thero

original: apphuṭaṃ, abbhuggato. Esvīti kiṃ? Thero. Esanti kiṃ? Pattho.
analyzed: apphuṭam abbhuggataḥ kim theraḥ
vi tis seve vā

original: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Itveva, icceva. Eveti kiṃ? Iccāha.
analyzed: eva sadde pare itissa vaḥ hoti vā itu eva icca iva eva iti kim icca āha
e o nama vaṇṇe

original: Eonaṃ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā. Disvā yācaka māgate, akaramhasa te, esa attho, esa dhammo,
analyzed: vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā disvā yācaka mā āgate akaramhasa te esa atthaḥ esa dhammo

original: aggamakkhāyati, svātanaṃ, hiyyattanaṃ, karassu. Vātveva? Yācake āgate eso dhammo. Vaṇṇeti kiṃ? So.
analyzed: aggam akkhāyati svātanam hiyyattanam karassu vātvā iva yācake āgate esaḥ dhammo vaṇṇeti kim so
niggahītam

original: Niggahītamāgamo hoti vā kvaci. Cakkhuṃ udapādi cakkhuudapādi, purimaṃ jātiṃ purimajātiṃ,
analyzed: niggahītam āgamaḥ hoti vā kvaci cakkhum udapādi cakkhu udapādi purimam jātim purima jātim

original: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ. Avaṃsirotiādīsu niccaṃ… vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa,
analyzed: kattabbam kusalam bahum avaṃsiraḥ iti ādīsu niccam vavatthita vibhāsa ttā vā adhikārassa

original: sāmattiyenāgamova, sa ca rassa sarasseva hoti… tassa rassānugatattā.
analyzed: sāmattiyena āgamaḥ uva sa ca rassa sa rassā iva hoti tassa
lopaḥ

original: Niggahītassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Kyāhaṃ kimahaṃsāratto saṃratto. Salle kho-gantukāmo gantumanoti, ādīsu niccaṃ.
analyzed: niggahītassa lopaḥ hoti vā kvaci kyā aham kim aham sāratto saṃratto ādīsu niccam
para sarassa

original: Niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Tvaṃ-si tvamasi.
analyzed: niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopaḥ hoti vā kvaci tvam si tvam asi
vagge vagga antaḥ

original: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hoti paccāsattyā. Taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, tañcarati
analyzed: niggahītassa kho vagge vagga antaḥ vā hoti paccāsattyā tam karoti tam karoti tam carati

original: taṃ carati, taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tampāti taṃ pāti. Niccaṃ
analyzed: tam carati tat ṭhānam tat ṭhānam tat dhanam tam dhanam tam pāti tam pāti niccam
pada majjhe gantvā santiṭṭhati
ye va hi su ñaḥ

original: Ya eva hi saddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti. Yaññadeva, taññeva, tañhi, vātveva? Yaṃ yadeva.
analyzed: yaḥ eva hi saddesu niggahītassa vā ñaḥ hoti yaṃ yad eva
ye saṃssa

original: Saṃsaddassa yaṃ niggahītaṃ tassa vā ño hoti yakāre. Saññamo saṃyamo.
analyzed: saṃsaddassa yam niggahītam tassa vā ñaḥ hoti yakāre saññamaḥ saṃyamaḥ
mayadā sare

original: Niggahītassa mayadā honti vā sare kvaci. Tamahaṃ, tayidaṃ, tadalaṃ. Vā tveva? Taṃ ahaṃ.
analyzed: niggahītassa maya dāḥ honti vā sare kvacid tam aham tayidam tat alam vā tu eva tam aham
vanataragā ca āgamā

original: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti sare vā kvaci. Tivaṅgikaṃ, ito nāyati, cinitvā, tasmātiha,
analyzed: ete mayadā ca āgamāḥ honti sare vā kvacid tivaṅgikam itas na āyati cinitvā tasmāt atiha

original: nirojaṃ, puthageva, idhamāhu, yathayidaṃ, attadatthaṃ. Vā tveva? Attatthaṃ. ‘Atippago
analyzed: nirojam puthak eva attadattham vā tu eva attattham atippago
kho tāva ati paṭhama antaḥ paga saddo va
chā ḷo

original: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā. Chaḷaṅgaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ. Vātveva? Chaabhiññā.
analyzed: cha saddā parassa sarassa ḷakāraḥ āgamaḥ hoti vā chaṭ aṅgam chaṭ āyatanam cha abhiññā
tad ami nādīni

original: Tadaminādīni sādhūni bhavanti. Taṃ iminā tadaminā, sakiṃ āgāmī sakadāgāmī, ekaṃ idha
analyzed: tadaminā ādīni sādhūni bhavanti tam iminā tadaminā āgāmī sakadāgāmī ekam

original: ahaṃ ekamidāhaṃ, saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidāvahāro, vārino vāhako valāhako, jīvanassa
analyzed: aham ekam ida aham saṃvidhāya avahāraḥ saṃvidāvahāraḥ vārinaḥ vāhakaḥ valāhakaḥ jīvanassa

original: mūto jīmūto, chavassa sayanaṃ susānaṃ, uddhaṃ khamassa udukkhalaṃ, pisitāso pisāco,
analyzed: mūtaḥ jīmūtaḥ chavassa sayanam su sānam uddham khamassa udukkhalam pisitāsaḥ pisācaḥ

original: mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro, evamaññepi payogato-nugantabbā, paresaṃ pisodarādimivedaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: mahiyam ravati iti mayūraḥ evam aññe pi payogataḥ nugantabbā paresam daṭṭhabbam
ta vagga vara ṇānam ye ca vagga bayañā

original: Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ kvaci cavaggabayañā honti yathākkamaṃ yakāre. Apuccaṇḍatāya, tacchaṃ, yajjevaṃ, ajjhattaṃ, thaññaṃ, dibbaṃ, payyosanā, pokkharañño. Kvacitveva? Rattyā
analyzed: ta vagga varaṇānam kvaci ca vagga bayañāḥ honti yathākkamam yakāre a puccaṇḍa tāya taccham yat jevam ajjhattam thaññam dibbam payyosanā pokkharañño kvaci tvā eva rattyā
vagga lasehi te

original: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti.
analyzed: vagga lasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vagga lasāḥ honti

original: Sakkate, paccate, aṭṭate, kuppate, phallate, assate. Kvacitveva? Kyāhaṃ.
analyzed: sakkate paccate aṭṭate kuppate phallate assate kvaci tu eva kyā aham
hassa vipallāsaḥ
vipallāsaḥ hoti yakāre guyham
ve vā

original: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho bavhābādho.
analyzed: hassa vipallāsaḥ hoti vā vakāre bavhābādhaḥ bavhābādhaḥ
ṭa ṭha ṇa lā

original: Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā honti vā. Dukkaṭaṃ, aṭṭhakathā, gahaṇaṃ, paligho, palāyati. Vātveva? Dukkataṃ. Kvacitveva? Sugato.
analyzed: honti vā dukkaṭam aṭṭha kathā gahaṇam palighaḥ palāyati vā tu eva dukkatam kvaci tu eva sugataḥ
saṃyoga ādi lopaḥ

original: Saṃyogassa yo ādībhūto-vayavo tassa vā kvaci lopo hoti. Pupphaṃ-sā jāyate-gini.
analyzed: saṃyogassa yaḥ ādībhūta uvayavo tassa vā kvaci lopaḥ hoti pupphaṃsā
vicchā bhikkhaññesu dve

original: Vicchāyamābhikkhaññe ca yaṃ vattate, tassa dve rūpāni honti. Kriyāya guṇena dabbena
analyzed: ca yam vattate tassa dve rūpāni honti kriyāya guṇena dabbena

original: vā bhinne atthe byāpitumicchā vicchā. Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ siñcati, gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo,
analyzed: vā bhinne atthe byāpitum icchā vicchā rukkham rukkham siñcati gāmaḥ gāmaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ

original: gāme gāme pānīyaṃ, gehe gehe issaro, rasaṃ rasaṃ bhakkhayati, kiriyaṃ kiriyamārabhate.
analyzed: gāme gāme pānīyam gehe gehe issaraḥ rasam rasam bhakkhayati kiriyam kiriyam ārabhate

original: Atthiyevā-nupubbiyepi vicchā mūle mūle thūlā, agge agge sukhumā, yadi hi ettha mūlaggabhedo
analyzed: vicchā mūle mūle thūlā agge agge sukhumā yadi hi ettha mūla agga bhedaḥ

original: na siyā, ānupubbiyampi na bhaveyya. Māsakaṃ māsakaṃ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavanthānaṃ
analyzed: na siyā ānupubbiyam pi na bhaveyya māsakam māsakam imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavanthānam

original: dvinnaṃ dehīti māsakaṃ māsakamiccetasmā vicchāgamyate, saddantarato pana imamhā kahāpaṇāti
analyzed: dvinnam dehi iti māsakam māsakam icca itasmai vicchā gamyate pana imamhā

original: avadhāraṇaṃ. Pubbaṃ pubbaṃ pupphanti, paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ paccantītyatrāpi vicchāva.
analyzed: avadhāraṇam pubbam pubbam pupphanti paṭhamam paṭhamam paccanti iti atra api vicchāva

original: Ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esaṃ dvinnamaḍḍhatā, sabbe ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesaṃ
analyzed: ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esam dvinnam aḍḍha tā sabbe ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesam

original: aḍḍhutā ihāpi vicchāva. Ābhikkhaññaṃ ponopuññaṃ pacati pacati, papacati papacati,
analyzed: iha api vicchāvaḥ ābhikkhaññam ponopuññam pacati pacati papacati papacati

original: lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ lunāti, bhutvā bhutvā gacchati, paṭapaṭā karoti, paṭapaṭāyati.
analyzed: lunāhi lunāhi tvā iva ayam lunāti bhutvā bhutvā gacchati paṭapaṭā karoti paṭapaṭāyati
sya ādi lopaḥ pubbassa ikassa

original: Vicchāyamekassa dvitte pubbassa syādilopo hoti. Ekekassa. Kathaṃ matthakamatthakenāti? ‘Syādilopo pubbassā’ti yogavibhāgā, nācātippasaṅgo yogavibhāgā iṭṭhappasiddhīti.

original: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā. Puttena saha gato, puttena saddhiṃ āgato, tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati.

original: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā siyā. Tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhī, akkhinā kāṇo, tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.

original: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho jaḷattena vā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvatoaniccā, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho.

analyzed: tulya tthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā tulyaḥ pitu tulyaḥ pitarā sadisaḥ pitu sadisaḥ

a taḥ ya ūnam ṭa ā ṭe

original: Akāranthato nāmasmā yonaṃ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṃ, ṭakārā sabbadesatthā, buddhā buddhe, atoti kiṃ? Kaññāyo, itthiyo, vadhuyo, idha kasmā na bhavati aggayo. Avidhānasāmatthiyā.
analyzed: nāmasmā yonam ṭā ṭe honti yathākkamam ṭakārā sabba desa atthāḥ buddhāḥ buddhe kasmā na bhavati a vidhāna sāmatthiyā
ninam vā

original: Akārantato nāmasmā ninaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni, atotveva aṭṭhīni.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamam rūpā rūpe rūpāni
sma asmiṃnam

original: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Buddhā buddhasmā, buddhe buddhasmiṃ, atotveva aggismā aggismiṃ.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamam buddhā buddhe buddhasmin aggismin

analyzed: akāra antataḥ parassa sassa catutthiyā āyaḥ hoti vā buddhāya buddhassa bhiyyaḥ

original: dissate, kvacidevaññattha, atotveva isissa, catutthiyāti kiṃ? Buddhassa mukhaṃ, attatthanti
analyzed: dissate isissa catutthiyā ati kim buddhassa mukham attatthanti
attha saddena samāsaḥ

analyzed: sabba āditaḥ pi sma asmiṃsānam ṭāṭeāyāḥ hontā iva nirutti kāra anumata ttā buddha vacane sandassanavataḥ

analyzed: ca tatra udam udāharaṇam ca ubhayā mante

original: Ghapato nādīnamekasmiṃ yayā honi yathākkamaṃ. Kaññāya, rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā, ekasminti kiṃ? Kaññāhi, rattīhi.

vā

original: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṃssā vā hoti, tassā kataṃ, tassā dīyate, tassā
analyzed: gha pa saññehi na ādīnam ekasmin sā vā hoti tassā katam tassā dīyate tassā

nam mhi nu ka dva ādīnam sattara san nam

analyzed: dvi ādīnam sattarasannam saṅkhyānam hoti namhi vibhattamhi dvinnam catunnam

analyzed: evam yāva aṭṭhārasannam ukāraḥ uccāraṇa attho kakāraḥ anta avayava attho tena naṃ mhi na dīghaḥ

original: Naṃmhi bahuno katissa ca nuka hoti, bahunnaṃ, katinnaṃ.
analyzed: namhi bahunaḥ katissa ca nuka hoti bahunnam katinnam
ṇ ṇ ṇ ṇ naṃ t itaḥ jhā

suña sassa

ssa ssa ssa āye su itare kañña ibhi mānami

analyzed: tassāḥ vai i hoti tissam tassam tissā tassā tissāya tassāya tāya
teti mā taḥ sassa ssāya

original: Tāetāimāto sassa ssāyo hoti vā. Tassāya tāya, etissāya etāya, imissāya imāya.
analyzed: sassa ssāyaḥ hoti vā tassāya tāya etissāya etāya imissāya imāya

original: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca ā hoti simhi. Kattā, pitā. Pitu, mātu, bhāvu, mītu, duhitu, jāmātu, nattu, hotu, potu.

ayunam vā dīghaḥ

original: A i u iccesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge. Bho purisā, bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi, bho bhikkhū, bho bhikkhū.
analyzed: a i u iti ca īsam vā dīghaḥ hoti ge pare ti liṅge bho purisā bho purisa bho aggī bho aggi bho bhikkhū bho bhikkhū
gha brahma ādite

original: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti. Bhoti kaññe, bhoti kaññā, bho brahme, bho brahma,

original: bho khatte, bho khatta, bho ise, bho isi, bho sakhe, bho sakha. Sakhi sakhīti itthiyaṃ
analyzed: bho khatte bho khatta bho ise bho isi bho sakhe bho sakha sakhi sakhi iti itthiyam
siddham eva evam aññatra api
namma ādīhi

original: Ammādīhi gasse na hoti. Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
analyzed: amma ādīhi gasse na hoti bhoti ammā bhoti annā bhoti ambā

original: Ammādīnaṃ ge rasso hoti vā. Bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
analyzed: amma ādīnam ge rassaḥ hoti vā bhoti amma bhoti ammā
gho ssam ssā ssāyam tiṃsu

original: Ssamādīsu gho rasso hoti. Tassaṃ, tassā, tassāya, taṃ, sabhatiṃ, esviti kiṃ? Tāya, sabhāya.
analyzed: rassaḥ hoti tassam tassā tassāya tam sabhatim esu iti kim tāya sabhāya
ekavacana yaḥ sva ghonam

original: Ekavacane yosu ca ghaokārantavajjitā naṃ nāmānaṃ rasso hoti tiliṅge. Itthiṃ, itthiyā,
analyzed: ekavacane yosu ca gha okāra anta vat jitāḥ nam nāmānam rassaḥ hoti ti liṅge itthim itthiyā

original: itthiyo, vadhuṃ vadhuyā, vadhuyo, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinā, daṇḍino, sayambhuṃ, sayambhunā,
analyzed: itthiyaḥ vadhum vadhuyā vadhuyaḥ daṇḍim daṇḍinā daṇḍinaḥ sayambhum sayambhunā

original: sayambhuvo, agho nanti kiṃ? Kaññāya, kaññāyo, oggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
analyzed: sayambhuvaḥ aghaḥ nanti kim
ge vā

original: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge, itthi, itthī, vadhu, vadhū, daṇḍi, daṇḍī, sayambhu, sayambhū. Aghonaṃtveva? Bhoti kaññā, bho go.

si smim nā napuṃsakassa

original: Napuṃsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṃ rasso na hoti. Itthī, daṇḍī, vadhū, sayambhū. Sisminti kiṃ? Itthiṃ, anapuṃsakassāti kiṃ? Daṇḍi kulaṃ.
analyzed: napuṃsaka vajjitassa nāmassa sismim rassaḥ na hoti itthī daṇḍī vadhū sayambhū sisminti kim itthim a napuṃsakassa ati kim daṇḍi kulaṃ
gossāgasihinaṃsu gāvagavā

original: Gasihinaṃvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti. (Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ), gāvo, gavo,
analyzed: gasi hi naṃ vajjitāsu vibhattīsu go saddassa gāvagavāḥ honti gāvam gavam gāvaḥ gavaḥ

original: gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave. Agasihinaṃsūti kiṃ?
analyzed: gāvena gavena gāvassa gavassa gāvasmai gavasmai gāve gave agasi hinaṃsu iti kim

original: Bho go, go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṃ.
analyzed: bho go go tiṭṭhati gohi gonam

original: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
analyzed: gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā gāvesu gavesu gosu

original: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena. Gavaṃ, gāvassa, gavassa.
analyzed: gossa se vā gavam hoti saha sena gavam gāvassa gavassa
gun nam ca naṃ nā

original: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavaṃca vā. Gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gonaṃ.
analyzed: naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnam hoti gavaṃ ca vā gunnam gavam gonam
na assā

original: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā. Gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
analyzed: gotaḥ na asse ā hoti vā gāvā gavā gāvena gavena
gāvumhi

original: Aṃvacane gossa gāvha vā hoti. Vāvhaṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ. Gossa goṇādeso na kato… saddantarattā.
analyzed: aṃvacane gossa gāvha vā hoti vāvham gāvam gavam gossa go ṇa ādesaḥ na kataḥ

original: Pasaññīto aṃvacanassa yaṃ vā hoti. Itthiyaṃ, itthiṃ. Pītoti kiṃ? Daṇḍiṃ, rattiṃ.
analyzed: pa saññi itaḥ aṃ vacanassa yam vā hoti itthiyam itthim daṇḍim rattim
nam jhī to

original: Jhasaññīto aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti. Daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ. Kathaṃ ‘buddhaṃ ādiccabandhuna’nti? Yogavibhāvā. Jhāti kiṃ? Itthiṃ. Īti kiṃ? Aggiṃ.
analyzed: jha saññi itaḥ aṃ vacanassa nam vā hoti daṇḍinam daṇḍim katham buddham yoga vibhāvā yoga vibhāvā
yonam na ūne pume

original: Jhīto yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Daṇḍīno, daṇḍine, daṇḍī, jhīto tveva? Itthiyo, pumeti kiṃ? Daṇḍīni kulāni.
analyzed: yonam none vā honti yathākkamam pulliṅge daṇḍīnaḥ daṇḍine daṇḍī tu eva itthiyaḥ pumā iti kim daṇḍīni kulāni
no

original: Jhīto yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti, daṇḍino passa, daṇḍī vā.
analyzed: no vā hoti pulliṅge daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti daṇḍino daṇḍī vā
sminaḥ ni

original: Jhīto smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā, daṇḍini, daṇḍismiṃ, jhīto tveva? Aggismiṃ.
analyzed: smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā daṇḍini daṇḍismin jhītaḥ tu eva aggismin
ambu ādīhi

original: Ambuādīhi sminoni hoti vā, phalaṃ patati ambuni, pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ, vātveva? Ambumhi, paṃsumhi.
analyzed: ambu ādīhi vā phalam patati ambuni puppham yathā paṃsuni ātape katam ambumhi paṃsumhi
kamma āditaḥ

original: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā. Kammani kamme. Kamma, camma, vesma, bhasma (asma), brahma, atta, ātuma, ghamma, muddha. Kammāditoti kiṃ? Buddhe.
analyzed: kamma āditaḥ hoti vā kammani kamme kamma camma vesma bhasma asma brahma atta ātuma ghamma kamma āditaḥ iti kim buddhe
nāsseno

original: Kammādito nāvacanassa eno vā hoti. Kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā, kammāditotveva? Buddhena.
analyzed: kamma āditaḥ na a vacanassa enaḥ vā hoti kammena kammanā cammena cammanā kamma āditaḥ tu eva buddhena
jha lā sassa naḥ

original: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti. Aggino aggissa, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, sayambhuno sayambhussa,
analyzed: jha l ataḥ sassa naḥ vā hoti agginaḥ aggissa daṇḍinaḥ daṇḍissa bhikkhunaḥ bhikkhussa sayambhunaḥ sayambhussa

original: Kathaṃ ‘yo ca sisso mahāmune’ ti? (3) “Ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho”ti brahmādīsu pāṭhā sassa e ṭānubandho.
analyzed: katham yaḥ ca sissaḥ mahā mune ti itas kvaci sassa ṭa anubandho ti brahma ādīsu pāṭhā sassa e ṭa anubandho
na sma assa

original: Jhalato smāssa nā hoti vā. Agginā aggismā, daṇḍinā daṇḍismā, bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā, sayambhunā sayambhusmā.
analyzed: jha lataḥ sma assa nā hoti vā agginā aggismā daṇḍinā daṇḍismā bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā sayambhunā sayambhusmā
lā yaḥ nam vaḥ pume

original: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhavo bhikkhū, sayambhuvo sayambhūpumeti kiṃ? Āyūni.
analyzed: lataḥ yonam vaḥ hoti vā pulliṅge bhikkhavaḥ bhikkhū āyūni
jantu āditaḥ na u ca

original: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge. Jantuno, jantavo jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo gotrabhū. Sahabhuno, sahabhuvo sahabhū.
analyzed: jantu āditaḥ no ca vā pulliṅge jantunaḥ jantavaḥ gotrabhunaḥ gotrabhuvaḥ gotrabhū sahabhunaḥ sahabhuvaḥ sahabhū
kūto

original: Kūpaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge, viduno vidū, viññuno viññū, sabbaññuno sabbaññū.
analyzed: kūpa ccaya antataḥ yonam naḥ vā hoti pulliṅge vidunaḥ vidū viññunaḥ viññū sabbaññunaḥ sabbaññū
dha lāpaḥ mus mā

original: Amusaddato yonaṃ lopova hoti pulliṅge, amū, pumetveva? Amuyo amūni. Vopavādoyaṃ.
analyzed: pul liṅge amū pum etvā iva amūni
na naḥ sassa

original: Amusmā sassa no na hoti, amussa, noti kiṃ? Amuyā.
analyzed: amusmā sassa no na hoti amussa no ti kim amuyā
yaḥ lopa nisu dīghaḥ

original: Yonaṃ lope nisu ca dīgho hoti, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, yolopanisūti kiṃ? Rattiyo.
analyzed: yo nam lope nisu ca dīghaḥ hoti aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni yo lopa nisū ti kim
sunaṃhisu

original: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti. Aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhi.
analyzed: esu nāmassa dīghaḥ hoti aggīsu aggīnam aggīhi
pañca ādīnam cud dasan nama

original: Pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ sunaṃhisva hoti. Pañcasu, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṃ, chahi, evaṃ yāva aṭṭharasā.
analyzed: pañca ādīnam hoti pañcasu pañcannam pañcahi chasu channam chahi evam yāva aṭṭharasā
y v ādaḥ n tus sa

original: Yvādīsu ntussa a hoti. Guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante, guṇavantena iccādi, yvā-doti kiṃ? Guṇavā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: yu ādīsu n tussa a hoti guṇavantā guṇavantam guṇavante guṇavantena iccādi yu ādo ti kim guṇavā tiṭṭhati
n tassa ca ṭa va ṃse

original: Aṃsesu ntappaccayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ca. Yaṃ yaṃ hi rāja bhajati santaṃvāyadi
analyzed: aṃsesu n ta paccayassa ṭa hoti vā n tussa ca yam yam hi rāja bhajati santam vā yadi

original: vā asaṃ, kiccā-nakubbassa kareyya kiccaṃ, himavaṃva pabbataṃ, sujātimantopi ajātimassa.
analyzed: vā asam kiccā anakubbassa kareyya kiccam himavant va pabbatam su jātimantaḥ api a jātimassa

original: Yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi. Cakkhumā andhitā honti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.
analyzed: yoga vibhāgena aññatra api cakkhumā andhitāḥ honti vaggumudātīriyāḥ pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti
yosu jhissa pume

original: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge. Aggayo aggī, jhaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Ikārantasamudāyassa ṭa mā siyābhi, rattiyo, iggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Daṇḍino, pumeti kiṃ? Aṭṭhīni.
analyzed: jha saññassa i ssa yosu vā ṭa hoti pul liṅge aggayaḥ aggī jha ggahaṇam kim ikāra anta samudāyassa ṭa mā siyā abhi i k gahaṇam kim daṇḍinaḥ pumā iti kim aṭṭhīni
ve vosu lussa

original: Lasaññassa ussa vevosu ṭa hoti. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, vevosūti kiṃ? Jantuyo, uggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Sayambhuvo.
analyzed: la saññassa ussa ve vosu ṭa hoti bhikkhave bhikkhavaḥ kim uggahaṇam kim
yomhi vā kvaci

original: Yomhi kvaci lasaññassa ussa vā ṭa hoti. Hetayo, nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena, ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayatu. Vāti kiṃ? Hetuyo.
analyzed: kvaci hoti hetayaḥ nandanti tam kurayaḥ dassanena ajjā iva tam kurayaḥ pāpayatu vāti kim
pumān ālapane vevaḥ

original: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo bhikkhū, pumeti kiṃ āyūni, ālapaneti kiṃ? Jantuyo tiṭṭhanti, lutotveva? Dhenuyo, sayambhuvo.
analyzed: la sañña taḥ u taḥ yossa ālapane vā ivaḥ honti vā pulliṅge bhikkhave bhikkhavaḥ bhikkhū pumā iti kim āyūni ālapanā iti kim jantuyaḥ tiṭṭhanti dhenuyaḥ sayambhuvaḥ
sma ahismin nam mha abhimhi

original: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ mhā bhimhi vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Buddhamhā buddhasmā, buddhebhi buddhehi, buddhamhi buddhasmiṃ, bahulādhikārāapavādavisayepi, dasasahassimhi dhātuyā.
analyzed: nāmasmā paresam mhā bhimhi vā honti yathākkamam buddhamhā buddhasmā buddhebhi buddhehi buddhamhi buddhasmin dasa sahassimhi dhātuyā
su hi svasse
a kāra antassa su hi sve hoti buddhesu buddhehi
sabba ādīnam namhi i ca

original: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti naṃmhi suhisu ca. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesu, sabbehi, sabbādīnanti
analyzed: akāra antānam sabba ādīnam e hoti nam mhi su hi su ca sabbesam sabbesu sabbehi sabba ādīnam ti

original: kiṃ? Buddhānaṃ, assetveva? Amūsaṃ. Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara
analyzed: kim buddhānam assetvā iva amūsam
aññatama pubba para avara dakkhiṇa uttara adharāni

original: ya tya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha.
analyzed: ya tya te ete ima amu kim eka tumha amha
saṃsānam

original: Sabbādito naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃ honti. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
analyzed: sabba āditaḥ naṃ vacanassa saṃsānam honti sabbesam sabbesānam
gha pā sassa ssā vā

original: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti, sabbassā sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
analyzed: sabba ādīnam gha pataḥ sa ssa ssā vā hoti sabba ssā sabbāya paggahaṇam uttara ttham
sminaḥ ssam

original: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti, sabbassaṃ sabbāya, amussaṃ amuyā.
analyzed: sabba ādīnam gha pataḥ sminaḥ ssam vā hoti sabbassam sabbāya amussam amuyā
yaṃ

original: Ghapato smino yaṃ vā hoti, kaññāyaṃ kaññāya, rattiyaṃ rattiyā, vadhuyaṃ vadhuyā, sabbāyaṃ sabbāya, amuyaṃ amuyā.
analyzed: ghapato sminaḥ yam vā hoti kaññāyam kaññāya rattiyam rattiyā vadhuyam vadhuyā sabbāyam sabbāya amuyam amuyā
tim sabhā parisāya

original: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṃ vā hoti, sabhatiṃ sabhāya, parisatiṃ parisāya.
analyzed: sabhā parisāhi tim vā hoti sabhatim sabhāya parisatim parisāya
pada ādi hi si

original: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi padasmiṃ, bilasi bilasmiṃ.
analyzed: ehi vā padasi padasmin bilasmin
na assa sā

original: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā, padasā padena, bilasā bilena.
analyzed: pada ādīhi sā hoti vā padasā padena bilasā bilena
kodha ādīhi

original: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā, kodhasā kodhena, atthasā atthena.
analyzed: ehi na assa sā hoti vā kodhasā kodhena atthasā atthena
a tena

original: Akārantato parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti, buddhena, atoti kiṃ? Agginā.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ parassa nā vacanassa e na ādesaḥ hoti buddhena a taḥ ti kim agginā
sisso

original: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti, buddho, atotveva? Aggi.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ nāmasmā sissa o hoti buddhaḥ aggi
kva ce vā

original: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci, vanappagumbe yathā phussitagge. Apavādavisayepi bahulaṃvīdhānā-sukhe dukkhe. Vāti kiṃ? Vanappagumbo kvacīti kiṃ? Pakkhe sabbattha mā hotu.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ nāmasmā si ssaḥ e hoti vā kvaci vanappagumbe yathā phussi tagge apavāda visaye pi bahulaṃvīdhāna asukhe dukkhe vāti kim vanappagumbaḥ kvaci iti kim pakkhe sabbattha mā hotu
am napuṃsake

original: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa aṃ hoti napuṃsakaliṅge. Rūpaṃ.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ nāmasmā si ssa aṃ hoti napuṃsaka liṅge rūpam
yonam ni

original: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ni hoti napuṃsake. Sabbāni rūpāni, niccavidhāne phalaṃ ekaccādisabbādīnaṃ paṭhamāyaṃ.
analyzed: akāra antataḥ nāmasmai yonam ni hoti napuṃsake sabbāni rūpāni nicca vidhāne phalam ekacca ādi sabba ādīnam
jha lā vā

original: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake, aṭṭhīni aṭṭhī, āyūni āyū.
analyzed: jha lataḥ yonam ni hoti vā napuṃsake aṭṭhīni aṭṭhī āyūni āyū
lopaḥ

original: Jhalato yonaṃ lopo hoti, aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū, jhalātveva? Aggayo. Pageva kasmā na hoti? Antaraṅgattā akārassa.
analyzed: jha lataḥ yonam lopaḥ hoti aṭṭhī āyū aggī bhikkhū pagā iva kasmā na hoti antaraṅga ttā akārassa
vā

original: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapa saññehi ca paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti, jantū jantuyo,
analyzed: jantu hetūhi īkāra antehi ghapa saññehi ca paresam vā lopaḥ hoti jantū jantuyo

original: hetū hetuyo, daṇḍī daṇḍiyo, kaññā kaññāyo, rattī rattiyo, itthī itthiyo, dhenū dhenuyo, vadhū vadhuyo.
analyzed: hetū hetuyaḥ daṇḍī daṇḍiyaḥ kaññā kaññāyaḥ rattī rattiyaḥ itthī itthiyaḥ dhenū dhenuyaḥ vadhū vadhuyaḥ
ye passi vaṇṇassa

original: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre, ratyo ratyā, ratyaṃ, pokkharañño, pokkharaññā,
analyzed: pa saññassa i va ṇṇassa lopaḥ hoti vā yakāre ratyoḥ ratyāḥ ratyam pokkharañño pokkharaññā

original: pokkharaññaṃ, vā tveva? Rattiyo, passāti kiṃ? Daṇḍiyo, ivaṇṇassāti kiṃ? Dhenuyo vadhuyo.
analyzed: pokkharaññam vā tveva rattiyo passāti kim daṇḍiyo
katham anuññātaḥ aham matyā ati ye yogavibhāgā
gasīnam

original: Nāmasmā gasīnaṃ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve, bho purisa, ayaṃ, daṇḍī.
analyzed: lopaḥ hoti vijjhantara abhāve bho purisa ayam daṇḍī
asaṅkhyehi sabbāsam

original: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, ca vā eva evaṃ, etasmāyeva liṅgā asaṅkhyehi syādyuppatti anumīyate.
analyzed: a vijjamāna saṅkhyehi parāsam sabbāsam vibhattīnam lopaḥ hoti ca vā eva evam liṅgā asaṅkhyehi anumīyate
ekatthatā ayam

original: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti bahulaṃ, puttīyati, rājapuriso, vāsiṭṭho,
analyzed: ekatthībhāve sabbāsam vibhattīnam lopaḥ hoti bahulam puttīyati rāja purisaḥ vāsiṭṭhaḥ

original: kvaci na hoti bahulaṃ vidhānā-parantapo, bhagandaro, parassapadaṃ, attanopadaṃ, gavampati,
analyzed: kvaci na hoti bahulam vidhāna aparantapaḥ bhagandaraḥ parassapadam attanopadam gavampati
devānaṃpiya tissaḥ antevāsī janesutaḥ mamattam māmakaḥ
pup basma āma āditaḥ

original: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. Adhitthi. Idha na hoti bahulaṃ
analyzed: amāt ekatthā pubbam yat ekattham tatas parāsam sabbāsam vibhattīnam lopaḥ hoti adhitthi idha na hoti bahulam

original: Vidhānā yathāpatthīyā, yathāparisāya, pubbasmāti kiṃ? Gāmagato.
analyzed: vidhānā yathāpatthīyā yathāparisāya kim
na atoma pañcamiyā

original: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ, tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti, antu, bhavatyapañcamyā, upakumbhaṃ, apañcamiyāti kiṃ? Upakumbhā ānaya.
analyzed: amāt ekatthā pubbam yat ekattham akāra antam tatas parāsam sabbāsam vibhattīnam lopaḥ na hoti bhavati a pañcamyā upakumbham a pañcamiyā iti kim upakumbhau ānaya
vā tatiyā sattaminam

original: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ, tato parāsaṃ tatiyāsatthamīnaṃ vā aṃ hoti, upakumbhena kataṃ, upakumbhaṃ kataṃ, upakumte nidhehi, upakumbhaṃ nidhehi.
analyzed: amāt ekatthā pubbam yat ekattham akāra antam tatas parāsam tatiyā sattha mīnam vā aṃ hoti upa kumbhena katam upa kumbham katam upa kumte nidhehi upa kumbham nidhehi
rājasī

original: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti, sabbadattena rājinā, vātveva? Raññā.
analyzed: nāmhi rājassi vā hoti sabba dattena rājinā vā iva raññā
su naṃ hi sū

original: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṃhisu, rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṃ raññaṃ, rājūhi rājehi.
analyzed: rājassa u hoti vā rājūsu rājesu rājūnam raññam rājūhi rājehi
imassa ā t itthiyaṃṭe

original: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ ṭe hoti vā sunaṃhisu, esu imesu, esaṃ imesaṃ, esi imehi, anitthiyanti kiṃ? Imāsu, imāsaṃ, imāhi.
analyzed: ima saddassa anitthiyam ṭe hoti vā esu imesu esam imesam esi imehi anitthiyanti kim imāsu imāsam imāhi

original: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ nāmhi anaimiiccādesā honti, anena imīnā, anitthiyaṃtveva? Imāya.
analyzed: ima saddassa an itthiyam nāmhi an aimi it ca ādesāḥ honti anena an itthiyam tu eva imāya
simha napuṃsakassa ayam

original: Imasaddassānapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi, ayaṃ puriso, ayaṃ itthī, anapuṃsakassāti kiṃ? Imaṃ.
analyzed: ima saddassa a napuṃsakassa ayam hoti simhi ayam purisaḥ ayam itthī a napuṃsakassa ati kim imaṃ
tassa saḥ

original: Tyatetānamanapuṃsakānaṃ tassa so hoti simhi, syo puriso, syā itthī, evaṃ so, sā, eso, esā, anapuṃsakassetveva? Tyaṃ, taṃ, etaṃ.
analyzed: tya t etānam a napuṃsakānam tassa saḥ hoti simhi puriso syāḥ itthī evam saḥ sā esaḥ esā anapuṃsakassa itu eva tyam tam etam
massa amussa

original: Anapuṃsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi, asu puriso, asu itthī.
analyzed: a napuṃsakassa amussa makārassa saḥ hoti simhi asu purisaḥ asu itthī
ke vā

original: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti, asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṃ amukaṃ, asukāni amukāni.

original: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, ne te nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni iccādi.
analyzed: ta saddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu ne te nāyo tāyo naṃ tam nāni tāni iccādi
ṭa sa sma asmiṃssa ayas saṃssa asaṃmha amhi svi massa ca

original: Sādīsvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti, assa imassa, asmā imasmā, asmiṃ imasmiṃ, assāya

original: tassa, asmā tasmā, asmiṃ tasmiṃ, assāya tassāya, assaṃ tassaṃ, assā tassā, āsaṃ tāsaṃ,
analyzed: tassa tasmai asmin tasmin assāya tassāya assam tassam assā tassā āsam tāsam

original: amhā tamhā, amhi tamhi, ssāyādiggahaṇamādesantare mā hotūti.
analyzed: amhi tamhi amhi tamhi ssāya ādi ggahaṇam ādesa antare mā hotu iti
ṭe sissisismā

original: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti, ‘yo nvajja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’, vātveva? Isi.
analyzed: isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti yaḥ nu ajja vinaye kaṅkham attha dhamma vidū ise

original: Isismā parassa dutiyāyossa ṭe vā hoti, ‘samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise’, vātveva? Isayo passa, dutiyassāti kiṃ? Isayo tiṭṭhanti.

original: Akārantehi ekaccādīhi yonaṃ ṭe hoti, ekacce tiṭṭhanti, ekace passa, atoti kiṃ? Ekaccāyo, evaṃ esa sa paṭhama.
analyzed: akāra antehi ekacca ādīhi yonam ṭe hoti ekacce tiṭṭhanti ekace evam esa sa paṭhama

original: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, ekaccāni.

original: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, sabbāni.

yaḥ nama iṭa

original: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti, sabbe tiṭṭhanti, sabbe passa, atotveva? Sabbāyo.

na aññam ca nāma ppadhānā

original: Nāmabhūtehī appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, te sabbā, te piyasabbā, te atisabbā.
analyzed: appadhānehi ca sabba ādīhi yam vuttam yat ca aññam sabba ādi kāriyam tam na hoti te sabbā te piya sabbā te ati sabbā

original: Tatiyatthena yoge sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādi kāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, māsena pubbānaṃ māsapubbānaṃ.
analyzed: tatiya tthena yoge sabba ādīhi yam vuttam yat ca aññam sabba ādi kāriyam tam na hoti māsena pubbānam māsa pubbānam

original: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, yañcāññaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ, taṃ na hoti, ikkhiṇuttarapubbānaṃ, samāseti kiṃ? Amusañca tesañca dehi.
analyzed: cattha samāsa visaye sabba ādīhi yam vuttam yat ca aññam sabba ādi kāriyam tam na hoti ikkhiṇ uttarapubbānam samāse ti kim amusam ca tesam ca dehi
veṭa

original: Etthasamāsavisadhaya sabbādīhi yadhassaṭa vutto, tassa vā hoti, pugguttare, pubbuttarā.
analyzed: sabba ādīhi vuttaḥ tassa vā hoti pugguttare pubbuttarā

original: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti, pubbe pubbā, pare parā, apare aparā, dakkhiṇe dakkhiṇā, uttare uttarā, adhare adharā, chahitikiṃ? Ye.
analyzed: etehi pubba ādīhi chahi sa visaye vā hoti pubbe pubbā pare parāḥ apare aparāḥ dakkhiṇe dakkhiṇāḥ uttare uttarāḥ adhare adharā chahi tikim ye

original: Manādīhi smimādīnaṃ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkamaṃ, manasi manasmiṃ, manaso manassa,
analyzed: mana ādīhi smim ādīnam sisoosāsāḥ vā honti yathākkamam manasi manasmin manasaḥ manassa

original: mano manaṃ, manasā manena, manasā manasmā, kathaṃ ‘putto jāto acetaso, hitvā yāti
analyzed: manaḥ manam manasā manena manasā manasmā katham puttaḥ jātaḥ acetasaḥ hitvā yāti

original: sumedhaso, suddhuttaravāsasā, hemakappanavāsase’ti? Sakattheṇatthā. Manatama tapa
analyzed: sumedhasaḥ suddhuttara vāsasā hema kappana vāsasā iti sakattheṇatthā manatama tapa

original: teja sira ura vaca oja rajayasa paya (6) “saravayā-yavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesu”.

bhavataḥ vā bhontaḥ gayonāse

original: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti gayonāse, bhonta bhavaṃ, bhonto bhavanto, bhotā

analyzed: evam bhavantati bhadda iti saddantharena siddham dassa dvi bhāvena
si ssā a c itaḥ ni

original: Aggismā sissa ni yoti vā, aggini aggi.
analyzed: aggismā sissa ni vā aggini aggi
ntas sam

original: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṃ hoti vā, gacchaṃ gacchanto.

bhūto

original: Bhūdhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā, bhavaṃ.
analyzed: bhū dhātutaḥ n tassa am hoti simhi niccam punabbidhānā bhavam
mahantāra hantānam ṭā vā

original: Simhi mahantārahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti, mahā mahaṃ, arahā arahaṃ.
analyzed: simhi mahanta arahantānam ntassa ṭā vā hoti mahā maham arahāḥ araham

original: Ntussa aṃṅaṃ honti simhi napuṃsake, guṇavaṃ kulaṃ, guṇavantaṃ kulaṃ, napuṃsaketiṃ kiṃ? Sīlavā bhikkhu.

original: Himavato simhī ntussa o vā hoti, himavanto himavā.
analyzed: himavataḥ simhi ntussa o vā hoti himavantaḥ himavā
rāja ādi yuva ādi tvā

original: Rājādīhiyuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti, rājā, yuvā. Rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma (7) “dhammo
analyzed: ca sissa ā hoti rājā yuvā rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma dhammo

original: vāññatthe” daḷhadhammā, asma, (8) “imo bhāve” aṇimā, (mahimā, garimā) laghimā, yuva

original: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnaṃ ca ānaṅa hoti vā aṃmhi, rājānaṃ rājaṃ, yuvānaṃ yuvaṃ.

original: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonaṃ āno vā hoti, rājāno yuvāno, vā tveva? Rājā rāje, yuvā yuve.
analyzed: rāja ādīhi yuva ādīhi ca vā hoti rājānaḥ yuvānaḥ vā tu eva rājā rāje yuvā yuve

original: Sakhato yona māyo no honti vā āno ca, sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno, vā tveva? Sakhā, sakhe.

original: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti, sakhe, niccattho-yamārambho.
analyzed: sakhataḥ sminaḥ u se hoti sakhe niccatthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
na u nāse svi

original: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu, sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
analyzed: sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu sakhino sakhinā sakhissa
sma anaṃsu vā

original: Sakhassa i vā hoti smānaṃsu, sakhismā sakhasmā, sakhīnaṃ sakhānaṃ.
analyzed: sakhassa i vā hoti sakhismā sakhasmā sakhīnam sakhānam
yosu aṃhisu cāraṅa

original: Sakhassa āraṅa vā hoti yosvaṃhisu smānaṃsu ca, sakhāro sakhāyo, sakhāresu sakhesu, sakhāraṃ sakhaṃ, sakhārehi sakhehi, sakhārā sakhā, sakhasmā, sakhārānaṃ sakhānaṃ.
analyzed: sakhassaḥ vā hoti sma anaṃsu ca sakhāraḥ sakhāyaḥ sakhāresu sakhesu sakhāram sakham sakhārehi sakhehi sakhārā sakhā sakhasmā sakhārānam sakhānam
lthupita ādīn amase

original: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ ca āraṅa hotī sato-ññatra, kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṃ, pitaraṃ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari, aseti kiṃ? Kattuno, pituno.
analyzed: ltup paccaya antānam pitā ādīnam ca āraṅa hotī sataḥ uññatra kattāraḥ pitaraḥ kattāram pitaram kattārā pitarā kattari pitari ase iti kim kattunaḥ pitunaḥ
namhi vā

original: Namhi ltupitādīnumānaṅa vā hoti, kattārānaṃ kattūnaṃ, ditarānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
analyzed: vā hoti kattārānam kattūnam pitunnam
ā

original: Namhi ltupitādīnamā vā hotī, kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ, pītānaṃ pitunnaṃ.
analyzed: namhi ltu pita ādīnamā vā hotī kattānam kattūnam pītānam pitunnam
sa lopaḥ

original: Ltupitādihi sassa lopo vā hoti, katthu katthuno, sakamantātu sakamandhātuno, pītu pituno.
analyzed: ltu pita ādihi sassa lopaḥ vā hoti katthu katthuno sakamandhātu sakamandhātuno pītu pituno
su hi svāraṅa

original: Suhisu ltupitādīnamāraṅa vā hoti, kattāresu kattūsu, pitaresu pitūsu, kattārehi kattūhi, pitarehi pītūhī.
analyzed: vā hoti kattāresu kattūsu pitaresu pitūsu kattārehi kattūhi pitarehi pītūhi
nat jāyā usmāma

original: Yosu nadisaddassa āma vā hoti, najjāyo nadiyo.
analyzed: yosu nadi saddassa āma vā hoti nadiyaḥ
ṭi katimhā

original: Katimhā dhayānaṃ ṭi hoti, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
analyzed: katimhā dhayānam hoti kati tiṭṭhanti kati passa
ṭa pañca ādīhi cut dasahi

original: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṃkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭo hoti pañca, pañca, evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasā. Pañcādīhīti kiṃ? Dve, tayo, cattāro, cuddhasahīti kiṃ? Dve visatiyo.
analyzed: pañca ādīhi saṃkhyāhi hoti pañca pañca evam yāva aṭṭhārasā pañca ādīhi iti kim dve tayo cattāro cuddhasahi iti kim dve visatiyo
ubhago hi ṭaḥ

original: Ubhagohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti, ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo, kathaṃ ‘imekaratthiṃ ubhayo vasāmā’ti? Ṭomhi yakārāgamo.
analyzed: ubhagohi ṭaḥ hoti ubhau ubhau gāvaḥ gāvaḥ katham imā eka ratthim ubhayaḥ vasāma ati yakāra āgamaḥ
āraṅaḥ smā

original: Āravādesato yonaṃ ṭo hoti, sakhāro, kattāro, pitaro.
analyzed: āra vā ādesa yonam ṭaḥ hoti sakhāraḥ kattāraḥ pitaraḥ
ṭa uṭe vā

original: Āravādesamhā yonaṃ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ, sakhāro, sakhāre sakhāyo, ṭoggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
analyzed: āra vā desamhā ṭaḥ ṭe vā honti yathākkamam sakhāraḥ sakhāyaḥ ṭo gahaṇam lāghava attham
ṭāḥ na asmānam

original: Āravādesamhā nāsmānaṃ ṭā hoti, kattārā, kattarā. Kūci vā hoti bayulādhikārā, etādisā sakhāramhā.
analyzed: hoti kattārā kattarā vā hoti etādisā
ṭi sminaḥ

original: Āravādesamhā smino ṭi hoti, kattari, vitari.
analyzed: ā ra vā de sam hā sminaḥ ṭi hoti kattari vitari
divā ditaḥ

original: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti, divi, bhuvi. Niccaṃ vakārāgamo.
analyzed: diva ādīhi nāmehi sminaḥ ṭi hoti divi bhuvi niccam vakāra āgamaḥ
ras sāraṅa

original: Smimhi āro rasso hoti, kattari, nattari.
analyzed: smimhi āraḥ rassaḥ hoti kattari nattari
pitā ādīnam anatvā adīnam

original: Natvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, pitaro, pitaraṃ, anutvādīnanti kiṃ? Nattāro.
analyzed: natvā ādi vat jitānam pitā ādīnam āraḥ rassaḥ hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu pitaraḥ pitaram kim nattāraḥ
yuva ādīnam su hi sva anaṅa

original: Suhisu yuvādīnaṃ ānaṅa hoti, yuvānesu, yuvānehi.
analyzed: yuva ādīnam hoti yuvānesu yuvānehi

original: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti, yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
analyzed: yuvānaḥ yuvānā yuvāne

original: Yuvādīhi smāsminnaṃ nāne honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvānā, yuvāne.
analyzed: sma asmin am nāne honti yathākkamam yuvānā yuvāne
yonam na ūne vā

original: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ, yuvāno, yuvāne, vāti kiṃ? Yuve passa, noggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
analyzed: yuva ādīhi yonam na ūne vā honti yathākkamam yuvānaḥ yuvāne vā ati kim yuve na uggahaṇam lāghava attham
i taḥ ñ atthe pume

original: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tomaraṅkusapāṇino, tomaraṅkusapāṇine, vātveva? Tomaraṅkusapāṇayo, aññattheti kiṃ? Pāṇayo.
analyzed: añña pada atthe vattamānāḥ ikāra antataḥ nāmasmai yonam na ūne vā honti yathākkamam pulliṅge tomaraṅkusa pāṇino tomaraṅkusa pāṇine vā atvā iva tomaraṅkusa pāṇayaḥ aññattha iti kim pāṇayaḥ
ne sminaḥ kvaci

original: Aññapadatthe vatthamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci pulliṅge, kataññumhi ca posamhi, sīlavante ariya vuttine, vātveva? Ariyavuttimhi, pumetveva? Ariyavuttiyā.
analyzed: añña pada tthe ikāra antataḥ nāmasmā sminaḥ ne hoti vā kvaci pulliṅge ca posamhi sīlavante ariya vuttine vā etvā iva ariya vuttimhi pum etvā iva ariya vuttiyā
pumān

original: Pumasaddato smino yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumāne pume.
analyzed: puma saddāt sminaḥ yam vuttam tam vā hoti pumāne pume
na amhi

original: Pumassa nāmhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vā hoti, pumānā pumena.
analyzed: pumassa nāmhi yam vuttam tam vā hoti pumānā pumena
sumhā ca

original: Pumassa sumhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ ā ca vā hoti, pumānesu, pumāsu pumesuṃ.
analyzed: pumassa sumhi yam vuttam tam ā ca vā hoti pumānesu pumāsu pumesum
gassam

original: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti, bho pumaṃ bho puma, bho ittipumaṃ bho itthipuma.
analyzed: puma saddataḥ gassa am vā hoti bho pumam bho puma bho itti pumam bho itthi puma
sās saṃse ca anaṅa

original: Sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṃse ge ca, sānaṃ, sānassa, cabhā sāna.
analyzed: sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṃse ge ca sānam sānassa cabhā sāna
vattahā sanaṃnaṃ nonānaṃ

original: Vattahā sanaṃnaṃ nonānaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, vattahāno, vattahānānaṃ.
analyzed: vattahā honti yathākkamam vattahānaḥ
brahmassu vā

original: Brahmassa u vā hoti sanaṃsu, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ brahmānaṃ.
analyzed: brahmassa u vā hoti sanaṃsu brahmunaḥ brahmassa brahmūnam brahmānam

original: Pumādinamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca, pumuno pumassa, pumunā pumānā, pumunā pumānā,

original: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā, attano attassa, ātumano ātumassa.

su hīsu naka

original: Attaātumānaṃ suhisu vā naka hoti, attanesu attesu ātumanesu ātumesu, attanehi attehi ātumanehi ātumehi, kathaṃ ‘verinesu’ti? ‘Naka’ iti yogavibhāgā.
analyzed: vā hoti attanesu attesu ātumanesu ātumesu attanehi attehi ātumanehi ātumehi katham na kaḥ iti yogavibhāgā
smā assa nā brahmā ca

original: Brahmā attaātumehi ca svāssa nā hoti, brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
analyzed: ca svā assa nā hoti brahmunā attanā ātumanā
dutiya ayam

original: Imaetasaddānaṃ kathitānukathanavisaye dutiyāyamenādeso hoti, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayamajjhāpaya,
analyzed: kathita anukathana visaye hoti imam bhikkhum vinayam ajjhāpaya

original: atho enaṃ dhammamajjhāpaya, ime bhikkhū vinayamajjhāpaya, atho ene dhammamajjhāpaya,
analyzed: atho enam dhammam ajjhāpaya ime bhikkhū vinayam ajjhāpaya atho ene dhammam ajjhāpaya

original: Sabbāsu vibhattisu kissa ko hoti, ko, eka, kā, kāyo, kaṃ, kāni, keneccāmi.
analyzed: sabbāsu vibhattisu kissa kaḥ hoti kā kāyo kam kāni kena iccāmi

original: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu, kissa kassa, kismiṃ kasmiṃ, anitthiyanti kiṃ? Kassā, kassaṃ.
analyzed: anitthiyam kissa ki vā hoti kissa kassa kismin kasmin anitthiyanti kim kassā kassam
kim aṃsisu saha napuṃsake

original: Aṃsisu saha tehi kiṃsaddassa kiṃ hoti napuṃsake. Kiṃ, kiṃ, napuṃsaketi kiṃ? Ko, kaṃ.
analyzed: aṃsisu saha tehi kiṃsaddassa kim hoti napuṃsake kim kim napuṃsaka iti kim ko kaṃ

original: Aṃsisu saha teti imassa idaṃ hoti vā napuṃsake, idaṃ imaṃ, idaṃ imaṃ.
analyzed: aṃsisu saha te iti imassa idam hoti vā napuṃsake idam imam idam imam

analyzed: aṃsisu saha tehi amussa adum hoti vā napuṃsake adum amum adum amum

original: Amhassa asmā hoti vā sumhi, bhattirasmāsu yā tava, vā tveva? Amhesu.
analyzed: amhassa asmā hoti vā sumhi bhattiḥ asmāsu yā tava vā tu eva amhesu
nam mhi ti catunnam itthiyam tissa catassā

original: Naṃmhi ticatunnaṃ tissacatassā honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ, tissannaṃ catassannaṃ, itthiyanti kiṃ? Tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ.
analyzed: namhi ti catunnam tissa catassāḥ honti itthiyam yathākkamam tissannam catassannam itthiyam ti kim tiṇṇam catunnam
tissaḥ catassaḥ yaḥ mhi sa vibhattīnam

original: Vibhattisahitānaṃ ticatunnaṃ yomhi tisso catasso honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ, tisso catasso.
analyzed: vibhatti sahitānam ti catunnam yomhi tissaḥ catassaḥ honti itthiyam yathākkamam tissaḥ catassaḥ

original: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇicattāri honti napuṃsake, tīṇi. Cattāri.
analyzed: sa vibhattīnam ti catunnam yathākkamam tīṇi cattāri honti napuṃsake tīṇi cattāri

original: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tayo, cattāro.
analyzed: sa vibhattīnam ti catunnam tayocattāraḥ honti yathākkamam pul liṅge tayo cattāraḥ
caturaḥ vā

original: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yomhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge, caturo janā saṃvidhāya, kathaṃ ‘caturo nimitte nāddassāsi’nti? Liṅgavipallāsā.
analyzed: catu saddassa sa vibhattissa yaḥ mhi caturaḥ vā hoti pulliṅge caturaḥ janā saṃvidhāya katham caturaḥ nimitte liṅga vipallāsā

original: Yosvamhassa savibhattissa mayamasmā vā honti yathākkamaṃ, mayaṃ, asmā, amhe.
analyzed: sa vibhattissa mayam asmai vā honti yathākkamam mayam asmai amhe

original: Naṃsesvamussa savibhattissa asmākaṃ mamaṃ honti vā yathākkamaṃ, asmākaṃ, amhākaṃ, mamaṃ mama.
analyzed: naṃ se su amussa sa vibhattissa asmākam mamam honti vā yathākkamam asmākam amhākam mamam mamam
simhahaṃ

original: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti, ahaṃ.
analyzed: simhi amhassa sa vibhattissa aham hoti aham
tumhassa tuvam tvam amhi ca

original: Aṃmhi simhi ca tumhassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ.
analyzed: aṃmhi simhi ca tumhassa sa vibhattissa tuvam tvam honti yathākkamam tuvam tvam
tayātayīnam vā

original: Tumhassa tayātayīnaṃ takārassa tva hoti vā, tvayā tayā, tvayi tayi.
analyzed: tumhassa tayātayīnam takārassa hoti vā tvayā tayā tvayi tayi
sma amhi tvamhā

original: Svāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā, pattā nissaṃ sayaṃ tvamhā, vā tveva? Tvayā.
analyzed: svāmhi tumhassa sa vibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā pattā nissam sayam tvamhā vā tu eva tvayā
nta ntu unam ntaḥ yomhī paṭhame

original: Paṭhame yomhi ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ntoiccādeso vā hoti, gacchanto, gacchantā, guṇavanto guṇavantā.

tam naṃmhi

original: Naṃmhi ntantūnaṃ savibhatthīnaṃ taṃ vā hoti, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
analyzed: nam mhi n ta ntūnam sa vibhatthīnam tam vā hoti gacchatam gacchantānam guṇavatam guṇavantānam
tota atitā sasma asmin nāsu

original: Sādīsu ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṃ, gacchato gacchantassa,
analyzed: sa ādīsu n ta ntūnam sa vibhattīnam tota atitāḥ honti vā yathākkamam gacchataḥ gacchantassa

original: guṇavato guṇavantassa, gacchatā gacchantamhā, guṇavatā guṇavanthamhā, gacchati gacchante,
analyzed: guṇavataḥ guṇavantassa gacchatā gacchantamhā guṇavatā gacchati gacchante

original: guṇavati guṇavante, gacchatā gacchantena, guṇavatā guṇavantena.
analyzed: guṇavati guṇavante gacchatā gacchantena guṇavatā guṇavantena
ṭa ṭā am ge

original: Ge pare ntantūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭaṭāaṃ iccādesā honti, bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bho gacchaṃ, to guṇava, bho guṇavā, bho guṇavaṃ.
analyzed: ge pare n ta ntūnam sa vibhattīnam ṭa ṭā am i t ca ādesāḥ honti bho gaccha bho gacchā bho gaccham to guṇava bho guṇavā bho guṇavam
yomhi dvinnam duvedve

original: Yomhī dvīssa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṃ, duve, dve.
analyzed: dvīssa savibhattissa duve dve honti paccekam duve dve

original: 220. Duvinnaṃ naṃmhi vā. Naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā, duvinnaṃ, dvinnaṃ.
analyzed: duvinnam naṃmhi vā naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnam hoti vā duvinnam dvinnam

original: 221. Rājassa raññaṃ. Naṃmhi rājassa savibhattissa raññaṃ hoti vā, raññaṃ rājānaṃ.
analyzed: rājassa raññam naṃmhi rājassa savibhattissa raññam hoti vā raññam rājānam

original: 222. Nāsmāsu raññā. Nāsmāsu rājassa savibhattissa raññā hoti, raññā kataṃ, raññā nissaṭaṃ.
analyzed: na asmāsu raññā na asmāsu rājassa savibhattissa raññā hoti raññā katam raññā nissaṭam

original: 223. Rañño raññassa rājino se. Se rājassa savibhattissa rañño raññassa rājino honti, rañño, raññassa, rājino.
analyzed: raññaḥ raññassa rājinaḥ se se rājassa savibhattissa raññaḥ raññassa rājinaḥ honti raññaḥ raññassa rājinaḥ

original: 224. Smimhi raññerājini. Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññe rājini honti, raññe, rājini.
analyzed: smimhi raññerājini smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññerājini honti raññerājini

original: 225. Samāse vā. Samāsavisaye ete ādesā rājassa vā honti, kāsiraññā kāsirājena, kāsiraññā kāsirājasmā, kāsirañño kāsirājassa, kāsiraññe kāsirāje.
analyzed: samāse vā samāsa visaye ete ādesāḥ rājassa vā honti kāsiraññā kāsirājena kāsiraññā kāsirājasmā kāsirañño kāsirājassa kāsiraññe kāsirāje

original: 226. Smimhi tumhāmhānaṃ tayimayi. Smimhi tumhaamusaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayimayi honti yathākkamaṃ, tayi, mayi.
analyzed: smimhi tumha amhānam tayi mayi smimhi tumha amu saddānam sa vibhattīnam tayi mayi honti yathākkamam tayi mayi

original: Aṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ maṃ tavaṃ mamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ,
analyzed: am mhi tumha amha saddānam sa vibhattīnam tam mam tavam mamam honti yathākkamam tam mam tavam mamam
na asmāsu tayā amayā

original: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayāmayā honti yathākkamaṃ, tayā kataṃ, mayā kataṃ, tayā nissaṭaṃ, mayā nissaṭaṃ.
analyzed: na asmāsu tumha amha saddānam sa vibhattīnam tayā amayāḥ honti yathākkamam tayā katam mayā katam tayā nissaṭam mayā nissaṭam
tava mama tuyham mayham se

original: Se tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tava mama tuyhaṃ mayhaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tava, tuyhaṃ, mama, mayhaṃ.
analyzed: se tumha amha saddānam sa vibhattīnam tava mama tuyham mayham honti yathākkamam tava tuyham mama mayham
ṅaṃ ṅākam nam mhi

original: Naṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ honti paccekaṃ, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, yathāsaṅkhyamatra na vivacchate.

visesanam ekatthena

original: Visesanaṃ syāntaṃ visessena syādyantena samānādhikaraṇena sahekatthaṃ hoti, nīlañca
analyzed: visesanam sya antam visessena sya ādi antena samāna adhikaraṇena saha ekattham hoti nīlam ca

original: taṃ uppalañceti nīluppalaṃ, chinnañca taṃ paruḷhañceti chinnaparaḷhaṃ, satthīva satthī,
analyzed: tam uppalam ca iti nīluppalam chinnam ca tam paruḷham ca iti chinna paraḷham satthī iva satthī

original: satthī ca sā sāmā ceti satthisāmā, sīhova sīho, muni ca so sīho ceti munisīho, sīlameva dhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ.
analyzed: satthī ca sā sāmā ca iti satthi sāmā sīhaḥ uva sīhaḥ muni ca saḥ sīhaḥ ca iti muni sīhaḥ sīlam eva dhanam sīla dhanam

original: Kvaci vākyameva puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, citto gahapati. Kvaci vuttiyeva kaṇhasappo, lohitasāli,
analyzed: kvaci vākyam eva puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi putto cittaḥ gahapati kvaci vuttiyā iva kaṇha sappaḥ lohita sāli

original: visesananti kiṃ? Tacchako sappo, ekattheneti kiṃ? Kāḷamhā añño. Kathaṃ ‘pattajīviko,
analyzed: visesanam ti kim tat śako sappo ekatthena iti kim katham patta jīviko
āpanna jīvikaḥ māsa jātaḥ ti añña pada tthe bhavissati
nañaḥ

original: Nañiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ hoti, na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, bahulādhikārato
analyzed: nañ it ca itam syādi antam syādi antena saha ikattham hoti na brāhmaṇaḥ a brāhmaṇaḥ bahula adhikārataḥ

original: asamatthatthehi, kehici hoti ‘apunageyyā gāthā, anokāsaṃ kāretvā, amūlā mūlaṃ gantvā.
analyzed: a samattha atthehi kehici hoti a puna geyyāḥ gāthāḥ an okāsam kāretvā amūlāḥ mūlam gantvā

original: Īsaṃkaḷāro, īsaṃpiṅgaloti ‘syādi syādine’ti samāso, vākyameva vātippasaṅgābhāvā.
analyzed: īsaṃkaḷāraḥ īsaṃpiṅgalaḥ iti syādi syādinā iti samāsaḥ vākyam eva
kupa ādayaḥ

original: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahekatthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato-ñattha,
analyzed: ku saddaḥ pādayaḥ ca syādi antena saha ikatthāḥ honti niccam

original: kucchito brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo, īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ kaduṇhaṃ, panāyako, abhiseko, pakaritvā,
analyzed: kucchitaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ku brāhmaṇaḥ īsakam uṇham kaduṇham

original: pakataṃ, duppuriso, dukkaṭaṃ, supuriso, sukataṃ, abhitthutaṃ, atitthutaṃ, ākaḷāro, ābaddho.
analyzed: pakatam duppurisaḥ dukkaṭam su purisaḥ su katam abhitthutam a titthutam ākaḷāraḥ ābaddhaḥ

original: (9) “Pādayo gatādyatthe paṭhamāya”. Pagato ācariyo pācariyo, pantevāsī.
analyzed: pa ādayaḥ gata ādi atthe paṭhamāya pagataḥ ācariyo pācariyo pantevāsī
acca ādayaḥ kanta ādi atthe dutiyāya atikkantaḥ mañcamatimañcaḥ atimālaḥ

original: (11) “Avādayo kuṭṭhādyatthe tatiyāya”. Avakuṭṭhaṃ kokilāya vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, avamayūraṃ.
analyzed: ava ādayaḥ kuṭṭha ādi atthe tatiyāya ava kuṭṭham kokilāya vanam ava kokilam ava mayūram
pariya ādayaḥ gilāna ādi atthe catutthiyā parigilānaḥ ajjhenāya pariyajjhenaḥ
ni ādayo kanta ādi atthe pañcamyā

original: Nikkhanto kosambiyā nikkosampi, asyādividhimhīti kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate.
analyzed: nikkhantaḥ kosambiyā nikkosampi asya ādi vidhimhi iti kim rukkham pati vijjotate
cī kriyatthe hi

original: Cīppaccayanto kiriyatthehi syādyantehi sahekattho hoti, malinīkariya.
analyzed: cīp paccaya ntaḥ kiriya tthehi saha ika atthaḥ hoti
bhū san ādara an ādare su alaṃsāsā

original: Bhūsanādisvatthe svalamādayo saddā kiriyatthehi syādyantehi sahekatthā honti, alaṃkariya,
analyzed: bhūsana ādi svatthe su alam ādayaḥ saddā kiriya atthehi syādi antehi saha ikatthāḥ honti alaṃkariya

original: sakkacca, asakkacca. Bhūsanādīsūti kiṃ? Alaṃbhutvā gato, sakkatvā gato, asakkatvā
analyzed: sakkat ca a sakkat ca bhūsana ādīsu iti kim alaṃbhutvā gataḥ sakkatvā gataḥ a sakkatvā
gataḥ pariyattam sobhanam asobhananti attho
aññe ca

original: Aññe ca saddā kiriyatthehi syādyantehi saha bahulamekatthā bhavanti, purobhūya, tirobhūya, tirokariya, urasikariya, manasikariya, majjhekariya, tuṇhībhūya.
analyzed: aññe ca saddā kiriya tthehi syādi antehi saha bahulam eka tthāḥ bhavanti purobhūya tirobhūya tirokariya urasikariya manasikariya majjhekariya tuṇhībhūya
vā an ekaññatthe

original: Anekaṃ syādyantamaññassa padassatthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti, bahūni dhanāni yassa so bahudhano,
analyzed: anekam syādi antam aññassa padassa atthe ekattham vā hoti bahūni dhanāni yassa saḥ bahu dhanaḥ

original: lambā kaṇṇā yassa so lambakaṇṇo, vajiraṃ pāṇimhi yassa soyaṃ vajirapāṇi, mattā bahavo
analyzed: lambā kaṇṇā yassa saḥ lamba kaṇṇaḥ vajiram pāṇimhi yassa saḥ iyam vajira pāṇi mattāḥ bahavaḥ

original: mātaṅgā ettha mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ, āruḷho vānaro yaṃ rukkhaṃ so āruḷhavānaro,
analyzed: mātaṅgāḥ ettha matta bahu mātaṅgam vanam āruḷhaḥ vānaraḥ yam rukkham saḥ āruḷha vānaraḥ

original: jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo, dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ yassa so dinnabhojano, apagataṃ
analyzed: jitāni indriyāni yena saḥ jitindriyaḥ dinnam bhojanam yassa saḥ dinna bhojanaḥ apagatam

original: kāḷakaṃ yasmā paṭā so-yamapagatakāḷako, upagatā dasa yesaṃ te upadasā, āsannadasā,
analyzed: kāḷakam yasmā saḥ yam apagata kāḷakaḥ upagatāḥ dasa te upadasāḥ āsanna dasā

original: adūradasā, adhikadasā, tayo dasa parimāṇamesaṃ tidasā, kathaṃ dasasaddo saṅkhyāne
analyzed: adūradasāḥ adhikadasā tayaḥ dasa parimāṇam esam tidasā katham dasa saddaḥ saṅkhyāne

original: vattate? Parimāṇasaddasannidhānā, yathā pañca parimāṇamesaṃ pañcakā sakunāti, dve
analyzed: yathā pañca dve

original: vā tayo vā parimāṇamesaṃ dvattayo vāsaddatthe vā dve vā tayo vā dvattayo.
analyzed: vā tayaḥ vā dvattayaḥ vā asaddatthe vā dve vā tayaḥ vā dvattayaḥ

original: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṃ dakkhiṇapubbā disā, dakkhiṇā ca sā
analyzed: dakkhiṇassa ca pubbassa ca disāya yat antarāḷam dakkhiṇa pubbā disā dakkhiṇā ca sā

original: pubbā cāti vā, saha puttenāgato saputto, salomako vijjamānalomakoti attho, evaṃ sapakkhako,
analyzed: pubbā ca ati vā saha puttena āgataḥ sa puttaḥ sa lomakaḥ vijjamāna lomakaḥ ti attho evam sa pakkhakaḥ

original: atthī khīrā brāhmaṇīti atthisaddo vijjamānatthe nipāto, kvaci gatatthatāya padantarānamappayogo,
analyzed: atthī khīrā brāhmaṇī iti atthi saddaḥ vijjamāna atthe nipātaḥ kvaci gata ttha tāya

original: kaṇṭhaṭṭhā kāḷā assa kaṇṭhekāḷo, oṭṭhassa mukhamiva mukhamassa oṭṭhamukho, kesasaṅghāto
analyzed: kaṇṭhaṭṭhā kāḷā assa kaṇṭhekāḷaḥ oṭṭhassa mukham iva mukham assa oṭṭha mukhaḥ kesa saṅghāto

original: cūḷā assa kesacūḷo, suvaṇṇavikāro alaṅkāro assa suvaṇṇālaṅkāro, papatitaṃ paṇṇamassa
analyzed: cūḷā assa kesa cūḷaḥ suvaṇṇa vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ assa suvaṇṇa alaṅkāro papatitam paṇṇam assa

original: papatitapaṇṇo, papaṇṇo, avijjamānā puttā assa avijjamānaputto, na santi puttā assa
analyzed: papatita paṇṇaḥ papaṇṇaḥ a vijjamānāḥ puttāḥ assa a vijjamāna puttaḥ na santi puttāḥ assa

original: aputte, kvaci na hoti pañca bhuttavanto assa bhātuno putto assa atthīti bahulādhikārato.
analyzed: a putte kvaci na hoti pañca bhuttavantaḥ assa bhātuno putto assa atthi iti bahula adhikārataḥ

original: 18. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ.
analyzed: tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpam

original: Sattamyantaṃ tatiyantañca sarūpamanekaṃ tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe-ññapadatthe
analyzed: sattamī antam tatiya antam ca sarūpam anekam tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā

original: ekatthaṃ vā hoti, kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ kesākesi, daṇḍehi
analyzed: ekattham vā hoti kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā yuddham pavattam kesākesi daṇḍehi

original: ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi, muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi, “ci vītiyāre”
analyzed: ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā yuddham pavattam daṇḍādaṇḍi muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi ci vītiyāre

original: (3-51) ti ci samāsanto, “cismiṃ” (3.66) ti akāro. Tattha teneti kiṃ? Kāyañca kāyañca
analyzed: ti ci samāsanto cismin ti akāro tattha tena iti kim kāyam ca kāyam ca

original: gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ. Gahetvā paharitvāti kiṃ? Rathe ca rathe ca ṭhatvā yuddhaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā yuddham pavattam gahetvā paharitvā ati kim rathe ca rathe ca yuddham

original: pavatti. Yuddheti kiṃ? Hatthe ca hatthe ca gahetvā sakhyaṃ pavattaṃ. Sarūpanti kiṃ?
analyzed: yuddha iti kim hatthe ca hatthe ca gahetvā sakhyam pavattam sarūpam ti kim

original: Daṇḍehi ca musalehi ca paharitvā yuddha pavattaṃ.
analyzed: daṇḍehi ca musalehi ca paharitvā yuddha pavattam
catthe

original: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ catthe ekatthaṃ vā bhavati. Samuccayonvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro
analyzed: anekam syādi antam catthe ekattham vā bhavati samuccaya unvācayo itarītara yogo samāhāraḥ

original: ca ca saddatthā, tattha samuccayānvācayesu nekatthībhāvo sambhavati, tesu hi samuccayo
analyzed: ca ca tattha samuccaya anvācayesu na ikatthībhāvaḥ sambhavati tesu hi samuccayaḥ

original: aññamaññanirapekkhā namattappadhānānaṃ katthaci kiriyāvisese cīyamānatā, yathā ‘dhave
analyzed: aññamañña nirapekkhā namatta ppadhānānam katthaci kiriyā visese cīyamāna tā yathā dhave

original: ca khadire ca palāse ca chindā’ti. Anvācayo ca yattheko padhānabhāvena vidhīyate
analyzed: ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti ca padhāna bhāvena vidhīyate

original: aparo ca guṇabhāvena, yathā ‘bhikkhañcara gāvo cānaye’ti. Itaradvaye tu sambhavati,
analyzed: aparaḥ ca guṇa bhāvena yathā bhikkhan cara gāvaḥ ca anayā iti itara dvaye tu sambhavati
tesu hi itarītara yogaḥ yathā
assa avayava ppadhāna ttā bahuvacanam eva aññam añña sa apekkhānam eva tirohita avayava bhedaḥ

original: samudāyappadhāno samāhāro, yathā ‘chattupāhana’nti, assa pana samudāyappadhānattā ekavacanameva.
analyzed: samudāya ppadhānaḥ samāhāraḥ yathā chattu upāhananti assa pana samudāya ppadhāna ttā ekavacanam eva

original: Te ca samāhārītarītarayogā bahulaṃ vidhānā niyatavisayāyeva honti, tatrāyaṃ visayavibhāgo

saṅkhyā parimāṇa saññānam
khuddajantukānam pacana caṇḍālānam caraṇa sādhāraṇānam ekajjhāyana pāvacanānam liṅga visesānam

original: vividhaviruddhānaṃ disānaṃ, nadīnañca niccaṃ samāhārekattaṃ bhavati, tiṇarukkhapasusakunadhanadhaññabyañjanajanappadānaṃ

vā aññesam itari itara yogaḥ u va

original: Pāṇyaṅgānaṃ-cakkhusotaṃ, mukhanāsikaṃ, hanugīvaṃ, chavimaṃsalohitaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ, jarāmaraṇaṃ.

muraja gomukham saṅkha deṇḍimam maddavika pāṇavikam

original: gītavāditaṃ, sammatālaṃ. Yoggaṅgānaṃ phālapācanaṃ, yuganaṅgalaṃ. Senaṅgānaṃ-asisattitomarapiṇḍaṃ,
analyzed: gīta vāditam sammatālam yoggaṅgānam phālapācanam yuganaṅgalam senaṅgānam asisatti tomara piṇḍam
asi cammam dhanu kalāpam paharaṇa āvaraṇam bīḷāla mūsikam

original: kākolūkaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇaṃ. Saṅkhyāparimāṇa saññānaṃ-ekakadukaṃ, dukatikaṃ, tikacatukkaṃ,

catukka pañcakam dasa ikādasakam kīṭa paṭaṅgam kuntha kipillikam
ḍaṃsa makasam makkhika kipillikam pacana caṇḍālānam orabbhika sūkarikam sākuntika māgavikam
sa pāka caṇḍālam vena rathakāram pukkusa chava ḍāhakam

dīgha majjhimam eka uttara saṃyuttakam khandhaka vibhaṅgam

original: Vividhaviruddhānaṃ kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ, hīnappaṇītaṃ, kaṇhasukkaṃ, chekapāpakaṃ.

analyzed: sākasālā gajagavajā gomahisam gomahisāḥ eṇeyyagomahisam

analyzed: eṇeyya go mahisā eṇeyya varāham eṇeyya varāhāḥ ajeḷakam ajeḷakā kukkura sūkaram kukkura sūkarā

original: jātarūparajatā. Dhaññānaṃ-sāliyavakaṃ sāliyavakā, tilamuggamāsaṃ tilamuggamāsā, nipphāvakulatthaṃ

original: eṇeyyavārāhā, migamāyūraṃ migamāyūrā. Janapadānaṃ-kāsikosalaṃ kāsikosalā, vajjimallaṃ

analyzed: vajjimallā cetivaṃsam cetivaṃsā macchasūrasenam macchasūrasenā kurupañcālam kurupañcālā

original: Etasmiṃ ekatthībhāvakaṇḍe yaṃ vuttaṃ pubbaṃ, tadeva pubbaṃ nipatati kamātikkame payojanābhāvā.
analyzed: etasmin ekatthībhāva kaṇḍe yam vuttam pubbam tat eva pubbam nipatati kama atikkame payojana abhāvā

original: Kvaci vipallāsopi hoti bahulādhikārato, dantānaṃ rājā rājadanto, katthaci kamaṃ paccānādarā
analyzed: kvaci bahula adhikārataḥ dantānam rājā rājadanto katthaci

original: pubbakālassāpi paranipāto, littavāsito, naggamusito, sittasammaṭṭho, bhaṭṭhaluñcito.

original: Catthe yadekatthaṃ tattha keci pubbapadaṃ bahudhā niyamenti, tadiha byabhicāradassāna
analyzed: catthe yat ekattham tattha keci pubba padam bahudhā niyamenti tat iha byabhicāra dassāna

original: Catthe samāhāre yadekatthaṃ, taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, tathācevodāhaṭaṃ, katthaci na hoti ‘sabhāparisāyā’ti ñāpakā, ādhipaccaparivāro, chandapārisuddhi, paṭisandhipavattiyaṃ.

saṅkhyā ādi

original: Ekatthe samāhāre saṅkhyādi napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, pañcagavaṃ, catuppathaṃ, samāhārassekattā ekavacanameva hoti, samāhāretveva pañcakāpālo pūvo, tiputto.
analyzed: ekatthe samāhāre saṅkhyā ādi napuṃsaka liṅgam bhavati pañcagavam catuppatham samāhārassa ikattā eka vacanam eva hoti samāhāretvā eva pañca kāpālaḥ pūvaḥ ti putto
kvacekattam ca chaṭṭhiyā

original: Chaṭṭhiyekatthe kvaci napuṃsakattaṃ hotekatthañca, salabhānaṃ chāyā salabhacchāyaṃ,
analyzed: chaṭṭhiyā ikatthe kvaci napuṃsaka attam hotā ikattham ca salabhānam chāyā salabha chāyam

original: evaṃ sakuntānaṃ chāyā sakuntacchāyaṃ, pāsādacchāyaṃ pāsādacchāyā, gharacchāyaṃ gharacchāyā,
analyzed: evam sakuntānam chāyā sakunta chāyam pāsāda chāyam pāsāda chāyā ghara chāyam ghara chāyā

original: amanussasabhāya napuṃsakekattaṃ bhavati brahmasabhaṃ, devasabhaṃ, indasabhaṃ, yakkhasabhaṃ,
analyzed: a manussa sabhāya napuṃsakekattam bhavati brahma sabham deva sabham inda sabham yakkha sabham

original: sarabhasabhaṃ, manussasabhāyaṃ pana khattiyasabhā, rājasabhā iccevamādi, kvacīti kiṃ rājapuriso.
analyzed: sarabha sabham manussa sabhāyam pana khattiya sabhā rāja sabhā icca evamādi kvaci iti kim rāja purisaḥ
sya ādīsu rassaḥ

original: Napuṃsake vattamānassa rasso hoti syādīsu. Salabhacchāyaṃ, syādīsūti kiṃ? Salabhacchāye.
analyzed: napuṃsake vattamānassa rassaḥ hoti syādīsu salabhacchāyam syādīsu iti kim salabhacchāye
gha passa antassa a ppadhānassa

original: Antabhūtassa appadhānassa ghapassa syādīsu rasso hoti. Bahumālo poso, nikkosambi, ativāmoru, antassāti kiṃ? Rājā kaññāpiyo, appadhānassāti kiṃ? Rājakumārī brahmabandhū.
analyzed: anta bhūtassa appadhānassa ghapassa sya ādīsu rassaḥ hoti bahu mālaḥ posaḥ nikkosambi ati vāma ūru antassa ati kim rājā kaññāpiyaḥ appadhānassa ati kim rāja kumārī brahmabandhū
gossu

original: Antabhūtassa appadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti. Cittagu, appadhānassātveva? Sugo, antassātveva? Gokulaṃ.
analyzed: anta bhūtassa appadhānassa gossa syādīsu u hoti cittagu sugo antaḥ sātvā eva go kulam
itthiyam atvā

original: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āpaccayo hoti. Dhammadinnā.
analyzed: itthiyam vattamānataḥ a kāra antataḥ nāmasmai ā paccayaḥ hoti dhamma dinnā
nad āditaḥ vī

original: Nadādīhi itthiyaṃ vīppaccayo hoti. Nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇī, vāruṇī, gotamī. (14) “Gotovā” gāvī go, ākatigaṇo-yaṃ, koro “ntantūnaṃ vīmhi to vā” (3-36) ti visesanattho.
analyzed: nada ādīhi itthiyam vīppaccayaḥ hoti nadī mahī kumārī taruṇī vāruṇī gotamī gotovā gāvī go ti visesana tthaḥ
yakkha āditinī ca

original: Yakkhādito itthiyaṃ inī hoti vīca. Yakkhinī yakkhī, nāginī nāgī, sīhinī sīhī.
analyzed: yakkha aditaḥ itthiyam inī hoti vīca yakkhinī yakkhī nāginī nāgī sīhinī sīhī
ārāmika ādīhi

original: Ārāmikādito inī hotitthiyaṃ. Ārāmikinī, anantarāyikinī, rājinī (15) “saññāyaṃ mānuso” mānusinī, aññatra mānusī.
analyzed: ārāmika āditas inī hotitthiyam ārāmikinī anantarāyikinī rājinī saññā ayam mānusaḥ mānusinī aññatra mānusī
yuvaṇṇehi nī

original: Itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sadāpayatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, khattabandhunī, paracittavidunī, mātuādito kasmā na hoti? Itthippaccayaṃ vināpi itthattābhidhānato.
analyzed: nī hoti bahulam daṇḍinī bhikkhunī khattabandhunī paracittavidunī mātu āditaḥ kasmā na hoti itthippaccayam vinā api itthattā abhidhānato
kti mha añ ña tthe

original: Ktimhāññattheyeva itthiyaṃ nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sāhaṃ ahiṃ sāratinī, tassā muṭṭhassatiniyā, sā gāvī vacchagiddhinī, aññattheti kiṃ? Dhammarati.
analyzed: ktimha aññatthā iya iva itthiyam nī hoti bahulam sā aham ahim sāratinī tassā muṭṭhassatiniyā sā gāvī vacchagiddhinī aññatthā iti kim dhammarati
gharaṇī ādayaḥ

original: Gharaṇippabhutayo nīppaccantāsādhavo bhavanti. Gharaṇī, pokkharaṇī, īssa-ttaṃ nipātanā, (16) “ācariyā vā ya-lopo ca” ācarinī, ācariyā.
analyzed: bhavanti gharaṇī pokkharaṇī īssattam nipātanā ācariyā vā ya lopaḥ ca ācarinī ācariyā
mātulāditvānī

original: Mātulādito bhariyāyamānī hoti. Mātulānī, vāruṇānī, gahapatānī, ācariyānī, (17) “abhariyāyaṃ khattiyā vā” khattiyānī khattiyā, nadādipāṭhā bhariyāyantu khattiyī.
analyzed: mātula āditaḥ bhariyāyamānī hoti mātulānī vāruṇānī gahapatānī ācariyānī a bhariyāyam khattiyā vā khattiyānī khattiyāḥ nada ādi pāṭhāḥ bhariyāyantu khattiyī

original: 34. Upamāsaṃhita sahita saññata saha saphavāma lakkhaṇāditūrutū.
analyzed: upamā saṃhita sahita saññata saha saphavāma lakkhaṇa āditūrutū

original: Ūrusaddā upamānādipubbā ittiyamū hoti. Karabhorū, saṃhitorū, sahitorū, saññatorū, sahorū, saphorū, vāmorū, lakkhaṇorū, ūtiyogavibhāgā ū brahmabandhū.
analyzed: ūru saddāḥ upamāna ādi pubbāḥ hoti karabha ūrū saṃhita ūrū sahita ūrū saññata ūrū sahorū saphorū vāma ūrū lakkhaṇa ūrū ūti yogavibhāgāḥ ū brahmabandhū
yuvā ti
ti hotitthiyam yuvati
nta ntūnam vīm hitaḥ vā

original: Vīmhi ntantūnaṃ to vā hoti. Gacchatī gacchantī, sīlavatī sīlavantī.
analyzed: to vā hoti gacchatī gacchantī sīlavatī sīlavantī
bhavataḥ bhoto

original: Vīmhi bhavato bhotādeso hoti vā. Bhotī bhavantī.

gossāvaṅa
go saddassa hoti gāvī

original: Vīmhi puthussa pathavaputhavā honti. Pathavī, puthavī, ṭhe pathavī.

iti ca adhikarīyati

original: Pāpādīhī parā yā bhūmi tassā samāsanto a hoti. Pāpabhūmaṃ, jātibhūmaṃ.
analyzed: parā yā bhūmi tassā hoti pāpa bhūmam jāti bhūmam
saṅkhyāhi

original: Saṅkhyāhi parā yā bhūmi tassā samāsanto a hoti. Dvibhūmaṃ, tibhūmaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhyā hi parā yā bhūmi tassā samāsantaḥ hoti dvi bhūmam ti bhūmam

original: Saṅkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadīgodāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti, pañcanadaṃ, sattagodāvaraṃ, saṅkhyāhitveva? Mahānadī, nadīgodāvarīnanti kiṃ? Dasitthi.
analyzed: saṅkhyāhi parāsam samāsantaḥ hoti pañca nadam satta godāvaram saṅkhyā hi iva mahā nadī kim

original: Asaṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parāya aṅgulyā samāsanto a hoti no ce aññapadatthe asaṅkhyatthe
analyzed: a saṅkhyehi saṅkhyāhi ca parāya aṅgulyā samāsantaḥ a hoti no ce añña padatthe a saṅkhyatthe

original: ca samāso vattate. Niggatamaṅgulīhi niraṅgulaṃ, accaṅgulaṃ, dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭā
analyzed: ca samāsaḥ vattate niggatam aṅgulīhi niraṅgulam accaṅgulam dve aṅguliyaḥ samāhaṭā

original: dvaṅgulaṃ, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Pañcaṅguli hattho, upaṅguli, kathaṃ ‘dve aṅgulīmānamassāti
analyzed: dvi aṅgulam anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu iti kim pañca aṅguli hatthaḥ upaṅguli katham dve aṅgulī mānam assa ati

original: dvaṅgula’nti? Nātra samāsoññapadatthe vihito mattādīnaṃ lope kate tattha vattate.
analyzed: na atra vihitaḥ matta ādīnam lope kate tattha vattate

original: Aṅgulasaddo vā pamāṇavāci saddantaraṃ, yathā ‘senaṅgulappamāṇena aṅgulānaṃ sataṃ

puṇṇam catuddasa vai aṅgulāni iti
dīgha aha vassa ika desehi ca rattyā

original: ahorattaṃ (tto), vassārattaṃ (tto), pubbarattaṃ, apararattaṃ, aḍḍhurattaṃ, atikkanto

original: Ete saddā aantā nipaccante. Ratto ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, dārā ca gāvo ca dāragavaṃ, catasso assiyo assa caturasso.
analyzed: ete saddāḥ a antāḥ nipaccante rattaḥ ca divā ca rattiṃdivam ratti ca divā ca rattiṃdivam dārā ca gāvaḥ ca dāragavam catassaḥ assiyaḥ assa caturassaḥ
āyāmenugavam

original: Anugavanti nipaccate āyāme gamyamāne. Anugavaṃ sakaṭaṃ, āyāmeti kiṃ? Gunnaṃ pañchā anugu.
analyzed: anugavanti nipaccate āyāme gamyamāne anugavam sakaṭam āyāma iti kim anugu

original: 49. Akkhismāññatthe. Akkhismā samāsanto a hoti aññatthe ce samādhasā. Visālakkho, visālakkhī.

original: Aṅgulantā aññapadatthe dārumhi samāsanto a hoti. Dvaṅgulaṃdāru, pañcaṅgulaṃ, aṅgulisadisāvayavaṃ
analyzed: aṅgula antā añña pada tthe dārumhi samāsa antaḥ hoti dvaṅgulam dāru pañcaṅgulam aṅguli sadisa avayavam

analyzed: dhañña ādīnam vikkhepakam dārum vuccate pamāṇe tu pubbe viya siddham sakha rāja saddā

original: akārantāva, sissopi na dissati, gāṇḍī vadhanvāti pakatantarena siddhaṃ.
analyzed: na dissati na dissati

original: Oghābyatihāre gamyamāne aññapadatthe vattamānato ci hoti. Kesākesi daṇḍādaṇḍi, cakāro “cismi”nti (3.66) visesanattho, sugandhi, duggantīti payogo na dissate.
analyzed: ogha abyatihāre gamyamāne añña padatthe vattamānataḥ ci hoti kesākesi daṇḍādaṇḍi cakāro cismin ti visesana atthaḥ sugandhi dugganti iti payogaḥ na dissate
l tu itthi yūhi kaḥ

original: Ltuppaccayantehi, itthiyamīkārūkārantehi ca bahulaṃ kappaccayo hoti aññapadatthe. Bahukattuko, bahukumāriko, bahubrahmabandhuko, bahulaṃtveva? Subbhū.
analyzed: ltup paccaya antehi itthiyamī kārūkāra antehi ca bahulam ka ppaccayaḥ hoti añña pada atthe bahu kattukaḥ bahu kumārikaḥ bahu brahmabandhukaḥ bahulam tu eva sup bhū
vā añ a taḥ

original: Aññehi aññapadatthe ko vā bahulaṃ hoti. Bahumālako, bahumālo.

uttara pade etam adhikatam veditabbam
imaḥ idam

original: Uttarapade parato imassa idaṃ hoti. Idamaṭṭhitā, idappaccayatā, niggahītalopo passa ca dvibhāvo.
analyzed: uttara pade paratas imassa idam hoti idamaṭṭhitā idappaccaya tā niggahīta lopaḥ passa ca dvi bhāvaḥ

original: 56. Puṃ pumassa vā. Pumassa puṃ hotuttarapade vibhāsā. Pulliṅgaṃ, pumaliṅgaṃ.

ṭan tan tu ūnam

original: 59. Manādyāpādīnamo maye ca. Manādīnamāpādīnaṃ ca o hotuttarapade maye ca. Manoseṭṭhā, manomayā, rajojallaṃ, rajomayaṃ, āpogataṃ, āpomayaṃ, anuyanti disodisaṃ.
analyzed: maye ca manādīnam āpādīnam ca o hotṛ uttara pade maye ca manoseṭṭhāḥ manaḥ mayāḥ rajaḥ jallam rajaḥ mayam āpaḥ gatam āpaḥ mayam anuyanti disaḥ disam
parassa saṅkhyāsu

original: Saṅkhyāsuttarapadesu parassa o hoti. Parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, saṅkhyāsūti kiṃ? Paradattūpajīvino.
analyzed: saṅkhyā su ttara padesu parassa o hoti parosatam parosahassam saṅkhyāsu iti kim para dattu upajīvinaḥ

original: Jane uttarapade puthassa u hoti. Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ janoti puthujjano.

original: Ahe āyatane cuttarapade chassa so vā hoti. Sāhaṃ chāhaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ.
analyzed: ahe āyatane c uttara pade chassa saḥ vā hoti sāham chāham saḷāyatanam chaḷāyatanam

original: Ltuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañca yathākkamamāraṅaraṅa vā hontuttarapade, satthāradassanaṃ, kattāraniddeso, mātarapitaro, vātveva? Satthudassanaṃ, mātāpitaro.

original: Ltupitādīnaṃ vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnaṃ ca tesveva ltupitādīsu vijjāyonisambandhisuttarapadesu

original: catthavisaye ā hoti. Hotāpotaro mātāpitaro, ltupitādīnaṃ tveva? Puttabhātaro, tatreti

original: Cippaccayante uttarapade ā hoti. Kesākesi, muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi.

analyzed: itthiyam vattamāne ekatthe samāna adhikaraṇe uttara pade pare bhāsita pumā itthī pumā eva

original: hoti. Kumārabhariyo, dīghajaṅgho, yuvajāyo, itthiyanti kiṃ? Kalyāṇī padhānamesaṃ

original: Bhāsitapumitthī paccaye kvaci pumeva moti. Byattatarā, byattatamā.

original: Itthivācakā sabbādayo vuttimatte pumeva honti. Tassā mukhaṃ tammukhaṃ, tassaṃ tatra, tāya tato, tassaṃ velāyaṃ tadā.

original: Patimhi pare jāyāya jayaṃ hoti, jayampatī, ‘jānipatī’ti pakatantarena siddhaṃ, tathā ‘dampatī, jampatī’ti.
