analyzed: uttara pade naña saddassa ṭa hoti a brāhmaṇaḥ ñakāraḥ kim kevalassa mā hotu pāmanaputto
ana sare

original: Sarādo uttarapade naña saddassa ana hoti. Anakkhātaṃ.
analyzed: sara ādaḥ uttara pade naña saddassa ana hoti an akkhātam
nakha ādayaḥ

original: Nakhādayo saddā anana ṭādesā nipaccante. Nāssa khamatthīti nakho, akhamaññaṃ, saññāsaddesu
analyzed: nakha ādayaḥ saddāḥ ananaḥ ṭādesāḥ nipaccante na assa kham atthi iti nakhaḥ akham aññam saññā saddesu

original: ca nipphattimattaṃ yathākathañci kattabbaṃnāssa kulamathīti nakulo, akulamaññaṃ,
analyzed: ca nipphattimattam yathā kathañci kattabbaṃna assa kulamathī iti nakulaḥ a kulamaññam
nakha nakula napuṃsaka nakkhatta nāka evamādi
nagaḥ vā ap pāṇini

original: Nagaiccappāṇini vā nipaccate. Nago rukkho, nago pabbato, ago rukkho, ago pabbato, appāṇinīti kiṃ? Ago vasalo sītena.
analyzed: vā nipaccate nagaḥ rukkhaḥ nagaḥ pabbataḥ agaḥ rukkhaḥ agaḥ pabbataḥ appāṇinī iti kim agaḥ vasalaḥ sītena
sahassa soññatthe

original: Aññapadatthavutthimhi samāse uttarapade pare sahassa so vā hoti. Saputto, sahaputto, aññattheti kiṃ? Saha katvā, saha yujjhitvā.
analyzed: añña pada attha vutthimhi samāse uttara pade pare sahassa saḥ vā hoti sa putto saha putto aññattha iti kim saha katvā saha yujjhitvā
saññāyam

original: Sahassuttarapade so hoti saññāyaṃ. Sāssatthaṃ, sapalāsaṃ.
analyzed: sahassa uttara pade saḥ hoti saññāyam sa assattham sa palāsam
a paccakkhe

original: Appaccakkhe gamyamāne sahassa so hotuttarapade, sāggi kapoto, sapisācā vātamaṇḍalikā.
analyzed: appaccakkhe gamyamāne sahassa so hotu uttara pade sa aggi kapoto sa pisācā vātamaṇḍalikā
a kāle sa katthe

original: Sakatthappadhānassa sahasaddassa akāle uttarapade so hoti. Sampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ, sacakkaṃ nidhehi, sadhuraṃ pājehi, akāleti kiṃ? Saha pubbaṇhaṃ, sahāparaṇhaṃ.
analyzed: sa ka attha ppadhānassa saha saddassa a kāle uttara pade saḥ hoti sampannam brahmam sa brahmam sa cakkam nidhehi sa dhuram pājehi akāle iti kim saha pubbaṇham saha aparaṇham
ganthanta ādhikye

original: Ganthante ādhikye ca vattamānassa sahassa so hotuttarapade. Sakalaṃ jotimadhīte samuhuttaṃ, kālattho ārambho, ādhikye-sadoṇā khārī, samāsako kahāpaṇo, niccatthoyamārambho.
analyzed: ādhikye ca vattamānassa sahassa saḥ hotā uttara pade sakalam jotim adhīte sa muhuttam kālatthaḥ ārambhaḥ khārī samāsakaḥ kahāpaṇaḥ niccatthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
samānassa pakkha ādīsu vā

original: Pakkhādīsuttarapadesu samānassa so hoti vā. Sapakkho samānapakkho, sajoti samānajoti,
analyzed: pakkha ādīsu uttara padesu samānassa saḥ hoti vā sa pakkhaḥ samāna pakkhaḥ sajoti samāna joti

original: pakkhādīsūti kiṃ? Samānasīlo, pakkha, joti, janapada, ratti, pattinī, pattī, nābhi,
analyzed: pakkha ādīsu iti kim

original: bandhu brahmacārī, nāma, gotta, rūpa, ṭhāna, vaṇṇa, vayo, vacana, dhamma, jātiya, ghacca.
analyzed: bandhu brahmacārī nāma gotta rūpa ṭhāna vaṇṇa vayaḥ vacana dhamma jātiya ghacca
udare iye

original: Udare iye pare parato samānassa so vā hoti. Sodariyo, samānodariyo, iyeti kiṃ? Samānodaratā.
analyzed: udare iye pare paratas samānassa saḥ vā hoti sodariyaḥ samāna udariyaḥ iyā iti kim samāna udara tā
rīrikkhakesu

original: Etesu samānassa so hoti. Sarī, sarikkho, sariso.
analyzed: etesu samānassa saḥ hoti sarī sarikkhaḥ sarisaḥ
sap ba ādīn amā

original: Rīrikkhakesu sabbādīnamā hoti. Yādī, yādikkho, yādiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu sabba ādi namā hoti yādī yādikkhaḥ yādisaḥ
nta kim imānam ṭākīṭī

original: Rīrikkhakesu ntasadda kiṃsadda imasaddānaṃ ṭākīṭī honti yathākkamaṃ. Bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso, kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso, īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu nta sadda kiṃsadda ima saddānam ṭā kīṭī honti yathākkamam bhavādī bhavādikkhaḥ bhavādiso kīdī kīdikkhaḥ kīdisaḥ īdī īdikkhaḥ īdisaḥ
tumha amhānam tām ekasmin

original: Rīrikkhakesu tumhāmhānaṃ tāmā hontekasmiṃ yathākkamaṃ. Tādī, tādikkho, tādiso, mādī, mādikkho, mādiso. Ekasminti kiṃ? Tumhādī, amhādī, tumhādikkho, amhādikkho, tumhādiso, amhādiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu tumha amhānam tāmāḥ honti ekasmin yathākkamam tādī tādikkhaḥ tādisaḥ mādī mādikkhaḥ mādisaḥ ekasmin ti kim tumhādī amhādī tumhādikkhaḥ amhādikkhaḥ tumhādisaḥ amhādisaḥ
tam mamaññatra

original: Rīrikkhakantato aññasmiṃ uttarapade tumhāmhānamekasmiṃ taṃmaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ, tandīpā, mandīpā, taṃsaraṇā, maṃsaraṇā, tayyogo, mayyogoti bindulopo.
analyzed: rīrikkha kantataḥ aññasmin uttara pade tumha amhānam ekasmin taṃ maṃ honti yathākkamam tandīpā mandīpā taṃsaraṇā maṃsaraṇā bindu lopaḥ
vā itas seṭa

original: Rīrikkhakesvetasseṭa vā hoti, edī, etādī, edikkho, etādikkho, ediso, etādiso.
analyzed: vā hoti edī etādī edikkhaḥ etādikkhaḥ edisaḥ etādisaḥ
vidha ādīsu dvis sa du

original: Dvissa du hoti vidhādīsu, duvidho, dupaṭṭaṃ evamādi.
analyzed: dvissa du hoti vidha ādīsu duvidhaḥ du paṭṭam evamādi
di guṇa ādīsu

original: Guṇādīsu dvissa di hoti, dviguṇaṃ, diratti, digu evamādi.
analyzed: guṇa ādīsu dvis sa di hoti dviguṇam evamādi
tīsva
tīsu dvissa ahoti dvatti kkhattum
ā saṅkhyā yāsa tāda ūnañña tthe

original: Saṅkhyāyamuttarapade dvissa ā hoti asatādo anaññadhattha. Dvādasa, dvāvīsati dvattiṃsa, saṅkhyāyanti kiṃ? Dirattaṃ, asatādoti kiṃ? Disataṃ, disahassaṃ. Anaññattheti kiṃ? Dvidasā.
analyzed: saṅkhyāyam uttara pade ā hoti anaññadhattha dvādasa dvāvīsati dvattiṃsa saṅkhyāyanti kim di rattam asatādo iti kim di satam di sahassam anaññattha iti kim dvidasā
tisse

original: Saṅkhyāyamuttarapade tissa e hoti asatādo anaññatthe, terasa, tevīsa, tettiṃsa, saṅkhyāyaṃtveva? Tirattaṃ, asatādotveva? Tisataṃ, anaññatthetveva? Ticatukā.
analyzed: saṅkhyāyam uttara pade tissaḥ e hoti asata adaḥ anaññatthe terasa tevīsa tettiṃsa saṅkhyāyam tu eva tirattam asata adaḥ tu eva tisatam anaññatthe tu eva ticatukā
cattālīsādaḥ vā

original: Tisse vā hoti cattālīsādo, tecattālāsaṃ ticattālīsaṃ, tepaññāsaṃ tipaññāsaṃ, tesaṭṭhi tisaṭṭhi, tesattati tisattati, teasīti tiyāsīti, tenavuti tinavuti, asatādotveva? Tisataṃ.
analyzed: tisse vā hoti cattālīsa ado te cattālāsam ticattālīsam te paññāsam tipaññāsam te saṭṭhi tisaṭṭhi te sattati ti sattati te asīti tiyāsīti tenavuti tinavuti asata ādo tu eva tisatam
dvissā ca

original: Asatādo-naññatthe cattālīsādo dvisse vā hoti ā ca. Dvecattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ dvicattālīsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvāpaññāsaṃ dvipaññāsaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: a sata āda onaññatthe cattālīsa ādaḥ dvisse vā hoti ā ca dve cattālīsam dvā cattālīsam dvi cattālīsam dve paññāsam dvāpaññāsam dvipaññāsam iccādi
bācat tālīsādaḥ

original: Dvissa bā vā hoti acattālīsādo-naññatthe. Bārasa dvādasa, bāvīsati dvāvīsati, battiṃsa dvattiṃsa, acattālīsādoti kiṃ? Dvicattālīsaṃ.
analyzed: dvissa bā vā hoti bārasa dvādasa bāvīsati dvāvīsati battiṃsa dvattiṃsa kim dvicattālīsam
vīsatidasesu pañcassa paṇṇa pannā

original: Vīsatidasesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇapannā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Paṇṇavīsati pañcavīsati, pannarasva pañcadasa.
analyzed: vīsatidasesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇa pannāḥ honti vā yathākkamam paṇṇa vīsati pañcavīsati pañcadasa
catuḥ sa cucaḥ dase

original: Catussa cuco honti vā dasasadde pare. Cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa.
analyzed: catussa cucaḥ honti vā dasa sadde pare cuddasa coddasa catuddasa
chassa saḥ

original: Chassa soiccayamādeso hoti dasasadde pare. Soḷasa.
analyzed: chassa saḥ i t ca yam ādesaḥ hoti dasa sadde pare soḷasa
ekaṭṭhānamā

original: Ekaaṭṭhānaṃ ā hoti dase pare. Ekādasa, aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: ekaaṭṭhānam ā hoti dase pare ekādasa aṭṭhārasa
ra saṅkhyātaḥ vā

original: Saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ra hoti vibhāsā. Ekārasa ekādasa, bārasa dvādasa, pannarasa
analyzed: saṅkhyātaḥ parassa dasassa ra hoti vibhāsā ekārasa ekādasa bārasa dvādasa pannarasa

original: pañcadasa, sattarasa sattadasa, aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhādasa, pannabādesesu niccaṃ, idha na hoti catuddasa.
analyzed: pañcadasa sattarasa sattadasa aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhādasa pannabā desesu niccam idha na hoti catuddasa
chatīhi ḷo ca

original: Chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷo hoti ro ca, soḷasa sorasa, teḷasa terasa.
analyzed: chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷaḥ hoti raḥ ca soḷasa sorasa teḷasa terasa
catuttha

original: Aḍḍhā paresaṃ catutthatatiyānaṃ uḍḍhatiyā honti yathākkamaṃ. Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo, kathaṃ aḍḍhateyyoti? Sakatthe ṇye uttarapadavuḍḍhi.
analyzed: aḍḍhā paresam catuttha tatiyānam uḍḍhatiyāḥ honti yathākkamam aḍḍhena catutthaḥ aḍḍhuḍḍhaḥ aḍḍhena tatiyaḥ aḍḍhatiyaḥ katham aḍḍhateyyaḥ iti sa katthe ṇye uttara pada vuḍḍhi
dutiyassa saha diyaḍḍha divaḍḍhā

original: Aḍḍhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍhasaddena diyaḍḍhadivaḍḍhā honti. Aḍḍhena dutiyo diyaḍḍho, divaḍḍho vā.
analyzed: aḍḍhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍha saddena diyaḍḍha divaḍḍhāḥ honti aḍḍhena dutiyaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ divaḍḍhaḥ vā
sare kada kus su ttara tthe

original: Kussuttarapadatthe vattamānassa sarādo uttarapade kadādeso hoti. Kadannaṃ, kadasanaṃ, sareti kiṃ? Kuputto, uttarattheti kiṃ? Kuoḍḍho rājā.
analyzed: kussu ttara pada atthe vattamānassa sara ādaḥ uttara pade kad ādesaḥ hoti kadannam kadasanam sara iti kim ku puttaḥ uttaratthā iti kim ku uḍḍhaḥ rājā
kāppatthe

original: Appatthe vattamānassa kussa kā hoti uttarapadatthe, appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ.
analyzed: appatthe vattamānassa kussa kā hoti uttara pada tthe appakam lavaṇam kālavaṇam
purise vā

original: Kussa purise kā hoti vā. Kāpuriso kupuriso, ayamappattavibhāsā, appatthe tu pubbena niccaṃ hoti īsaṃ puriso kāpuriso.
analyzed: kussa purise kā hoti vā kāpurisaḥ kupurisaḥ ayam appatta vibhāsā appatthe tu pubbena niccam hoti īsam purisaḥ kāpurisaḥ
pubba aparajja sāya majjha iha ahassa ṇhaḥ

original: Pubbādīhuttarapadassa ahassa ṇhādeso hoti, pubbaṇho, aparaṇho, ajjaṇho, sāyaṇho, majjhaṇho (paṇho).
analyzed: pubba ādi ih uttara padassa ahassa ṇha ādesaḥ hoti pubbaṇhaḥ aparaṇhaḥ ajjaṇhaḥ sāyaṇhaḥ majjhaṇhaḥ paṇhaḥ
iti moggallāne byākaraṇe vuttiyam
samāsa kaṇḍaḥ tatiyaḥ
catutthaḥ kaṇḍaḥ ṇa ādi
ṇaḥ vā pacce

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vā ṇappaccayo hoti apacce-bhidheyye, ṇakāro vuddhyattho, evamaññattāpi,
analyzed: cha ṭṭhi yantā nāmasmā vā ṇa p paccayaḥ hoti a pacca ibhidheyye ṇakāraḥ vuddhi atthaḥ evam aññattā api

original: vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho, vāsiṭṭhī vā, opagavo, opagavī vā, veti vākyasamāsavikappanatthaṃ,
analyzed: vasiṭṭhassa apaccam vāsiṭṭhaḥ vāsiṭṭhī vā opagavaḥ opagavī vā vā iti vākya samāsa vikappana attham
tassa adhikāraḥ sa katthā avadhi
vacchāditaḥ

original: Vacchādīhi apaccappaccayantehi gottādīhi ca saddehi ṇānaṇāyanappaccayā vā honti apacce,
analyzed: vaccha ādīhi a pacca ppaccaya antehi gotta ādīhi ca saddehi vā honti a pacce

original: vacchāno vacchāyano, kaccāno kaccāyano, yāgame kātiyāno, moggallāno moggallāyano,
analyzed: vacchānaḥ vacchāyano kaccāno kaccāyanaḥ yāgame kātiyānaḥ moggallānaḥ moggallāyanaḥ
sākaṭānaḥ sākaṭāyanaḥ kaṇhānaḥ kaṇhāyanaḥ iccādi
kattikā vidhavā ādīhi ṇeyya ṇerā

original: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṃ honti apacce, kattikeyyo, venateyyo, bhāgineyyo iccādi, vedhavero, bandhakero, nālikero, sāmaṇero iccādi.
analyzed: kattikā ādīhi vidhavā ādīhi ca ṇeyya ṇerāḥ vā yathākkamam honti apacce kattikeyyaḥ venateyyaḥ bhāgineyyaḥ iccādi vedhaveraḥ bandhakeraḥ nālikeraḥ sāmaṇeraḥ iccādi
ṇi ad it ca ādīhi

original: Ditippabhutihi ṇyo vā hoti apacce, decco, ādicco, koṇḍañño, gaggyo, bhātabbo iccādi.
analyzed: diti ppa bhutihi ṇyaḥ vā hoti a pacce deccaḥ ādiccaḥ koṇḍaññaḥ gaggyaḥ bhātabbaḥ icca ādi
ā ṇi

original: Akārantato ṇi vā hoti apacce, dakkhi, datthi, doṇi. Vāsavi, vāruṇi iccādi.
analyzed: a kāra antataḥ ṇi vā hoti a pacce dakkhi datthi doṇi vāsavi vāruṇi icca ādi
rājataḥ ññaḥ jātiyam

original: Rājasaddato ñño vā hoti apacce jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ, rājañño, jātiyanti kiṃ? Rājāpaccaṃ.
analyzed: rāja saddataḥ ññaḥ vā hoti apacce jātiyam gamyamānā iyam rājaññaḥ jātiyanti kim rājāpaccam
khattā yiyā

original: Khattasaddā yaiyā honti apacce jātiyaṃ, khatyo, khattiyo, jātiyaṃtveva? Khatti.
analyzed: khatta saddāḥ yaiyāḥ honti apacce jātiyam khatyaḥ khattiyaḥ jātiyam tu eva khatti
manutaḥ ssasaṇa

original: Manusaddato jātiyaṃ ssasaṇa honti apacce, manusso, mānuso, itthiyaṃ manussā, mānusī, jātiyaṃtveva? Mānavo.
analyzed: manu saddataḥ jātiyam honti apacce manussaḥ mānusaḥ itthiyam manussā mānusī jātiyam tu eva mānavaḥ
janapada nāmasmā khattiyāḥ raññe ca ṇo

original: Janapadassa yaṃ nāmaṃ, tannāmasmā khattiyā apacce raññe ca ṇo hoti, pañcālo, kosalo,
analyzed: janapadassa yam nāmam tad nāmasma khattiyāḥ apacce raññe ca no hoti pañcālaḥ kosalo

original: māgadho, okkāko, janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ? Dāsarathi, khattiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccaṃ pañcāli.
analyzed: māgadhaḥ okkākaḥ janapada nāmasma ati kim dāsarathi khattiyā ati kim pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccam pañcāli
ṇya kurusivīhi

original: Kurusivīhi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti. Korabyo, sebyo.
analyzed: kuru sivīhi a pacce raññe ca ṇyaḥ hoti korabyo sebyo
ṇa rāgā tena rattam

original: Rāgavācitatiyantato rattamicchetasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti, kasāvena rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ, kosumbhaṃ,
analyzed: rattam iccha itasmin atthe no hoti kasāvena rattam kāsāvam kosumbham

original: yāliddaṃ, rāgāti kiṃ? Devadattena rattaṃ vatthaṃ, idha kasmā na hoti? ‘Nīlaṃ pīta’nti,
analyzed: kim devadattena rattam vattham idha kasmai na hoti nīlam pītanti
guṇavacana ttā vinā api ṇena ṇa tthassa abhidhānataḥ
nakkhattena indu yuttena kāle

original: Tatiyantato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇo hoti, tañce nakkhattaminduyuttaṃ hoti,
analyzed: tatiya ntatas nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle no hoti tat ce nakkhattam indu yuttam hoti

original: phussī ratti, phussaṃ ahaṃ, nakkhatteneti kiṃ? Gurunā lakkhitā ratti. Induyutteneti
analyzed: phussī ratti phussam aham nakkhattena iti kim gurunā lakkhitā ratti indu yuttena iti

original: kiṃ? Katthikāya lakkhito muhutto, kāleti kiṃ? Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhi, ajjakattikāti
analyzed: kim katthikāya lakkhitaḥ muhuttaḥ kāle ti kim phussena lakkhitā attha siddhi ajjakattikā ti
kattikā yutte cande kattikā saddaḥ vattate
sā assa devatā puṇṇamāsī

original: Seti paṭhamantā assāti chaṭṭhyatthe ṇo bhavati, yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ, sā ce devatā puṇṇamāsīvā,
analyzed: sā iti paṭhama antā assa ati chaṭṭhī atthe ṇaḥ bhavati yam paṭhama antam sā ce devatā

original: sugato devatā assābhi sogato, māhindo, yāmo, vāruṇo, phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti
analyzed: sugataḥ devatāḥ assa abhi sogataḥ māhindaḥ yāmaḥ vāruṇaḥ phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinī iti

original: phusso, māso, māyo, phagguno, citto, vesākho. Jeṭṭhamūlo, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo,
analyzed: phussaḥ māsaḥ māyo phagguno cittaḥ vesākhaḥ jeṭṭhamūlaḥ āsaḷhaḥ sāvaṇaḥ poṭṭhapādo

original: assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro, puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī pañcamī assa, puṇṇamāsī ca bhatakamāsasambandhinī
analyzed: assayujaḥ kattikaḥ māgasiraḥ puṇṇamāsī iti kim phussī pañcamī assa puṇṇamāsī ca bhataka māsa sambandhinī

original: na hoti… puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanā, ato eva nipātanā ṇo sāgamo ca, māsasutiyāva
analyzed: na hoti puṇṇaḥ mā assanti nibbacanāḥ atas eva nipātanā ṇo sa āgamaḥ ca māsa sutiyā ava
na pañcadasa
tam adhīte tam jānāti kaṇikā ca

original: Dutiyantato tamadhīte taṃ jānātīti etesvatthesu ṇo hoti ṇo ṇiko ca, byākaraṇamadhīte
analyzed: tam adhīte tam jānāti iti etesu atthesu no hoti ca byākaraṇam adhīte

original: jānāti vā veyyākaraṇo, chandaso, kamako, padako, venayiko, suttantiko, dvitaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: jānāti vā veyyākaraṇaḥ chandasaḥ kamakaḥ padakaḥ venayikaḥ suttantikaḥ dvita ggahaṇam

original: puthageva vidhānatthaṃ jānanassa ca ajjhenavisayabhāvadassanatthaṃ pasiddhūpasaṅgahatthaṃ ca.
analyzed: puthak eva vidhāna attham jānanassa ca ajjhena visaya bhāva dassana attham pasiddhu upasaṅgaha ttham ca
tassa visaye dese

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā visaye desarūpe ṇo hoti, vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto, deseti kiṃ? Cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ, devadattassa visayo-nuvāko.
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ visaye desa rūpe ṇo hoti vasātīnam visayaḥ desaḥ vāsātaḥ deseti kim cakkhussa visayaḥ rūpam devadattassa visayaḥ anuvākaḥ
nivāse tad nāme

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā nivāse dese tannāme ṇo hoti, sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebyo, vāsāto.
analyzed: nivāse dese tad nāme ṇo hoti sivīnam nivāsaḥ desaḥ sebyaḥ vāsātaḥ
a dūra bhave

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā adūrabhave dese tannāme ṇo hoti, vidisāya adūrabhavaṃ vedisaṃ.
analyzed: adūra bhave dese tad nāme no hoti vidisāya adūra bhavam vedisam
tena nibbatte

original: Tatiyantā nibbatte dese tannāme ṇo hoti, kusambena nibbattā kosambhī nagarī, kākandī, mākandī, sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parīkhā, hotumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
analyzed: tatiya antā nibbatte dese tad nāme ṇo hoti kusambena nibbattā kosambhī nagarī kākandī mākandī sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parīkhā hotumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogam tatiyā
tam īdhatthi

original: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti, yantaṃ paṭhamantamatthi ce, udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, bādaro, babbajo.
analyzed: paṭhama antāḥ idha ati sattamī atthe dese tad nāme ṇaḥ hoti ya ntam paṭhama antam atthi ce udumbarāḥ asmin dese santi iti odumbaraḥ bādaraḥ babbajaḥ
tatra bhave

original: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇo hoti, udake bhavo odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho, kāpilavatthavo, kosambo.
analyzed: sattamī antāḥ bhavatthe ṇo hoti udake bhavaḥ odakaḥ orasaḥ jānapadaḥ māgadhaḥ kāpilavatthavaḥ kosambaḥ
ajja ādīhi tano

original: Bhavatthe ajjādīhi tano hoti, ajja bhavo ajjatano, svātano, hiyyattano.
analyzed: bhavatthe ajja ādīhi tanaḥ hoti ajja bhavaḥ ajjatano svātano hiyyattano
purā a taḥ ṇaḥ ca

original: Purāiccasmā bhavatthe ṇo hoti tano ca, purāṇo, purātano.
analyzed: bhavatthe ṇaḥ hoti tano ca purāṇaḥ purātanaḥ
amātvat caḥ
a mā saddataḥ accaḥ hoti bhavatthe amaccaḥ
majjha ādi tvimaḥ

original: Majjhādīhi sattamyantehi bhavatte imo hoti, majjhimo, antimo. Majjha, anta, heṭṭhā, upari, ora, pāra, pacchā, abbhantara, paccanta (puratthā, bāhira).
analyzed: majjha ādīhi sattamī antehi bhavatte imaḥ hoti majjhimaḥ antimaḥ majjha anta heṭṭhā upari ora pāra pacchā abbhantara paccanta puratthā bāhira
kaṇa ṇeyya ṇeyya kayiyā

original: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bhavatthe, kaṇa-kusinā rāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, māgadhako,
analyzed: sattamī antāḥ ete paccayāḥ honti bhavatthe kaṇakusināḥ rāyam bhavaḥ kosinārakaḥ māgadhakaḥ

original: āraññako vihāro. Ṇeyya-gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vāneyyo. Ṇeyyaka-koleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako,
analyzed: āraññakaḥ vihāraḥ ṇeyyagaṅgeyyaḥ pabbateyyaḥ vāneyyaḥ ṇeyyaka koleyyakaḥ bārāṇaseyyakaḥ

original: campeyyako, mithileyyakoti eyyako. Ya-gammo, dibbo. Iyagāmiyo, udari-yo, diviyo,
analyzed: campeyyakaḥ mithileyyakaḥ iti eyyakaḥ yagammaḥ dibbaḥ iyagāmiyaḥ udariyaḥ diviyaḥ
pañcāliyaḥ bodhi pakkhiyaḥ lokiyaḥ
ṇ ikaḥ

original: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti, sāradiko divaso, sāradikā ratti.
analyzed: sattamī antāḥ bhavatthe ṇikaḥ hoti sāradikaḥ divasaḥ sāradikā ratti

original: 27. Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ.
analyzed: tamassa sippam sīlam paṇyam paharaṇam payojanam

original: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā assetichaṭṭhiyattheṇiko hoti, vīṇāvādanaṃ sippamassa veṇiko,
analyzed: paṭhama antā sippa ādi vācakā hoti vīṇā vādanam sippam assa veṇikaḥ

original: modaṅgiko, vaṃsiko, paṃsukū- ladhāraṇaṃ sīlamassa paṃsukūliko, tecīvarikeva, gandhopaṇyamassa
analyzed: modaṅgikaḥ vaṃsiko paṃsukū la dhāraṇam sīlam assa paṃsukūliko tecīvarikā iva gandhopaṇyam assa

original: gandhiko, teliko, goḷiko, cāpo paharaṇamassa cāpiko, tomariko, muggariko, upadhippayojanamassa
analyzed: gandhiko telikaḥ goḷikaḥ cāpaḥ paharaṇam assa cāpikaḥ tomarikaḥ muggarikaḥ upadhi payojanam assa
opadhikam sātikam sāhassikam
tam hantarahati carati

original: Dutiyantā hantīti evamādīsvatthesu ṇīko hoti. Pakkhīhipakkhino hantīti pakkhiko,
analyzed: dutiya antā hanti iti evamādīsu atthesu ṇīkaḥ hoti pakkhīhi pakkhinaḥ hanti iti pakkhiko

original: sākuniko, māyūriko. Macchehi-macchiko, meniko. Migehi-māgaviko hāriṇiko, ‘sūkariko’ti
analyzed: sākunikaḥ māyūrikaḥ macchehimacchikaḥ menikaḥ migehimāgavikaḥ hāriṇikaḥ sūkarikaḥ uti

original: iko. Satamarahatīti sātikaṃ, sandiṭṭhiko, ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko, sāhassiko,
analyzed: i kaḥ satam arahati iti sātikam sandiṭṭhikaḥ ehipassa vidhim arahati iti ehipassikaḥ sāhassikaḥ

original: ‘sahassiyo’ti iyo. Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, maggiko, paññāsayojaniko. Badare
analyzed: sahassiyaḥ ti iyo paradāram gacchati iti pāradārikaḥ maggiko paññāsayojanikaḥ badare

original: uñchatīti bādariko, sāmākiko. Dhammaṃ caratīti dhammiko, adhammiko.
analyzed: uñchati iti bādarikaḥ sāmākikaḥ dhammam carati iti dhammikaḥ adhammikaḥ

original: 29. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati.
analyzed: tena katam kītam baddham abhisaṅkhatam saṃsaṭṭham hatam hanti jitam jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati

original: Tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti. Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ, vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ,
analyzed: tatiya antā kata ādi su atthesu ṇikaḥ hoti kāyena katam kāyikam vācasikam mānasikam

original: vātena kato ābādho vātiko. Satena kītaṃ sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ, mūlatova, devadatena
analyzed: vātena kataḥ ābādhaḥ vātikaḥ satena kītam sātikam sāhassikam mūlataḥ uva devadatena

original: kītanti na hoti tadatthāppatītiyā. Varattāya baddho vārattiko, āyasiko, pāsiko. Ghatena
analyzed: na hoti varattāya baddhaḥ vārattikaḥ āyasikaḥ pāsikaḥ ghatena

original: abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ. Jālena hato hantīti
analyzed: abhisaṅkhatam saṃsaṭṭham vā ghātikam goḷikam dādhikam māricikam jālena hataḥ hanti iti

original: vā jāliko, bālīsiko. Akkhehi jitamakkhikaṃ, sālākikaṃ. Akkhehi jayati dibbatīti vā
analyzed: vā jālikaḥ bālīsikaḥ akkhehi jita makkhikam sālākikam akkhehi jayati dibbati iti vā

original: akkhiko. Khaṇittiyā khaṇatīti khāṇittiko, kuddāliko, devadattena jitaṃ, aṅgulyā khaṇatīti
analyzed: akkhikaḥ khaṇittiyā khaṇati iti khāṇittikaḥ kuddālikaḥ devadattena jitam aṅgulyā khaṇati iti

original: na hoti tadatthānavagamā. Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, ‘uḷumpiko’ti iko gopucchiko,
analyzed: na uḷumpena tarati iti oḷumpikaḥ uḷumpikaḥ iti i kaḥ gopucchiko

original: nāviko. Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko, ‘rathiko, parappiko’ti iko. Khandhena vahatīti
analyzed: nāvikaḥ sakaṭena carati iti sākaṭikaḥ rathiko parappiko ti khandhena vahati iti

original: khandhiko, aṃsiko, ‘sīsiko’ti iko. Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko, ‘bhatiko, kayiko,
analyzed: khandhikaḥ aṃsikaḥ sīsikaḥ iti vetanena jīvati iti vetanikaḥ kayikaḥ
vikkayikaḥ kayavikkayikaḥ ti i kaḥ
tassa saṃvattati

original: Catutthiyantā saṃvattatīti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti, punabbhavāya saṃvattatīti ponobhaviko,
analyzed: catutthiya antā saṃvattati iti asmin atthe ṇikaḥ hoti punabbhavāya saṃvattati iti ponobhavikaḥ

original: itthiyaṃ pono bhavikā, lokāya saṃvattatīti lokiko suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, saggāya saṃvattatīti
analyzed: itthiyam pono bhavikā lokāya saṃvattati iti lokiko suṭṭhu aggo ti saggo saggāya saṃvattati iti

original: sovaggiko, sassovaka tadaminādipāṭhā, dhanāya saṃvattatīti dhaññaṃ, yo.
analyzed: dhanāya saṃvattati iti dhaññam yaḥ
tatas sambhūtam āgatam

original: Pañcamyantā sambhūtamāgatanti etesvatthesu ṇiko hoti, mātiko sambhūtamāgataṃ vā mattikaṃ,
analyzed: pañcamī antā sambhūtam āgatam iti etesu atthesu hoti mātikaḥ sambhūtam āgatam vā mattikam

original: pettikaṃ, ṇyariyaṇa -yāpi dissanti, surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ, thanato sambhūtaṃ
analyzed: pettikam dissanti surabhitaḥ sambhūtam sorabhyam thanataḥ sambhūtam

original: thaññaṃ, pitito sambhūto pettiyo, mātiyo, mattiyo, macco vā.
analyzed: thaññam pititaḥ sambhūtaḥ pettiyaḥ mātiyaḥ mattiyaḥ maccaḥ vā
tattha vasati viditaḥ bhattaḥ niyuttaḥ

original: Sattamyantā tattha vasatītvevamādīsvatthesu ṇiko hoti. Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko,
analyzed: sattamī antā tattha vasati iti evamādīsu atthesu ṇikaḥ hoti rukkha mūle vasati iti rukkhamūliko

original: āraññiko, sosāniko. Loke vidito lokiko. Catumahārājesu bhattā cātummahārājikā. Dvāre
analyzed: āraññiko sosānikaḥ loke viditaḥ lokiko catu mahārājesu bhattā cātummahārājikāḥ dvāre

original: niyutto dovāriko dassoka tadaminādipāṭhā, bhaṇḍāgāriko, iko-navakammiko, kiyojātikiyo, andhakiyo.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ dovārikaḥ bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ kiyas jāti kiyaḥ andha kiyaḥ
tassidam

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti, saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ,
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ idam iccasmin atthe ṇikaḥ hoti saṅghassa idam saṅghikam puggalikam

original: sakyaputtiko, nātiputtiko, jenadattiko, kiye-sakiyo, parakiyo, niye-attaniyaṃ, ke-
analyzed: sakyaputtikaḥ nātiputtikaḥ jenadattikaḥ kiyesakiyaḥ parakiyaḥ ke
sakaḥ rājakam bhaṇḍam
ṇaḥ

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti, kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, sogataṃ sāsanaṃ, māhisaṃ maṃsādi.
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ idam iccasmin atthe ṇo hoti kaccāyanassa idam kaccāyanam byākaraṇam sogatam sa āsanam māhisam maṃsa ādi
go ādīhi yaḥ

original: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi idamiccasmiṃ atthe yo hoti, gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ maṃsādi, kabyaṃ, dabbaṃ.
analyzed: go ādīhi chaṭṭhi yantehi idam iccasmin atthe yaḥ hoti gunnam idam gabyam maṃsa ādi kabyam dabbam
pititaḥ bhātari reyyaṇa

original: Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa hoti, pitu bhātā petteyyo.
analyzed: pitusaddā tassa bhātari hoti pitu bhātā petteyyaḥ
mātitaḥ ca bhaginiyam chaḥ

original: Mātito pitito ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti, mātu bhaginī mātucchā, pitu bhaginī pitucchā, kathaṃ ‘mātulo’ti “mātulāditvānī”ti nipātanā.
analyzed: mātitaḥ pititaḥ ca tesam bhaginiyam chaḥ hoti mātu bhaginī mātucchā pitu bhaginī pitucchā katham mātula uti mātula ādi tvāni iti nipātanā
mātā pitūsvāmaho

original: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitūsu āmaho hoti, mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho, pitu mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ, paccekābhi sambandhā.
analyzed: tesam mātā pitūsu āmahaḥ hoti mātu mātā mātāmahī mātu pitā mātāmahaḥ pitu mātā pitāmahī pitu pitā pitāmahaḥ na yathāsaṅkhyam pacceka abhi sambandhā
hite reyyaṇa

original: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti, matteyyo, petteyyo.
analyzed: mātā pitūhi hite hoti matteyyaḥ petteyyaḥ
nindā aññā tappa paṭibhāga rassa dayā saññāsu ko

original: Nindādīsvattheyu nāmasmā ko hoti, nindāyaṃ-muṇḍako, samaṇako. Aññāte-kassāyaṃ assoti
analyzed: nindā ādīsu attheyu nāmasmai kaḥ hoti samaṇakaḥ aññāta ikassa ayam
assakaḥ payoga sāmatthiyā sambandhi visesa an avagamaḥ uvagamyate

original: Paṭibhāgatthe-hatthī viya hatthiko, assako, balībaddako. Rasse-mānusako, rukkhako,
analyzed: paṭibhāga atthe hatthī viya hatthikaḥ assakaḥ balībaddakaḥ rassemānusakaḥ rukkhako

original: pilakkhako. Dayāyaṃ-puttako, vacchako. Saññāyaṃ-moro viya morako.
analyzed: pilakkhakaḥ dayāyaṃputtakaḥ vacchako saññāyaṃmoraḥ viya morako
tamaḥ sa parimāṇam ṇikaḥ ca

original: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: paṭhama antāḥ assa iti asmin atthe ṇ ikaḥ hoti kaḥ ca paṭhama antam parimāṇam bhavati

original: parimīyate neneti parimāṇaṃ, doṇo parimāṇamassa doṇiko vīhi, khārasatiko, khārasahassiko
analyzed: parimīyate nena iti parimāṇam doṇo parimāṇam assa doṇikaḥ vīhi khāra satikaḥ khāra sahassikaḥ

original: āsītiko vayo, upaḍḍhakāyikaṃ bimbohanaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ.
analyzed: āsītikaḥ vayaḥ upaḍḍhakāyikam bimbohanam pañcakam chakkam
yat etehi ttako

original: Yādīhi paṭhamantehī asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ttako hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati, yaṃ parimāṇamassa yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ, āvatake yāvatako, tāvatako (etāvatako).
analyzed: ya ādīhi paṭhama antehi assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe hoti paṭhama antam parimāṇam bhavati yam parimāṇam assa yattakam tattakam ettakam āvatake yāvatako tāvatako etāvatako
sabbā ca avantu

original: Sabbato paṭhamantehi yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe āvantu hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati. Sabbaṃ parimāṇamassa sabbāvantaṃ, yāvantaṃ, tāvantaṃ, etāvantaṃ.
analyzed: sabbatas paṭhama antehi ya ādīhi ca assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe hoti tat ce paṭhamantam parimāṇam bhavati sabbam parimāṇam assa sabbāvantam yāvantam tāvantam etāvantam
kimhā

original: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ratirīvarīvatakarittakā honti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ
analyzed: kimhā paṭhama antāḥ assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe rati rīva rīvataka rittakāḥ honti tat ce paṭhama ntam

original: parimāṇaṃ bhavati, kiṃ saṅkhyānaṃ parimāṇamesaṃ kati ete, kīva, kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ.
analyzed: parimāṇam bhavati kim saṅkhyānam parimāṇam esam kati ete kīva kīvatakam kittakam
rīvantaḥ sabhāvataḥ asaṅkhyo
sañjātam

original: Tārakādīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ito hoti, te ce sañjātā honti, tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṃ gaganaṃ, pupphito rukkho, pallavitā latā.
analyzed: tārakā ādīhi paṭhama antehi assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe itas hoti te ce sañjātāḥ honti tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitam gaganam pupphitaḥ rukkho pallavitā latā
māne matto

original: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃatthe matto hoti, palaṃ ummānamassa palamattaṃ,
analyzed: paṭhama antā māna vuttitaḥ assa iti asmin atthe mattaḥ hoti palam ummānam assa pala mattam

original: hattho pamāṇamassa hatthamattaṃ sataṃ mānamassa satamattaṃ, doṇo parimāṇamassa doṇamattaṃ,
analyzed: hatthaḥ pamāṇam assa hattha mattam satam mānam assa sata mattam doṇaḥ parimāṇam assa doṇa mattam
abheda upacārāḥ hoti
taggha u cuddham

original: Uddhamānavuttiho asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe taggho hoti matto ca, jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
analyzed: assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe tagghaḥ hoti mattaḥ ca jaṇṇutaggham jaṇṇumattam
ṇaḥ ca purisā

original: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito ṇo hoti mattādayo ca, porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ, purisatagghaṃ.
analyzed: purisā paṭhama antāḥ uddha māna vuttitaḥ ṇo hoti matta ādayaḥ ca porisam purisa mattam purisa taggham
a yūbha dvitīya haṃse

original: Ubhadvitīhi avayavavuttīti paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ayo hoti. Ubho aṃsā assa ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
analyzed: ubha dvitīhi avayava vuttī iti paṭhama antehi assa iti chaṭṭhiya tthe ayaḥ hoti ubho aṃsā assa ubhayam dvayam tayam
saṅkhyāya sat cuti isa asat asantāya adhikā asmin sava sahasse ḍaḥ

original: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti
analyzed: satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṅkhyāya paṭhama antāya asmin ti

original: sattamyatthe ḍo hoti, sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti, yadasminti tañce sataṃ sahassaṃ
analyzed: sattamī atthe ḍaḥ hoti sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti yat asmin ti tat ce satam sahassam

original: satasahassaṃ vā hoti, vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sateti vīsaṃ sataṃ, ekavīsaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ,

analyzed: ī sukhī dukkhī sikhā ādīhi vā sikhī sikhāvā mālī mālāvā sīlī sīlavā

original: balī, balavā. (38) “Balā bāhūrupubbā ca”, bāhubalī, ūrubalī.
analyzed: balī balavā balā ca bāhu balī ūru balī

original: 81. Tapādīhi ssī. Tapādito mantvatthe vā ssī hoti. Tapassī, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī. Vātveva? Yasavā.
analyzed: tapa ādīhi ssī tapa ādeḥ mantu atthe vā ssī hoti tapassī yasassī tejassī manassī payassī vā atvā iva yasavā

original: 82. Mukhādito ro. Mukhādīhi mantvatthero hoti. Mukharo, susiro, ūsaro, madhuro, kharo, kuñjaro, nagaraṃ, (39) “dantassu ca unnabhadante”, danturo.
analyzed: mukha āditaḥ raḥ mukha ādīhi mantu attheraḥ hoti mukharaḥ susiraḥ ūsaraḥ madhuraḥ kharaḥ kuñjaraḥ nagaram dantassu ca unnabha dante danturaḥ
tundī ādīhi bho

original: Tundiādīhi mantvatthe bho vā hoti. Tundibho, vaṭibho, valibho. Vātveva? Tundimā.
analyzed: tundi ādīhi mantu atthe bho vā hoti tundibhaḥ vaṭibhaḥ valibhaḥ vā atvā iva tundimā
saddhā t itvā

original: Saddhādīhi mantvatthea hoti vā. Saddho, pañño, itthiyaṃ saddhā. Vātveva? Paññavā.
analyzed: saddhā ādīhi hoti vā saddhaḥ paññaḥ itthiyam saddhā vā iva paññavā
ṇaḥ tapā

original: Tapā ṇo hoti mantvatthe. Tāpaso, itthiyaṃ tāpasī.
analyzed: tapā naḥ hoti mantu atthe tāpasaḥ itthiyam tāpasī
ālu abhijjha ādīhi

original: Abhijjhādīhi ālu hoti mantvatthe, abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu. Vātveva? Dayāvā.
analyzed: ālu hoti mantu atthe abhijjhālu sītālu dhajālu dayālu vātvā iva dayāvā
piccha ādi tu ilaḥ

original: Picchādīhi ilo hoti vā mantvatthe. Picchilo picchavā, phenilo phenavā, jaṭilo jaṭāvā. Kathaṃ ‘vācālo’ti? Nindāyamilassādilope “paro kvacī”ti (1-27).
analyzed: piccha ādīhi ilaḥ hoti vā mantu atthe picchilaḥ picchavā phenilaḥ phenavā jaṭilaḥ jaṭāvā katham vācālaḥ iti paraḥ kvaci iti
sīla āditaḥ vaḥ

original: Sīlādīhi vo hoti vā mantvatthe. Sīlavo sīlavā, kesavo kesavā, (40) “aṇṇā niccaṃ” aṇṇavo. (41) Gāṇḍī rājīhi saññāyaṃ” gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanu, rājīvaṃ paṅkajaṃ.
analyzed: sīla ādīhi vaḥ hoti vā mantu atthe sīlavaḥ sīlavā kesavaḥ kesavā aṇṇā niccam aṇṇavaḥ gāṇḍī rājīhi saññāyam gāṇḍīvam dhanu rājīvam paṅkajam
māyā medhā hi vī

original: Etehi dvīhi vī hoti mantvatthe. Māyāvī, medhāvī.
analyzed: etehi dvīhi hoti mantu atthe māyāvī medhāvī

original: 90. Sissare āmyuvāmī. Sasaddā āmyuvāmī honti issare-bhidhāyye mantvatthe. Samassatthīti sāmī, suvāmī.
analyzed: sissare āmi uvāmī sa saddāḥ āmi uvāmī honti issara abhidhāyye mantu atthe samassatthī iti sāmī suvāmī

original: 91. Lakkhyā ṇo a ca. Lakkhīsaddā ṇo hoti mantvatthe a cāntassa. Ṇakārovayavo, lakkhaṇo.
analyzed: lakkhyā ṇo a ca lakkhī saddāḥ ṇo hoti mantu atthe a ca antassa ṇakāra uvayavaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ
aṅga naḥ kalyāṇe

original: Kalyāṇe gamyamāne aṅgasmā no hoti mantvatthe. Aṅganā.
analyzed: kalyāṇe gamyamāne aṅgasmai naḥ mantvatthe aṅganā
saḥ lomā

original: Lomā so hoti mantvatthe. Lomaso, itthiyaṃ, lomasā.
analyzed: lomā saḥ hoti mantu atthe lomasaḥ itthiyam lomasā
imiyā

original: Mantvatthe ima iyā honti bahulaṃ. Puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo, hānabhāgiyo, seniyo.
analyzed: mantu atthe ime iyāḥ honti bahulam puttimaḥ kittimaḥ puttiyaḥ kappiyaḥ jaṭiyaḥ hānabhāgiyaḥ seniyaḥ

original: 95. To pañcamyā. Pañcamyantā bahulaṃ to hoti vā. Gāmato āgacchati gāmasmā āgacchati, corato bhāyati corehi bhāyati, satthato parihīno satthā parihīno.
analyzed: taḥ pañcamyā pañcamī antā bahulam taḥ hoti vā gāmataḥ āgacchati gāmasmai āgacchati corataḥ bhāyati corehi bhāyati satthataḥ parihīnaḥ satthā parihīnaḥ
itaḥ ta it taḥ kutaḥ

original: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate, etassa ṭa eta, kiṃsaddassa kuttañca. Ito imasmā, ato etto etasmā, kuto kasmā.
analyzed: tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭaḥ eta kiṃsaddassa kuttan ca itas imasmai atas ettas etasmai kutas kasmai

original: 97. Abhyādīhi. Abhiādīhi to hoti. Abhito, parito, pacchato heṭṭhato.
analyzed: abhyādīhi abhiādīhi to hoti abhitas paritas pacchatas heṭṭhatas

original: 98. Ādyādīhi. Ādippabhutīhi to vā hoti, ādo ādito, majjhato antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato, yatodakaṃ tadādittaṃ, yaṃ udakaṃ tadevādittanti attho.
analyzed: ādi ādīhi ādi ppabhutīhi to vā hoti ādaḥ āditaḥ majjhataḥ antataḥ piṭṭhitaḥ passataḥ mukhataḥ yataḥ udakam tat ādittam yam udakam tat eva ādittam ti attho

original: 99. Sabbādito sattamyā trattā. Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tratthā vā honti. Sabbatra sabba. Sabbasmiṃ, yatra yattha yasmiṃ. Bahulādhikārā na tumhāmhehi.
analyzed: sabba ādeḥ sattamyā sabba ādīhi sattamī antehi vā honti sabbatra sabba sabbasmin yatra yattha yasmin bahula adhikārāḥ na tumha amhehi
katthā itthā kutra atra kva ihidha

original: Etesaddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva, etasmiṃ, ettha, atra, asmiṃ iha, idha.
analyzed: nipaccante kasmin kattha kutra kva etasmin ettha atra asmin iha idha

original: 101. Dhi sabbā vā. Sattamyantato sabbasmā dhi vā hoti. Sabbadhi, sabbattha.
analyzed: dhi sabbā vā sattamī antataḥ sabbasmā dhi vā hoti sabbadhi sabbattha

original: 102. Yā hiṃ. Sattamyantato yato hiṃ vā hoti. Yahiṃ yatra.
analyzed: yā hiṃ sattamī antatas yatas hiṃ vā yatra
tāḥ haṃ ca

original: Sattamyantato tato vā haṃ hoti hiṃ ca. Tahaṃ, tahiṃ, tatra.
analyzed: tatas vā haṃ hoti him ca tahaṃ tahim tatra
kuhim kaham

original: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca. Kuhiṃ, kahaṃ. Kathaṃ ‘kuhiñcana’nti? ‘Canaṃ’ iti nipātantaraṃ ‘kuhiñcī’ti ettha cisaddo viya.
analyzed: kiṃsaddā sattamī antāḥ hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca kuhim kaham katham kuhiṃcana iti canaṃ iti nipāta antaram kuhiñci iti ettha ci saddaḥ viya

original: 105. Sabbekaññayatehi kāle dā. Etehi sattamyantehi kāle dā hoti. Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā. Kāleti kiṃ? Sabbattha dese.
analyzed: sabba ekañña yatehi kāle dā etehi sattamī antehi kāle dā hoti sabbasmin kāle sabbadā ekadā aññadā yadā tadā kāla iti kim sabbattha dese
kadā kudā sadā dhuna idāni

original: Ete saddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
analyzed: ete saddāḥ nipaccante kasmim kāle kadā kudā sabbasmim kāle sadā imasmim kāle adhunā idāni
ajja karahā

original: Etesaddā nipaccante. Pakatippaccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati,
analyzed: ete saddāḥ nipaccante pakati paccayaḥ ādesaḥ kāla visesaḥ iti sabbam etam nipātanā labbhati

original: imassa ṭo jjo jāhani nipaccate, asmiṃ ahani ajja. Samānassa sabhāvo jju cāhani, samāne
analyzed: imassa ṭaḥ jjaḥ jā ahani nipaccate asmim ahani ajja samānassa sabhāvaḥ ca ahani samāne

original: ahani sajju. Aparasmā jju, aparasmiṃ ahani aparajju. Imasseto kāle rahi ca, imasmiṃ
analyzed: ahani sajju aparasmā jju aparasmin ahani aparajju imassa itas kāle ca imasmin

original: kāle etarahi. Kiṃsaddassa ko raha cānajjatane, kasmiṃ kāle karaha.
analyzed: kāle etarahi kiṃsaddassa kaḥ raha ca anajjatane kasmin kāle karaha
sabba ādīhi payāre thā

original: Sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tattha vattamānehi sabbādīhi thā hoti. Sabbena pakārena sabbathā, yathā, tathā.
analyzed: sāmaññassa bhedakaḥ visesaḥ pakāraḥ tattha vattamānehi sabba ādīhi thā hoti sabbena pakārena sabbathā yathā tathā
katham ittham

original: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāre. Kimimehi thaṃ paccayo, kaita ca tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ, kathaṃ, itthaṃ.
analyzed: ete saddāḥ nipaccante pakāre kim imehi tham paccayaḥ ca tesam yathākkamam katham ittham
dhāḥ saṅkhyāhi

original: Saṅkhyāvācīhi pakāre dhā parā hoti. Dvīhi pakārehi, dve vā pakāre karoti dvidhā karoti,
analyzed: saṅkhyā avāci pakāre dhā parā hoti dvīhi pakārehi dve vā pakāre karoti dvidhā karoti

original: bahudhā karoti, ekaṃ rāsiṃ pañcappakāraṃ karoti pañcadhā karoti, pañcappakāramekappakāraṃ
analyzed: bahudhā karoti ekam rāsim pañca ppakāram karoti pañcadhā karoti pañca ppakāram eka ppakāram
karoti ekadhā karoti
vekāḥ jjhaṃ

original: Ekasmā pakare jjhaṃ vā hoti. Ekajjhaṃ karoti, ekadhā, karoti.
analyzed: ekasmai pakare vā hoti ekajjham karoti ekadhā karoti
dvitīya idhā

original: Dvitīhi pakāre edhā vā hoti. Dvedhā, tedhā, dvidhā, tidhā.
analyzed: pakāre edhā vā dvedhā tedhā dvidhā tidhā
tabbati jātiyaḥ

original: Pakāravati taṃsāmaññavācakā saddā jātiyo hoti, paṭujātiyo, mudujātiyo.
analyzed: pakāravati saddāḥ jātiyaḥ hoti paṭu jātiyaḥ mudu jātiyaḥ
vāra saṅkhyāya kkhattum

original: Vārasambandhiniyā saṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti. Dve vāre bhuñjati dvikkhattuṃ divasassa bhuñjati. Vāraggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Pañca bhuñjati. Saṅkhyāyāti kiṃ? Pahūte vāre bhuñjati.
analyzed: vāra sambandhiniyā saṅkhyāya hoti dve vāre bhuñjati dvi khattum divasassa bhuñjati vāra ggahaṇam kim pañca bhuñjati saṅkhyāya ati kim pahūte vāre bhuñjati
katimhā

original: Vārasambandhiniyā katisaṅkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti, kati vāre, bhuñjathi, katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
analyzed: vāra sambandhiniyā kati saṅkhyāya kkhattum hoti kati vāre katikkhattum bhuñjati
bahumhā dhā ca paccāsattiyam

original: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhatthuṃ ca, vārānañce paccāsatti hoti, bahudhā divasassa bhuñjati bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjati. Paccāsattiyanti kiṃ? Bahuvāre māsassa bhuñjati.
analyzed: vāra sambandhiniyā bahu saṅkhyāya dhā hoti kkhatthum ca paccāsatti hoti bahudhā divasassa bhuñjati bahu kkhattum bhuñjati kim bahu vāre māsassa bhuñjati
sakim vā

original: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate. Ekavāraṃ bhuñjati sakiṃ bhuñjati, vāti kiṃ? Ekakkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
analyzed: ekam vāram iccasmin atthe vā nipaccate eka vāram bhuñjati sakim bhuñjati vā ati kim eka khattum bhuñjati
saḥ vīccha pakāresu

original: Vīcchāyaṃ pakāre ca so hoti bahulaṃ. Vīcchāyaṃ-khaṇḍaso, bilaso. Pakāre-puthuso, sabbaso.
analyzed: pakāre ca saḥ hoti bahulam bilasaḥ pakāreputhusaḥ sabbaso
a bhūta tad bhāve kara asa bhū yoge vikārā cī

original: Avatthāvato-vatthantarenābhūtassa tāyāvatthāya bhāvekarāsabhūhi sambandhe sati vikāravācakā
analyzed: tāya avatthāya sambandhe sati vikāra vācakā

original: cī hoti, adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalī karoti, adhavalo dhavalo siyā dhavalī
analyzed: adhavalam dhavalam karoti dhavalī karoti adhavalaḥ dhavalaḥ siyāḥ dhavalī

original: siyā, adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalī bhavati. Abhūta tabbhāveti kiṃ? Ghaṭaṃ karoti,
analyzed: siyāḥ adhavalaḥ dhavalaḥ bhavati dhavalī bhavati kim ghaṭam karoti

original: dadhi atthi, ghaṭo bhavati. Karāsabhūyogeti kiṃ? Adhavalodhavalo jāyate. Vikārāti
analyzed: dadhi atthi ghaṭaḥ bhavati kim adhavalaḥ dhavalaḥ jāyate

original: kiṃ? Pakatiyā māhotu, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ karoti.
analyzed: kim suvaṇṇam kuṇḍalam karoti
dissantaññe pi paccayā

original: Vuttato-ññepi paccayā dissanti vuttāvuttatthesu. Vividhā mātaro vimātaro, tāsaṃ puttā
analyzed: paccayāḥ dissanti vutta avutta tthesu vividhāḥ mātaraḥ vimātaraḥ tāsam puttā

original: vemātikā-rikaṇa. Pathaṃ gacchatīti pathāvino-āvī. Issā assa atthīti issukī-ukī. Dhuraṃ
analyzed: vemātikārikaṇa patham gacchati iti pathāvi noāvī issā assa atthi iti dhuram
vahati iti dhoḥ ayhaḥ yha ṇa
aññasmin

original: Vuttato-ññasmimpi atthe vuttappaccayā dissanti. Magadhānaṃ issaro māgadho-dhaṇā. Kāsīti sahassaṃ, tamagghatīti kāsiyo iyo.
analyzed: vutta toññasmim pi atthe vutta paccayāḥ dissanti magadhānam issaraḥ māgadhodhaṇā kāsīti sahassam tamagghati iti
sa ka tthe

original: Sakatthepi paccayā dissanti. Hīnako, potako, kiccayaṃ.
analyzed: saka atthe pi paccayāḥ dissanti hīnakaḥ potakaḥ
lopaḥ

original: Paccayānaṃ lopopi dissati. Buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attariyena vāti bhāvappaccayalopo.
analyzed: paccayānam lopaḥ api dissati buddhe ratanam paṇītam cakkhum suññam attena vā attariyena vā ti bhāva ppaccaya lopo
sara anam ādi ssa yu vaṇ ṇassā eaḥ ṇa anubandhe

original: Sarānamādibhūtā ye akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇā, tesaṃ āeo honti yathākkamaṃṇānubandhe. Rāghavo, venateyyo, meniko, oḷumpiko, dobhaggaṃ. Ṇānubandheti kiṃ? Purātano.
analyzed: sarānama ādi bhūtāḥ ye tesam honti yathā kkamaṃ ṇa anubandhe rāghavaḥ venateyyaḥ menikaḥ oḷumpikaḥ dobhaggam kim purātanaḥ
saṃyoge kvaci

original: Sarānamādibhūtā ye ayuvaṇṇā, tesaṃ āeo honti kvacideva saṃyogavisaye ṇānubandhe. Decco, koṇḍañño. Kvacīti kiṃ? Kattikeyyo.
analyzed: sarā nama ādi bhūtāḥ ye tesam honti kvacid eva saṃyoga visaye ṇa anubandhe kvaci iti kim kattikeyyaḥ
majjhe

original: Majjhe vattamānānampi ayuvaṇṇānaṃ ā e o honti kvaci. Aḍḍhateyyo, vāseṭṭho.
analyzed: majjhe vattamānānam pi ayuvaṇṇānam ā e o honti kvaci aḍḍhateyyaḥ vāseṭṭhaḥ
kosajja ajjava pārisajja sohajja bāhusaccā

original: Etesaddā nipaccanteṇānubandhe. Kusī tassa bhāvokosajjaṃ, ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, parisāsu
analyzed: ete saddāḥ nipad anteṇa anubandhe kusī tassa bhāvaḥ ukosajjam ujunaḥ bhāvaḥ ajjavam parisāsu

original: sādhu pārisajjo, suhadayova suhajjo, tassa pana bhāvo sohajjaṃ, muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ,
analyzed: sādhu pārisajjaḥ su hadayaḥ uva su hajjaḥ tassa pana bhāvaḥ sohajjam mudunaḥ bhāvaḥ maddavam

original: isino idaṃ bhāvo vā ārissaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ bhāvo vā āsabhaṃ, ājānīyassa bhāvo so
analyzed: isinaḥ idam bhāvaḥ vai ārissam usabhassa idam bhāvaḥ vai āsabham ājānīyassa bhāvaḥ saḥ

original: eva vā ājaññaṃ, thenassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā theyyaṃ, bahussatassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ,
analyzed: eva vai ājaññam thenassa bhāvaḥ kammam vā theyyam bahussatassa bhāvaḥ bāhusaccam
etesu yama lakkhaṇikam tam nipātanā
mana ā dīnam saka

original: Manādīnaṃ saka hoti ṇānubandhe. Manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ, dummanaso bhāvo domanassaṃ, somanassaṃ.
analyzed: man ādīnam saka hoti ṇa anubandhe manasi bhavam mānasam dummanasaḥ bhāvaḥ domanassam somanassam
u va ṇ nassā avaṅa sare

original: Sarādo ṇānubandhe uvaṇṇassāvaṅa hoti. Rāghavo, jambavaṃ.
analyzed: ṇa anubandhe hoti rāghavaḥ jambavam
yamhi gossa ca

original: Yakārādo paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hoti. Gabyaṃ, bhātabyo.
analyzed: yakāra ādaḥ paccaye gossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅa hoti gabyam bhātabyaḥ

original: Yakārādo paccaye avaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ lopo hoti. Dāyajjaṃ, kāruññaṃ, ādhipaccaṃ, deppaṃ. Bahulaṃvidhānā kvaci na hoti kiccayaṃ.
analyzed: yakāra ādaḥ paccaye a vaṇṇi vaṇṇānam lopaḥ hoti dāyajjam kāruññam ādhipaccam deppam bahulam vidhānā kvaci na hoti kiccayam
ra anubandha inta sa ra ādissa

original: Anto saro ādimhi yassāvayavassa, tassa lopo hoti rānubandhe. Kittakaṃ, petteyyaṃ.
analyzed: antaḥ sa raḥ ādimhi yassa avayavassa tassa lopaḥ hoti ra anubandhe kittakam petteyyam
mahā

original: Kisassa mahato ime kasamahā honti yathākkamaṃ, kasimā, mahimā.
analyzed: kisassa mahataḥ ime kasamahāḥ honti yathākkamam kasimā mahimā
āyuḥ sa āyasa mantumhi
āyussa āyasa ādesaḥ hoti mantumhi
jaḥ vuddhassiyiṭṭhesu

original: Vuddhassa jo hoti iyaiṭṭhesu, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
analyzed: vuddhassa jaḥ hoti iyaiṭṭhesu jeyyaḥ jeṭṭhaḥ
sādha na idam sā

original: Iyaiṭṭhesu bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādha neda sā honti yathākkamaṃ. Sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho, nediyo, nediṭṭho, seyyo, seṭṭho.
analyzed: iyaiṭṭhesu honti yathākkamam sādhiyaḥ sādhiṭṭhaḥ nediyaḥ nediṭṭhaḥ seyyaḥ seṭṭhaḥ
kaṇaka nāppa yuvānam

original: Iyaiṭṭhesu appayuvānaṃ kaṇa kanā honti yathākkamaṃ. Kaṇiyo kaṇiṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho.
analyzed: iyaiṭṭhesu appayuvānam kaṇa kanā honti yathākkamam kaṇiyaḥ kaṇiṭṭhaḥ kaniyaḥ kaniṭṭhaḥ
lopaḥ mantu vantu ūnam

original: Vī mantu vantūnaṃ lopo hoti iyaiṭṭhesu. Atisayena medhāvī medhiyo, medhiṭṭho, atisayena satimā satiyo, satiṭṭho, atisayena guṇavā guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho.
analyzed: vī mantu vantūnam lopaḥ hoti iyaiṭṭhesu atisayena medhāvī medhiyaḥ medhiṭṭhaḥ atisayena satimā satiyaḥ satiṭṭhaḥ atisayena guṇavā guṇiyaḥ guṇiṭṭhaḥ
ḍe sa tissa tissa

original: Ḍepare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti, vīsaṃ sataṃ, tiṃsaṃ sataṃ.
analyzed: ḍe pare sati antassa tikārassa lopaḥ hoti vīsam satam tiṃsam satam
etassa iṭa ttake

original: Ttake pare etassa eṭa hoti. Ettakaṃ.
analyzed: ttake pare etassa e ṭa hoti e ttakam
ṇikassiyaḥ vā

original: Ṇikassa vā iyo hoti, sakyaputtiyo, sakyaputtiko.
analyzed: ṇikassa vā iyaḥ hoti sakyaputtiyaḥ sakyaputtikaḥ
a dhātuḥ sa kā asya ā t itaḥ ghessi

original: Ghe pare adhātussa yo kakāro, tato pubbassa akārassa bahulaṃ i hoti sace gho na syādito
analyzed: ghe pare a dhātussa yaḥ kakāraḥ tatas pubbassa akārassa bahulam i hoti sace ghaḥ na syāt itas

original: paro hoti. Bālikā, kārikā, adhātussāti kiṃ? Sakā, keti kiṃ? Nandanā, asyāditoti kiṃ?
analyzed: paraḥ hoti bālikā kārikā sakā kā iti kim nandanā kim

original: Bahuparibbājakā mathurā, bahucammikāti kakārena syādino byavahitattā siddhaṃ, gheti
analyzed: bahu paribbājakā mathurā bahu cammikā iti kakārena sya ādinaḥ byavahita ttā siddham gha iti

original: kiṃ? Bālako, assāti kiṃ? Bahukattukā sālā.
analyzed: kim bālakaḥ assa ati kim bahu kattukā sālā
iti moggallāne byākaraṇe vuttiyam
ṇa ādi kaṇḍaḥ catutthaḥ
pañcamaḥ kaṇḍaḥ kha ādi

original: 1. Tija mānehi kha sā khamā vīmaṃsāsu.
analyzed: tija mānehi kha sā khamā vīmaṃsāsu

original: Khantiyaṃ tijā vīmaṃsāyaṃ mānā ca khasappaccayā honti yathākkamaṃ, titikkhā, vīmaṃsā, titikkhati, vīmaṃsati. Khamāvīmaṃsā, sūti kiṃ? Tejanaṃ, tejo, tejayati, mānanaṃ, mānomāneti.
analyzed: khantiyam tijā vīmaṃsā ayam mānā ca khasa ppaccayāḥ honti yathākkamam titikkhā vīmaṃsā titikkhati vīmaṃsati khamā vīmaṃsā sūti kim tejanam tejaḥ tejayati mānanam mānomānā iti
kitā tikicchā saṃsayesu chaḥ

original: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti. Tikicchā, vicikicchā, tikicchati, vicikicchati. Aññatra niketo, saṃketo, ketanaṃ, keto, ketayati.
analyzed: tikicchā ayam saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti tikicchā vicikicchā tikicchati vicikicchati aññatra niketo saṃketo ketanam keto ketayati

original: 3. Nindāyaṃ gupa badhā bassa bho ca.
analyzed: ninda ayam gupa badhā bassa bho ca

original: Nindāyaṃ vattamānehi gupa badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca. Jigucchā, bībhacchā, jigucchati, bībhacchati, aññatra gopanaṃ, gopo, gopeti, badhako.
analyzed: ninda ayam vattamānehi gupa badhehi chaḥ hoti bassa bho ca jigucchā bībhacchā jigucchati bībhacchati aññatra gopanam gopaḥ gopeti badhakaḥ
tum smāḥ lopaḥ cicchāyam te

original: Tumantato icchāyamatthe te khasachā honti bahulaṃ, lopo ca tuṃpaccayassa hoti sutattā,
analyzed: tum antatas icchā ayam atthe te kha sa chā honti bahulam lopaḥ ca tum paccayassa hoti su ta ttā

original: bubhukkhā, jigīsāṃ, jighacchā, bubhukkhati, jigīsati jighacchati. Idha kasmā na hoti
analyzed: bubhukkhā jigīsām jighacchā bubhukkhati jigīsati jighacchati idha kasmai na hoti
bhottum icchati iti kim bhojanam icchati icchāyanti

original: kiṃ? Bhuñjituṃ gacchati. Kathaṃ ‘kūlaṃ vipati satī’ti? Yathā kūlaṃ patitu micchatīti
analyzed: kim bhuñjitum gacchati katham kūlam vipati satī iti yathā kūlam patitu m icchati iti

original: vākyaṃ hoti, evaṃ vuttipi hossati. Vākyameva carahi kathaṃ hoti? Lokassa tathā vacanicchāya.
analyzed: vākyam hoti evam vutti pi vākyam eva carahi katham hoti lokassa tathā vacanicchāya
īyaḥ kammā

original: Icchākammato icchāyamatthe īyappaccayo hoti. Puttamicchati putthīyati. Kammāti kiṃ?
analyzed: icchā kammato icchā ayam atthe īyap paccayaḥ hoti puttam icchati putthīyati kamma ati kim

original: Asinecchati. Idha kasmā na hoti ‘raññoputtamicchatī’ti? Sāpekkhattā, na hi aññamapekkhamāno
analyzed: asinā icchati idha kasmā na hoti rañño puttam icchati iti sa apekkha ttā na hi aññam apekkhamāno

original: aññena sahekatthibhāvamanubhavituṃ sakkoti. Idhāpi carahi na siyā ‘attano putta micchatī’ti?
analyzed: aññena saha ikatthi bhāvam anubhavitum sakkoti idha api carahi na siyā micchati iti

original: Nevettha bhavitabbaṃ, na hi bhavati ‘attano puttīyatī’ti, kathaṃ carahi puttassa
analyzed: na iva ittha bhavitabbam na hi bhavati attanaḥ puttīyati iti katham carahi puttassa
atta niyatā avagamyate aññassa a suta ttā icchāya ca
upamāna ācāre

original: Kammato upamānā ācāratthe īyo hoti. Puttami-vā-carati puttīyati māṇavakaṃ, upamānāti kiṃ? Puttamācarati.
analyzed: kammataḥ upamānāḥ ācāra atthe īyaḥ hoti puttam iva ācarati puttīyati māṇavakam kim puttam ācarati
ādhārā

original: Ādhāratū-pamānā ācāratthe īyo yoti. Kuṭiyamivā-carati kuṭīyatī pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ bhikkhu.
analyzed: ādhāra tu upamānāḥ ācāra atthe īyaḥ yoti kuṭiyam iva ācarati kuṭīyatī pāsāde pāsādīyati kuṭiyam bhikkhu
kattu tāyaḥ

original: Kattutū-pamānā ācāratthe āyo hoti. Pabbato ivācarati pabbatāyati.
analyzed: kattu tu upamānāḥ ācāra atthe āyaḥ hoti pabbataḥ iva ācarati pabbatāyati
y catthe

original: Kattuto abhūtatabbhāve āyo hoti bahulaṃ. Bhusāyati, paṭapaṭāyati, lohitāyati, kattutotveva? (Abhusaṃ) bhusaṃ karotīhi, iha kasmā na hoti ‘bhusī bhavatī’ti? Vuttatthatāya.
analyzed: kattutaḥ a bhūta tad bhāve āyaḥ hoti bahulam bhusāyati paṭapaṭāyati lohitāyati kattutaḥ tu eva abhusam bhusam karoti ihi iha kasmā na hoti bhusī bhavati iti vutta ttha tāya
karoti

original: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti. Saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.
analyzed: sadda ādīhi dutiya ntehi karoti iti asmin atthe āyaḥ hoti saddāyati verāyati kalahāyati dhūpāyati
num o tvas so

original: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṃ atthe asso hoti. Namassati tathāgtaṃ.
analyzed: namoiccasma karoti iti asmin atthe assaḥ hoti namassati tathāgtam
dhātvatthe nām asmi

original: Nāmasmā dhātvatthe bahulamihoti. Hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati
analyzed: dhātvatthe hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati vīṇāya upagāyati

original: upavīṇayati, daḷhaṃ karoti vinayaṃ daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusalaṃ
analyzed: upavīṇayati daḷham karoti vinayam daḷhayati visuddhā hoti kusalam
pucchati kusalayati
sat cādi iha api

original: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti. Saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti, sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
analyzed: sacca ādīhi dhātu atthe āpi hoti saccāpeti atthāpeti vedāpeti sukkhāpeti sukhāpeti dukkhāpeti
kriyatthā

original: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā. Kriyā attho yassa so kriyattho dhātu.
analyzed: ayam adhikāraḥ āsattha parisamattiyā kriyā atthaḥ yassa saḥ kriyatthaḥ dhātu
curā t itaḥ ṇi

original: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṃ. Ṇakāro vuddhyattho, evamaññatrāpi, corayati, lāḷayati, kathaṃ ‘rajjaṃ kāretī’ti? Yogavibhāgato.
analyzed: curā ādīhi kriyatthehi saka tthe ṇi paraḥ hoti bahulam ṇakāraḥ evam aññatra api corayati lāḷayati katham rajjam kāreti iti yoga vibhāgato
payojaka byāpāre ca

original: Kattāraṃ yo payojayati, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṃ, kāreti, kārāpeti.
analyzed: kattāram yaḥ upayojayati tassa byāpāre honti bahulam kāreti kārāpeti

original: Nanu ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṃ payojakoti taṃbyāpārepi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti? Payojakaggahaṇasāmatthiyā
analyzed: nanu ca kattā api karaṇa ādīnam payojakaḥ iti tad byāpāre pi pāpuṇanti payojaka ggahaṇa sāmatthiyā

original: na bhavissanti curādīhi visuṃ vacanasāmatthiyā ca. Ato bhiyyo ṇāpiyeva, ṇiyevuvaṇṇato, dvayamevaññehi.
analyzed: na bhavissanti curā ādīhi visum vacana sāmatthiyā ca atas bhiyyas dvaya mevaññehi

original: 17. Kyo bhāvakammesva-parokkhesu māna nta tyādīsu. Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu
analyzed: kyaḥ bhāva kammesu aparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsu bhāva kamma vihitesu parokkha avajjitesu

original: mānantatyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā. Ntaggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ, kakāro avuddhyattho
analyzed: māna nta tya ādīsu paresu kyaḥ hoti a nta ggahaṇam uttarattham kakāraḥ

original: evamuttaratrāpi. Ṭhīyamānaṃ, ṭhīyate, sūyamānaṃ, sūyate, aparokkhesu mānantatyādīsūti
analyzed: evam uttaratra api ṭhīyamānam ṭhīyate sūyamānam sūyate aparokkhesu

original: kiṃ? Babhūva devadattena, bibhida kusulo. Bhijjate kusulo sayamevāti ‘bhijjate’ti
analyzed: kim babhūva devadattena bibhida kusulaḥ bhijjate kusulaḥ sayam eva ati bhijjata iti

original: kusulo attāna’nti bhavati, evamaññampi yathāgamamanugantabbaṃ. ‘Aparokkhesu mānantatyādīsū’ti
analyzed: kusulaḥ bhavati evam aññam pi yathāgamam anugantabbam aparokkhesu mā ananta tyā ādīsu iti

original: ayamadhikāro ā ‘tanāditvo’ti 5.26. Apica ete kyādayo tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattukammabhāva
analyzed: ayam adhikāraḥ api ca ete kiya ādayaḥ tya ādīsu para bhūtesu kattu kamma bhāva

analyzed: vihitesu kyal ādīnam vidhānato tesu eva viññāyanti iti akammakehi dhātūhi kattu bhāvesu

original: sakammakehi kattukammesu, kammāvacanicchāyaṃ bhāve ca bhavantīti veditabbā. Yassa

analyzed: pana dhātussa kiriyā kammam apekkhate so sa kammakaḥ yassa tu kiriyā kattumattam apekkhate

kattari laḥ

original: Kriyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna ntatyādīsu lo hoti. Lakāro, “ñilasse”ti 5-163 visesanattho. Pacamāno, pacanto, pacati.

mam ca

original: Rudhādito kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti maṃ ca antasarā paro. Makāro-nubandho, akāro uccāraṇattho. Rundhamāno, rundhanto, rundhati.
analyzed: rudh ādeḥ tya ādīsu laḥ hoti mam ca paraḥ makāraḥ anubandhaḥ akāraḥ uccāraṇa atthaḥ rundhamānaḥ rundhantaḥ rundhati
vā

original: Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti vibhāsā, orayanto, corento, kārayanto,

original: kārento, kārāpayanto, kārāpento, saccāpayanto, saccāpento, corayati, coreti, kārayati,

original: kāreti, kārāpayati, kārāpeti, saccāpayati, saccāpeti. Vavatthitavibhāsattho-yaṃ vāsaddo,
analyzed: kāreti kārāpayati kārāpeti saccāpayati saccāpeti vavatthita vibhāsa atthaḥ yam vā saddaḥ

original: tena māne niccaṃ, corayamāno, kārayamāno, kārāpayamāno, saccāpayamāno.
analyzed: tena māne niccam corayamāno kārayamāno kārāpayamāno saccāpayamāno
divā dīhi yaka

original: Divādīhi lavisaye yaka hoti. Dibbanto, dibbati.
analyzed: diva ādīhi la visaye ya ka hoti dibbantaḥ dibbati
tud ādi ī hi kaḥ

original: Tudādīhi lavisaye ko hoti. Tudamāno, tudanto, tudati.
analyzed: tud ādīhi la visaye kaḥ hoti tudamānaḥ tudantaḥ tudati
jyā ādīhi knā

original: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti. Jinanto, jināti. Kathaṃ ‘jayanto’ jayatī, ti? Bhūvādipāṭhā.
analyzed: la visaye hoti jinantaḥ jināti katham jayantaḥ jayati iti bhūva ādi pāṭhā
kya ādi hi kṇā

original: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. Kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
analyzed: kī ādīhi la visaye hoti kiṇantaḥ kiṇāti
svādīhi kṇo

original: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti. Kathaṃ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
analyzed: su ādīhi la visaye kṇaḥ hoti suṇamānaḥ suṇantaḥ suṇoti katham suṇāti iti kya ādi pāṭhā
tan ā t itvaḥ
tan ādeḥ la visaye o hoti tanoti
bhāva kammesu tabbānīyā

original: Tabbaanīyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṃ bhavanti. Kattabbaṃ, karaṇīyaṃ, kattabbo
analyzed: tabba anīyā kriyatthā pare bhāva kammesu bahulam bhavanti kattabbam karaṇīyam kattabbaḥ

original: kaṭo, karaṇīyo. Bahulādhikārā karaṇādīsupi bhavanti, sinānīyaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, dānīyo brāhmaṇo,
analyzed: kaṭaḥ karaṇīyaḥ bahula adhikārā karaṇa ādīsupi bhavanti sinānīyam cuṇṇam dānīyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ

original: sammāvattanīyo guru, pavacanīyo upajjhāyo, upaṭṭhānīyo sisso.
analyzed: sammāvattanīyaḥ guru pavacanīyaḥ upajjhāyaḥ upaṭṭhānīyaḥ sisso
ghi aṇa

original: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ. Vākyaṃ, kāriyaṃ, ceyyaṃ, jeyyaṃ.
analyzed: bhāva kammesu hoti bahulam vākyam kāriyam ceyyam jeyyam
āsse ca

original: Ātoghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu, āssa e ca. Deyyaṃ.
analyzed: hoti bhāva kammesu ca deyyam
vad ādīhi yaḥ

original: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakammesu. Vajjaṃ, majjaṃ, gammaṃ. (42) “Bhujānne”, bhojjo odano, bhojjā yāgu, bhoggamaññaṃ.
analyzed: vad ādīhi kriyatthehi yaḥ hoti bahulam bhāva kammesu vajjam majjam gammam bhuja anne bhojjaḥ odanaḥ bhojjā yāgu
kicca ghacca bhacca bhabba leyyā
ete saddāḥ yat paccayantāḥ nipaccante
guhā ādīhi yaka

original: Gutādīhi kriyattehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti. Guyhaṃ, duyhaṃ, sisso. Siddhā evete tabbādayo
analyzed: guta ādīhi bhāva kammesu hoti guyham duyham sisso siddhāḥ eva ete tabba ādayaḥ

original: pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññenavidhānato, tvayā khalu kaṭo kattabbo,
analyzed: gamyamānesu sāmaññena vidhānataḥ tvayā khalu kaṭaḥ kattabbo

original: karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco, evaṃ tvayā kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā kaṭo kattabbo, bhoto hi
analyzed: karaṇīyaḥ kāriyaḥ kicco evam tvayā kaṭaḥ kattabbaḥ bhotā kaṭaḥ kattabbaḥ bhotaḥ hi

original: patto kālo kaṭakaraṇe. Evaṃ uddhamohuttikepi vattamānato pesādīsu siddhā eva. Tathā
analyzed: pattaḥ kālaḥ kaṭa karaṇe evam vattamānato pesa ādīsu siddhāḥ eva tathā

original: arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe ca bhāvādo siddhā,
analyzed: arahe kattari satti visiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassaka adhamīṇa tā visiṭṭhe ca bhāva ādaḥ siddhā

original: uddhaṃmuhuttato-bhotā kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā rajjaṃ kattabbaṃ. Bhavaṃ araho, bhotā
analyzed: kaṭaḥ kattabbaḥ bhotā rajjam kattabbam bhavam araho bhotā

original: sāro vahitabbo, bhavaṃ sakko, bhotā avassaṃ kaṭo kattabbo, bhotā nikkho dātabbo.
analyzed: sāraḥ vahitabbaḥ bhavam sakkaḥ bhotā avassam kaṭaḥ kattabbaḥ bhotā nikkhaḥ dātabbaḥ
kattari ltuṇakā

original: Kattari kārake kriyatthā ltuṇakā honti bahulaṃ. Paṭhitā, pāṭhako. Bahulamitveva?
analyzed: kattari kārake kriyatthāḥ ltuṇakāḥ honti bahulam paṭhitā pāṭhakaḥ bahulam iti eva

original: Pādehi harīyatīti pādahā-rako, gale cuppateti galecopako. Siddhova ltu, arahe sīlasādhudhammesu
analyzed: pādehi harīyati iti pāda hārakaḥ gale cuppata iti galecopakaḥ siddho va a rahe sīla sādhu dhammesu

original: ca sāmaññavihitattā, bhavaṃ khalu kaññāya pariggahitā, bhavametaṃ arahati. Sīlādīsu-khalvapi
analyzed: ca sāmañña vihita ttā bhavam khalu kaññāya pariggahitā bhavam etam arahati

original: upādātā kumārake, gantā khelaṃ, muṇḍayitāro sāviṭṭhāyanā vadhuṃ katapariggahaṃ.
analyzed: upādātā kumārake gantā khelam muṇḍayitāraḥ sāviṭṭhāyanāḥ vadhum kata pariggaham
āvī

original: Kriyatthā āvī hoti bahulaṃ kattari. Bhayadassāvī. Appavisayataññāpanatthaṃ bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ, sāmaññavihitattā sīlā dīsu ca hoteva.
analyzed: kriyatthā āvī hoti bahulam kattari bhaya dassāvī bhinna yoga karaṇam sāmañña vihita ttā sīlā dīsu ca hotā iva
āsiṃsāyamakaḥ

original: Āsiṃsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari. Jīvatūti jīvako, nandatūti nandako, bhavatūti bhavako.
analyzed: āsiṃsa ayam gamyamānā ayam kriyatthāḥ akaḥ hoti kattari jīvatu iti jīvakaḥ nandatu iti nandakaḥ bhavatu iti bhavakaḥ
karā ṇano

original: Karato kattari ṇano hoti. Karotīti kāraṇaṃ, kattarīti kiṃ? Karaṇaṃ.
analyzed: karotaḥ kattari hoti karoti iti kāraṇam kattari iti kim karaṇam
hā taḥ vīhi kālesu

original: Hāto vīhismiṃ kāle ca ṇano hoti kattari. Hāyanā nāma vihayo, hāyano saṃvaccharo, vīhikālesūti kiṃ? Hātā.
analyzed: hātaḥ vīhismim kāle ca hoti kattari hāyanāḥ nāma vihayaḥ hāyano saṃvaccharaḥ vīhi kālesu iti kim hātā
vidā kū

original: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari. Vidū, lokavidū.

analyzed: dvi tte pubbassa ādi tassa uññassa byañjanassa lopaḥ hoti asisisati
kha cha se svas si

original: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu. Pipāsati, jighaṃsati, khachasesūti kiṃ? Jahāti, assāti kiṃ? Bubhukkhati.
analyzed: dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu pipāsati jighaṃsati khachasesu uti kim jahāti assa ati kim bubhukkhati
gu pissussa

original: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu, jigucchati.
analyzed: dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussaḥ i hoti kha cha sesu jigucchati
tatiya paṭhamā

original: Dvitte pubesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti. Bubhukkhati, ciccheda.
analyzed: dvitte pubesam catuttha dutiyānam tatiya paṭhamāḥ honti bubhukkhati ciccheda
kavagga hānam cavagga jā

original: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā honti yathākkamaṃ. Cukopa, jahāti.
analyzed: dvitte pubbesam kavagga hānam cavagga jāḥ honti yathākkamam cukopa jahāti
mānassa vī parassa ca maṃ

original: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti parassa ca maṃ, vīmaṃsati.
analyzed: dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti parassa ca mam vīmaṃsati
ti vā

original: Saṃsayaso-ññasmiṃ vattamānassa dvitte pubbassa kitassa vā ti hoti. Tikicchati, cikicchati, asaṃsayeti kiṃ? Vicikicchati.
analyzed: saṃsaya soññasmin vattamānassa dvitte pubbassa kitassa vā ti hoti tikicchati cikicchati a saṃsaya iti kim vicikicchati
yuva ṇ ā name o paccaye

original: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ eohonti yathākkamaṃ paccaye. Cetabbaṃ, netabbaṃ, sotabbaṃ, bhavitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kriyatthānam yathākkamam paccaye cetabbam netabbam sotabbam bhavitabbam
lahussupantassa

original: Lahubhūtassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa eo honti yathākkamaṃ. Esitabbaṃ, kositabbaṃ, lahussāti kiṃ? Dhūpitā, upantassāti kiṃ? Rundhati.
analyzed: lahu bhūtassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa e o honti yathākkamam esitabbam kositabbam lahussa ati kim dhūpitāḥ upantassa ati kim rundhati
assāḥ ṇa anubandhe

original: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti. Kārako.
analyzed: ṇakāra anubandhe paccaye pare upa antassa akārassa ā hoti kārakaḥ
na te ka anubandhana āgamesu

original: Te eoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti. Cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho, nāgame ‘vanā’dinā
analyzed: te ka anubandhe na āgame ca na honti citaḥ sutaḥ diṭṭhaḥ puṭṭhaḥ na āgame vana ādinā

original: (1.45) cinitabbaṃ, cinituṃ, suṇitabbaṃ, suṇituṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ, pāpuṇituṃ, dhunitabbaṃ,
analyzed: cinitabbam cinitum suṇitabbam suṇitum pāpuṇitabbam pāpuṇitum dhunitabbam

original: dhunituṃ, dhunanaṃ, dhunayitabbaṃ, dhunāpetabbaṃ, dhunayituṃ dhunāpetuṃ, dhunayanaṃ,

original: dhunāpanaṃ, dhunayati, dhunāpeti, pīnetabbaṃ, pīnayituṃ, pīnanaṃ, pīnituṃ, pīnayati,

original: sunoti, sinoti, dunoti, hinoti, pahiṇithabbaṃ, pahiṇituṃ, pahiṇanaṃ.
analyzed: sunoti sinoti dunoti hinoti pahiṇithabbam pahiṇitum pahiṇanam
vā kvacid

original: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu. Mudito, ruditaṃ, roditaṃ.
analyzed: te kvacid vā na honti ka anubandhana āgamesu muditaḥ ruditam roditam

original: Kānubandhanāgamato-ññasmimpi te kvaci, nu honti. Khipako, panūdanaṃ, vadhako.
analyzed: ka anubandhana āgama tā uññasmin pi te kvaci nu honti vadhakaḥ
pye sissā
sissaḥ ā hoti pi ādese nissāya
e o nama ya vā sa re

original: Sare pare eonaṃ ayaavā honti. Jayo, bhavo, sarati kiṃ? Jeti, anubhoti.
analyzed: sare pare honti jayaḥ sarati kim jeti anubhoti
āyāvā ṇa anubandhe

original: Eonaṃ āyāvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe. Nāyayati, bhāvayati, ‘sayāpetvā’tiādīsu rassattaṃ.
analyzed: āyāvāḥ honti sa rādaḥ ṇa anubandhe nāyayati bhāvayati rassattam
ās sāṇa apimhi yuka

original: Ākārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇāpito-ññasmiṃ ṇānubandhe. Dāyako, ṇānubandhetveva? Dānaṃ, aṇāpimhīti kiṃ? Dāpayati.
analyzed: ā kāra antassa kriyatthassa hoti hoti ṇāpi tā uññasmin ṇā anubandhe dāyakaḥ dānam kim dāpayati
pada ādi inam kvaci

original: Padādīnaṃ yuka hoti kvaci. Nipajjitabbaṃ, nipajjituṃ nipajjanaṃ, pamajjitabbaṃ, pamajjituṃ, pamajjanaṃ, kvacīti kiṃ? Pādo.
analyzed: pada ādīnam hoti kvaci nipajjitabbam nipajjitum nipajjanam pamajjitabbam pamajjitum pamajjanam kvaci iti kim pādaḥ
mam vā

original: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti. Rundhituṃ, rujjhituṃ, kvacitveva? Nirodho.
analyzed: rudhā ādīnam kvacid vā hoti rundhitum rujjhitum kvacid tu eva nirodhaḥ
kvimhi lopa u nta byañjanassa

original: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvimhi. Bhattaṃ gasanti gaṇhanti vā etthāti bhattaggaṃ.
analyzed: anta byañjanassa lopaḥ hoti kvimhi bhattam gasanti gaṇhanti vā ettha ati bhattaggam

original: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato-ññasmiṃ byañjane. Bhettabbaṃ, byañjaneti kiṃ? Bhinditabbaṃ, ayakāreti kiṃ? Bhijjati.
analyzed: para rūpam hoti yakārataḥ uññasmim byañjane bhettabbam byañjana iti kim bhinditabbam a yakāra iti kim bhijjati
manānam niggahītam

original: Makāranakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ niggahītaṃ hoti ayakāre byañjane. Gantabbaṃ, jaṅghā, byañjanetveva? Gamanaṃ, ayakāretveva? Gamyate.
analyzed: makāra nakāra antānam niggahītam hoti ayakāre byañjane gantabbam jaṅghā byañjane tu eva gamanam ayakāre tu eva gamyate
na brūsso

original: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūmi, byañjanetveva? Abravi.
analyzed: brūssa o na hoti byañjane brūmi byañjane tvā iva abravi
ka gā ca jānam gha anubandhe

original: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamaṃ. Vākyaṃ, bhāgyaṃ.
analyzed: gha anubandhe cakāra jakāra antānam kriyatthānam kagāḥ honti yathākkamam vākyam bhāgyam
hanassa ghātaḥ ṇa anubandhe
hanassa ghātaḥ hoti ṇa anubandhe āghātaḥ
kvimhi ghaḥ pari pacca samohi

original: Payyādīhi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi. Paligho, paṭigho, aghaṃ rassattaṃ nipātanā, saṅgho, ogho.
analyzed: payya ādīhi parassa hanassa ghaḥ hoti kvimhi palighaḥ paṭighaḥ agham rassattam nipātanā saṅghaḥ oghaḥ
parassa gham se

original: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se. Jighaṃsā.
analyzed: dvitte parassa hanassa gham hoti se jighaṃsā
jiharānam gī

original: Dvitte paresaṃ jitarānaṃ gī hoti se. Vijigīsā, jigīsā.
analyzed: paresam jita rānam gī hoti se vijigīsā jigīsā
dhāssa ho

original: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti. Dahati.
analyzed: dvitte parassa ha hoti dahati
ṇimhi dīghaḥ dusassa

original: Dusassa dīgho hoti ṇimhi. Dusito. Ṇimhīti kiṃ? Duṭṭho.
analyzed: dusassa dīghaḥ hoti ṇimhi dusitaḥ ṇimhi iti kim duṭṭhaḥ
guhissa sare

original: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare. Nigūhanaṃ sareti kiṃ? Guyhaṃ.
analyzed: dīghaḥ hoti sare nigūhanam sarā iti kim guyham
muha baha anañca te ka anubandha itve

original: Muhabahānaṃ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite, mūḷho, bāḷho,

original: gūḷho, teti kiṃ? Muyhati, kānubandheti-kiṃ? Muyhitabbaṃ, atveti kiṃ? Muyhitvāna,
analyzed: gūḷhaḥ te iti kim a tvā iti kim
te kā anubandhetvā iti ayam adhikāraḥ yāva sāsassa
vahassussa

original: Vahassa ussa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Vuṭṭho.
analyzed: vahassa dīghaḥ hoti te ka anubandhe vuṭṭhaḥ
dhāssa hi

original: Dhā=dhāraṇetīmassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Nihito, nihitavā.
analyzed: hi hi hi nihitaḥ
gam ādi rānam lopaḥ u ntassa

original: Gamādīnaṃ rakārantānaṃ ca antassa lopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Gato,
analyzed: gama ādīnam rakāra antānam ca antassa lopaḥ hoti te ka anubandhe gataḥ

original: khato, hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato, tetveva? Gamyate, kānubandhetveva?
analyzed: khataḥ hataḥ mataḥ tataḥ saññataḥ rataḥ kataḥ te tu eva gamyate
gantabbam a tvā itvā iva gantvā ana gantvā
vacā ādīnam vassuṭa vā

original: Vacādīnaṃ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe-tve. Uttaṃ, vuttaṃ, uṭṭhaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ, ‘atvetveva? Vatvāna, vatvā.
analyzed: vacā ādīnam vassa vā uṭa hoti uttam vuttam uṭṭham vuṭṭham

original: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe-sve. Vuttaṃ, vuṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: vacā ādīnam assa u hoti vuttam vuṭṭham

original: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe tve. Vuddho. Vaddho. Atvetveva? Vaddhitvāna, vaddhitvā, kathaṃ ‘vuttī’ti? “Vuttīmatte”ti 3-69. nipātanā, ‘vattī’ti hoteva yathālakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kā anubandhe tve vuddhaḥ vaddhaḥ nipātanā vattī iti hotā iva yathālakkhaṇam

original: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī honti kānubandhe-tve. Iṭṭhaṃ, yiṭṭhaṃ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
analyzed: yajassa yassa ṭ iyī honti ka anubandha itve iṭṭham yiṭṭham yajitvā

analyzed: ṭhāssi ha iti ṭhitaḥ
gāpānamī

original: Gāpānamī hoti kānabandhe-tve. Gītaṃ, pītaṃ, atvetveva? Gāyitvā niccaṃ yāgamo, pāssa tu pītvāti bahulādhikārā.
analyzed: gītam pītam gāyitvā niccam tu pītvā ati bahula adhikārā

original: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
analyzed: ā hoti janitvā

original: Sāsassa sisa vā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Siṭṭhaṃ, satthaṃ, sisso, sāsiyo atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
analyzed: vā hoti siṭṭham sattham

original: Tumādīsu vā karassā hoti. Kātuṃ kattuṃ, kātuna kattuna, kātabbaṃ kattabbaṃ.
analyzed: tum ādīsu vā karassā hoti kātum kattum kātuna kattuna kātabbam kattabbam

original: Ñādhātussa jā hoti nakāre. Jānituṃ, jānanto, neti kiṃ? Ñāto.
analyzed: ñā dhātussa jā hoti nakāre jānitum jānantaḥ na iti kim ñātaḥ

original: Sakaāpānaṃ kukakuiccete āgamā honti ṇakāre. Sakkuṇanto, pāpuṇanto, sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti, ṇeti kiṃ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
analyzed: saka āpānam ku ka ku it ca ite āgamāḥ honti ṇakāre sakkuṇantaḥ pāpuṇantaḥ sakkuṇoti pāpuṇoti ṇa iti kim sakkoti pāpeti
n itaḥ cissa chaḥ

original: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti. Nicchayo.
analyzed: nismā parassa cissa chaḥ hoti nicchayaḥ
vā

original: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā. Jīraṇaṃ, jīrati, jīrāpeti, nisīditabbaṃ,
analyzed: paras hoti vibhāsā jīraṇam jīrati nisīditabbam

original: nisīdanaṃ, nisīdituṃ, nisīdati, vāti kiṃ? Jarā, nisajjā, ‘īma vā’ti yogavibhāgā aññesampi,

saṃyoga ādi lopa utthassa

original: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
analyzed: disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā

original: Disassa passādayo honti vibhāsā. Vipassanā, vipassituṃ, vipassati, sudassī, piyadassī,

original: dhammadassī, sudassaṃ, dassanaṃ, dasseti, daṭṭhabbaṃ. Daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṃ, duddaso, addasa,

original: addā, addaṃ, addakkhi, dakkhissati, vātveva? Dissanti bālā.

original: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīvikkhakesu. Sarī, sadī, sarikkho, sadikkho, sariso, sadiso.
analyzed: samāna saddataḥ parassa disassa ra hoti vā rī vikkhakesu sarī sadī sarikkhaḥ sarisaḥ sadisaḥ

original: Dahassa dassa ḍo hoti vā. Ḍāho, dāho, ḍahati, dahati.
analyzed: dahassa dassa ḍaḥ hoti vā ḍāhaḥ dāhaḥ ḍahati dahati

original: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hoti anaghaṇasu. Āḷahanaṃ, pariḷāho.
analyzed: ā parīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷaḥ hoti an a gha ṇasu āḷahanam pariḷāhaḥ
atya ādi nte su atthiḥ sa bhū

original: Tyādintavajjitesu paccayesu ‘asa=bhuvi’iccassa bhū hoti. Bhavitabbaṃ. Ādesavidhānamasassāppayogatthametasmiṃ
analyzed: tya ādi nta vat jitesu paccayesu asa bhu vi itcassa bhū hoti bhavitabbam ādesa vidhānam asa ssa ap payoga ttham etasmin

original: visaye, etena katthaci kassaci dhātussa appayogāpi ñāpito hoti. Atyādintesūti kiṃ?
analyzed: visaye etena katthaci kassaci dhātussa appayogā api ñāpitaḥ hoti ati ādi ntesu iti kim

original: Atthi, santo, atthissāti kiṃ? Assatissa mā hotu.
analyzed: atthi santaḥ atthissa ati kim assatissa mā hotu
a āssa āādīsu

original: Aādo, āādo, ssādo ca atthissa bhū hoti. Babhūva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
analyzed: ca atthissa bhū hoti babhūva abhavā abhavissā bhavissati

original: 130. Ntamānantiyiyuṃsvādilopo. Ntādisūtthissādilopo hoti. Santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṃ, etesvīti kiṃ? Atthi.
analyzed: nta māna ntiyi yuṃsu ādi lopaḥ nta ādisu utthissa ādi lopaḥ hoti santaḥ samānaḥ santi santu siyā siyum etesu iti kim atthi
pā t itaḥ ṭha assa vā ṭha haḥ kvaci

original: Pādīhi kiriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti. Saṇṭhahanto
analyzed: pa ādīhi kiriyā visesa jotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhahaḥ vā hoti saṇṭhahantaḥ

original: santiṭṭhanto. Saṇṭhahati, santiṭṭhati. Pa parā apa saṃ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api
analyzed: santiṭṭhantaḥ saṇṭhahati santiṭṭhati pa parā apa sam anu ava o ni du vi adhi api

original: atisu u abhi pati pari upa ā pādī. Kvacīti kiṃ? Saṇṭhiti.
analyzed: ati su u abhi pati pari upa ā pādī kvaci iti kim
dāssiyaṅa

original: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci. Anādiyitvā, samādiyati, kvacitveva? Ādāya.
analyzed: parassa dāssa hoti kvaci an ādiyitvā samādiyati ādāya
karotissa kho

original: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Saṅkhāro, saṅkharīyati, karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṃ timhi ca vikaraṇuppattiñāpetuṃ.
analyzed: pād itaḥ parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti saṅkhāraḥ saṅkharīyati karassa ati avatvā karotissa ati vacanam timhi ca vikaraṇa uppatti ñāpetum
purā asmai

original: Purā iccasmā nipātā parassa karassa kha hoti. Purakkhatvā, purekkhāro-ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
analyzed: purā i t casmā nipātā parassa karassa kha hoti purakkhatvā tad amina ādi pāṭhā
n i taḥ kamassa

original: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti, nikkhamati, kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
analyzed: nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti nikkhamati kvaci tu eva nikkamaḥ
yu va ṇ na am iyaṅ uvaṅa sare

original: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇattānaṃ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅa hoti sare kvaci. Vediyati, bruvanti, sareti kiṃ? Nivedeti, brūti, kvacitveva? Jayati, bhavati.
analyzed: kriyatthānam iyaṅ uvaṅa hoti sare kvaci bruvanti sara iti kim niveda iti brūti kvaci tu eva jayati bhavati
aññ ā t issā assī kye

original: Ñādito-ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Dīyati, aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, tāyatiṃ.
analyzed: ña ādi toññassa ā kāra antassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye dīyati añña ādissa ati kim

original: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye. Tāyate, taññate.
analyzed: tanassa ā hoti vā kye tāyate taññate
dīghaḥ sarassa

original: Sarantassa kriyatthassa dīgho hoti kye, cīyate, sūyate.
analyzed: sarantassa kriyatthassa dīghaḥ hoti kye cīyate sūyate
sa anantarassa tassa ṭhaḥ

original: Sakārantato kriyatthā parassā-nantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Tuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā, tuṭṭhabbaṃ, tuṭṭhi, anantarassāti kiṃ? Tussitvā.
analyzed: sakāra antataḥ parassa anantarassa takārassa hoti tuṭṭhaḥ tuṭṭhavā tuṭṭhabbam tuṭṭhi anantarassa ati kim tussitvā

original: Kasasmā parassānantarassa tassa ṭha hoti kasassa vā ima ca. Kiṭṭhaṃ, kaṭṭhaṃ, anantarassātveva? Kasitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kasasma parassa anantarassa tassa hoti kasassa vā ca ca kasitabbam

ete saddāḥ nipaccante
puccha ād itaḥ

original: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho, anantarassātveva? Pucchitvā.

original: Ktvāssa vā tuṃyānā honti samāse kvacci. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ abhiharitvā, anumodiyāna anumoditvā, asamāsepi bahulādhi kārā, daṭṭhuṃ disvā, esamappavisayatāñāpanattho yogavibhāgo.
