uṃssim svaṃsu

original: Umīccassa iṃsu aṃsu vā honti. Agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ.
analyzed: um ī ccassa iṃsu aṃsu vā honti agamiṃsu agamaṃsu agamum
e o ttā sum

original: Eādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṃ vā hoti. Nesuṃ, nayiṃsu, assosuṃ, assuṃ, ādesattākhyāpanatthaṃttaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: e ādesataḥ o ādesataḥ ca parassa um iccassa sum vā hoti nesum nayiṃsu assosum assum ādesa tta ākhyāpana ttha tta gahaṇaṃ
hūtaḥ resum

original: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṃ vā hoti. Ahesuṃ, ahavuṃ.
analyzed: hūtaḥ parassa um iccassa resum vā hoti ahesum ahavum
ossa a i ttha ttho

original: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Tvaṃ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho abhavo.
analyzed: ossa a ādayaḥ vā honti tvam abhava abhavi abhavittha abhavittha
si

original: Ossa si vā hoti. Ahosi tvaṃ ahuvo.
analyzed: si vā hoti tvam
dīghāḥ īs sa

original: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi akā, adāsi adā.
analyzed: dīghataḥ parassa īssa si vā hoti akāsi akā adāsi adā
mha āt tha ana muña

original: Mhātthānamhaña vā hoti. Agamhamhā agamimhā, agamuttha agamittha.
analyzed: vā hoti a gamhamhā a gamimhā agamuttha agamittha
iṃssa ca siña

original: Imiccassa siña vā toti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ. Akāsiṃ akariṃ, akāsimhā akarimhā akāsittha akarittha.
analyzed: im iccassa siña vā to ti mha atthānam ca bahulam akāsim akarim akāsimhā akarimhā akāsittha akarittha
ey yuṃs sum

original: Eyyumiccassa ñaṃ vā hoti. Gacchuṃ gaccheyyuṃ.
analyzed: vā hoti gacchum gaccheyyum
hiḥ sataḥ lopaḥ

original: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti. Gaccha gacchāhi, atoti kiṃ? Karohi.
analyzed: a taḥ parassa hissa lopaḥ vā hoti gaccha gacchāhi atoti kim karohi
kyassa sse

original: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Anvabhavissā anvabhūyissā, anubhavissati anuchūyissati.
analyzed: kyassa vā lopaḥ hoti sse anvabhavissā anvabhūyissā anubhavissati anucchūyissati

original: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sa su sa satha saṃ sāma.
analyzed: sa su sa satha sam sāma

original: Asa=bhuviccasmā paresaṃ eyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ. Assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṃ, assāma.
analyzed: paresam sa ādayaḥ honti yathākkamam sa ādayaḥ honti yathākkamam assa assu assa assatha assam assāma
ādi dvit namiya āiyum

original: Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ iyā iyuṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Siyā, siyuṃ.
analyzed: ādi bhūtānam dvinnam iyā iyum honti yathākkamam siyā siyum
tassa thaḥ

original: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti. Atthi, atthu.
analyzed: atthitaḥ parassa takārassa thaḥ hoti atthi atthu
sihi svaṭa

original: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu, ṭo sabbādesattho. Asi ahi.
analyzed: atthissa a ṭa hoti si hi su ṭaḥ sabba ādesa atthaḥ asi a hi
mimānam vā mhimhā ca

original: Atthismā paresaṃ mimānaṃ mhimhā vā honti, taṃsanniyogenaatthissa aṭa ca. Amhi asmi, amha asma.
analyzed: paresam mimānam mhi mhā vā honti tad sanniyogena atthissa aṭa ca amhi asmi amha asma
esu si

original: Esu mimesu atthissa sakāro hoti. Asmi asma, pararūpabādhanatthaṃ.
analyzed: esu mimesu atthissa sakāraḥ hoti asmi asma para rūpa bādhana ttham
ī ā taḥ dīghaḥ

original: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi. Āsi, āsuṃ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṃ, āsiṃ mhā.
analyzed: atthissa dīghaḥ hoti ī ādimhi āsi āsum āsi āsittha āsim āsim mhā
hi mi me svassa

original: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Pacāhi, pacāmi, pacāma, muyhāmi.
analyzed: akārassa dīghaḥ hoti hi mimesu pacāhi pacāmi pacāma muyhāmi
sakāḥ ṇāssa khaḥ ī ādaḥ
sakasmā ī ādīsu asakkhi asakkhiṃsu
s se vā

original: Sakasmā kṇassakho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissā sakkuṇissā, sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
analyzed: sakasmā kṇassakhaḥ vā hoti sse sakkhissā sakkuṇissā sakkhissati sakkuṇissati
tesu sutaḥ kṇokṇānam roṭa

original: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṃ kṇokṇānaṃ roṭa vā hoti. Assosi asuṇi, assossā asuṇissā, sossati suṇissati.
analyzed: tesu ī ā dissesu su taḥ paresam kṇokṇānam vā hoti assosi asuṇi assossā asuṇissā sossati suṇissati

original: 61. Ñāssa sanāssa nāyo timhi. Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, jānāti.
analyzed: timhi sanāssa nāyaḥ timhi sanāssa nāyaḥ vā hoti timhi nāyati jānāti
ñāmhi jam

original: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ (vā) hoti. Jaññā (jāneyya).
analyzed: ñā dese sa nā assa ñā assa jam vā hoti jaññā jāneyya
ey yās siyāñāḥ vā

original: Ñāto eyyāssa iyāñā honti vā. Jāniyā, jaññā jāneyya.
analyzed: ñātaḥ eyyāssa iyāñā honti vā jāniyā jaññā jāneyya
īs satya ādīsu kna a lopaḥ

original: Īādo ssatyādo ca ñāto knālopo vā hoti. Aññāsi ajāni, ñassati jānissati.
analyzed: ī ādaḥ ssati ādaḥ ca ña ā taḥ knā lopaḥ vā hoti aññāsi ajāni ñassati jānissati
ssassa hi kamme

original: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme. Paññāyihiti paññāyissati.
analyzed: ñātaḥ parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme paññāyihiti paññāyissati
etismā

original: Etismā parassa ssassa hi hoti vā. Ehiti essati.
analyzed: e tismā parassa ssassa hi hoti vā e hiti essati
hanā chakhā

original: Hanā ssassa chakhā vā honti. Hañchāmi hanissāmi, paṭihaṅkhāmi paṭihanissāmi.
analyzed: hanā ssassa chakhā vā honti hañchāmi hanissāmi paṭihaṅkhāmi paṭihanissāmi
ha a taḥ ha

original: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā. Hāhati jahissati.
analyzed: hā taḥ parassa ssassa ha hoti vā hāhati jahissati
dakkha kha hehi ho hi lopaḥ

original: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati, sakkhati sakkhissati, hehiti hehissatihohiti hohissati.
analyzed: dakkha ādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopaḥ vā hoti dakkhati dakkhissati sakkhati sakkhissati he hiti he hissati ho hiti ho hissati
kayi reyyas seyyuma ādīnam

original: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṃ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṃ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kahirāmi, kayirāma.
analyzed: kayirā parassa eyyum ādīnam eyyassa lopaḥ hoti kayirum kayirāsi kayirātha kahirāmi kayirāma
ṭā

original: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
analyzed: kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti sā u kayirā
ethassā

original: Kayirā parassa ethassa ā hoti. Kayirātha.
analyzed: kayirā parassa ethassa ā hoti kayirā atha

original: 73. Labhā iṃ īnaṃ thaṃ thā vā.
analyzed: vā

original: Labhasmā iṃīiccesaṃ thaṃthā honti vā. Alatthaṃ alabhiṃ, alattha alabhi.
analyzed: thaṃthāḥ honti vā alattham alabhim alattha alabhi
guru pubbāḥ rassāḥ re nta e ntīnam

original: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṃ ntentīnaṃ re vā hoti. Gacchare gacchanti, gacchare gacchante, gamissare gamissanti, gamissare gamissante, gurupubbāti kiṃ? Paca, rassati kiṃ? Honti.
analyzed: guru pubbasmā rassā paresam nta intīnam re vā hoti gacchare gacchanti gacchare gacchante gamissare gamissanti gamissare gamissante guru pubbā ati kim paca rassati kim honti
ṭe

original: Eyyādīnaṃ ṭe vā hoti. So kare kareyya, tvaṃ kare kareyyāsi, ahaṃ kare kareyyaṃ.
analyzed: vā hoti saḥ kare kareyya tvam kare kareyya asi aham kare kareyyam
o vikaraṇassu paracchakke

original: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakke visaye. Tanute.
analyzed: ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakke visaye tanute
pubbat śakke vā kvacid

original: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke. Vanuti vanoti.
analyzed: o vikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke vanuti vanoti
ey yāmas semu ca

original: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti u ca. Bhavemha, bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
analyzed: vā hoti u ca bhavemha bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma
iti moggallāne byākaraṇe vuttiyam
tya ādi kaṇḍaḥ chaṭṭhaḥ
sattamaḥ kaṇḍaḥ ṇu ādi
bahulam ca sabbattha

original: 1. Cara dara kara raha jana sana tala sāda sādha kasāsa caṭāya vāhi ṇu.
analyzed: cara dara kara raha jana sana tala sāda sādha kasāsa caṭāya vāhi ṇu

original: Cara-gatibhakkhaṇesu, dara-daraṇe, kara-karaṇe, raha-cāge, jana-janane, sana-sambhattiyaṃ,
analyzed: cara gati bhakkhaṇesu dara daraṇe kara karaṇe raha cāge jana janane sana sambhattiyam
kasa vilekhane asa khepane

original: caṭa-bhedane, aya-iti gamanattho daṇḍako dhātu, vā-gatigandhanesu, etehi kriyatthehi
analyzed: caṭa bhedane gamana tthaḥ daṇḍakaḥ dhātu vāc ati gandhanesu etehi kriyatthehi

original: bahulaṃ ṇu hoti. “Assā ṇānubandhe”ti (5.84) upantassa assa ā, carati hadaye manuññabhāvenāti
analyzed: bahulam nu hoti assā upantassa assaḥ ā carati hadaye manuñña bhāvena ati

original: cāru=sobhanaṃ. Darīyatīti dāra=kaṭṭhaṃ. Karotīti kāru=sippī, magha vā, visukammo
analyzed: cāru sobhanam darīyati iti dārakaṭṭham karoti iti kāru sippī vā visu kammo

original: ca. Rahati candādīnaṃ sobhāvisesaṃ nāsetīti rāhu=asurindo. Jāyati gamanāgamanaṃ anenātijānu=jaṅghorūnaṃ
analyzed: ca rahati sobhā visesam nāseti iti rāhu asuḥ indo jāyati gamana āgamanam

original: sandhi. Saneti attani bhattiṃ uppādetīti sānu=girippadeso. Talanti patiṭṭhahanti
analyzed: sandhi saneti attani bhattim uppādeti iti sānu giri padeso talanti patiṭṭhahanti

original: ettha dantāti tālu=vadanekadeso. Sā dīyati assādīyatīti sādu=madhuraṃ. Sādheti attaparahitanti
analyzed: ettha tālu vat aneka desaḥ sā dīyati sādhā iti

original: sādhu=sajjano. Kasīyatīti kāsu=āvāṭo, asati sīghabhāvena pavattatīti āsu=sīghaṃ.
analyzed: sādhu sat janaḥ kasīyati iti kāsu āvāṭaḥ asati sīgha bhāvena pavattati iti

original: Caṭati bhindati amanuññabhāvanti cāṭu=manuñño. Ayanti pavattanti sattā etenāti āyu=jīvitaṃ.
analyzed: caṭati bhindati amanuñña bhāvanti cāṭu manuññaḥ ayanti pavattanti sattāḥ etena ati āyu jīvitam

original: “Assā ṇāpimhi yuka” iti (5.91) yuka- vāti gacchatīti vāyu-vāto.
analyzed: iti vāti gacchati iti vāyuvātaḥ

original: 2. Bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana baṃha kambamba cakkha bhikkha saṃkindanda yaja paṭāṇāsa vasa pasa paṃsa bandhā u.
analyzed: bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana baṃha kambamba cakkha bhikkha saṃkindanda yaja paṭāṇāsa vasa pasa paṃsa bandhā u

original: Bhara-bharaṇe, mara-pāṇacāge, cara-gatibhakkhaṇesu, tara taraṇe, ara-gamane, gara
analyzed: bhara bharaṇe mara pāṇa cāge cara gati bhakkhaṇesu tara taraṇe ara gamane gara

original: ghara-secane, girāti vā nipātanā akāro, hana-hiṃ sāyaṃ, tana-vittāre, mana-ñāṇe,
analyzed: ghara secane girā ati vā nipātanā akāraḥ hana him sāyam tana vittāre mana ñāṇe

original: bhama-anavaṭṭhāne, kita-nivāse, dhana-sadde, baṃha braha brūha-vuddhiyaṃ, kamba-saṃvaraṇe,
analyzed: kita nivāse dhana sadde kamba saṃvaraṇe

original: amba-sadde, cakkha ikkha dassane, bhikkha-yācane, saṃkasaṅkāyaṃ, inda-paramissariye,
analyzed: amba sadde cakkhe ikkha dassane bhikkha yācane saṃka saṅkāyam inda paramissariye

original: anda-bandhane, yaja-devapūjāyaṃ, aṭa paṭa-gamanathā, aṇa-saddattho, asa-khepane,
analyzed: anda bandhane aṭa asa khepane

original: vasa-nivāse, pasabādhane, paṃsa-nāsane, bandha-bandhane, etehi kriyatthehi u hoti.
analyzed: vasa nivāse pasa bādhane paṃsanā āsane bandha bandhane etehi kriyatthehi u hoti

original: Bharatīti bhara=bhattā. Marati rūpakāyena sahevāti maru=devo, nijjaladeso ca. Carīyati
analyzed: bharati iti bharabhattā marati rūpa kāyena saha iva ati marudevaḥ ca carīyati

original: bhakkhīyatīti caru=habyapā ko. Taranti anenāti taru=rukkho. Arati sūnabhāvena uddhaṃ
analyzed: bhakkhīyati iti kaḥ taranti anena ati taru rukkhaḥ arati sūna bhāvena uddham

original: gacchatīti aru=vaṇo. Garati siñcati, girati vamati vā sissesu sinehanti garu=ācariyo.
analyzed: gacchati iti aruvaṇaḥ garati siñcati girati vamati vā sissesu sinehanti

original: Hanati odanādīsu vaṇṇavisesaṃ nāsetīti hanu=vadanekadeso. Tanoti saṃsāra dukkhanti
analyzed: odana ādīsu vaṇṇa visesam nāseti iti hanu vat aneka deso tanoti dukkhanti

original: tanu-sarīraṃ. Maññati sattānaṃ hitāhitanti manu=pajāpati. Bhamati calatīti bhamu=nayano
analyzed: tanu sarīram maññati sattānam bhamati calati iti

original: patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ketati uddhaṃ gacchati, upari nivasatīti vā ketu=dhajo. Dhanati saddaṃ
analyzed: patiṭṭhānam ketati uddham gacchati upari nivasati iti vā ketu dhajaḥ dhanati saddam

original: karotīti dhanu=cāpo. Baṃha iti niddesā umhi niccaṃ niggahītalopo, baṃhati vuddhiṃ
analyzed: karoti iti dhanu cāpaḥ baṃhaḥ iti niddesāḥ umhi niccam niggahīta lopaḥ baṃhati vuddhim

original: gacchatīti bahu=anappakaṃ. Kambati saṃvaraṃ karotīthi kambu=valayo, saṅkho ca. Ambati
analyzed: gacchati iti bahu anappakam kambati saṃvaram karoti ithi kambu valayaḥ saṅkhaḥ ca

original: nādaṃkarotīti ambu=vāri. Cakkhati rūpanti cakkhu=nayanaṃ. Bhikkhatīti bhikkhu=samaṇo.
analyzed: nādaṃkaroti iti ambu vāri cakkhati rūpanti cakkhu nayanam bhikkhati iti bhikkhu samaṇaḥ

original: Saṃkiratīti saṃku=sūlaṃ. Indati nakkhattānaṃ paramissariyaṃ pavattetīti indu=cando.
analyzed: saṃkirati iti saṃkusūlam indati nakkhattānam paramissariyam pavatteti iti indu candaḥ

original: Andanti bandhanti sattā etāyāti andu=saṅkhalikā. Yajanti anenāti yaju=vedo. Paṭati
analyzed: andanti bandhanti sattāḥ etāya ati andu saṅkhalikāḥ yajanti anena ati yaju vedaḥ paṭati

original: byattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṭu=vicakkhaṇo. Aṇati sukhumabhāvena pavattatīti aṇu=sukhumo,
analyzed: byatta bhāvam gacchati iti paṭu vicakkhaṇaḥ sukhuma bhāvena pavattati iti aṇu sukhumaḥ

original: vīhibhedo ca. Asanti pavattanti sattā etehīti asavo=pāṇā. Sukhaṃ vasantyanenāti vasu=dhanaṃ.
analyzed: ca asanti pavattanti sattāḥ etehi iti sukham vasanti anena ati vasu dhanam

original: Pasīyati bādhīyati sāmikehīti pasu. Catuppado. Paṃsati sobhāvisesaṃ nāsetīti paṃsu=reṇu.
analyzed: pasīyati bādhīyati sāmikehi iti catuppadaḥ paṃsati sobhā visesam nāseti iti paṃsu reṇu
bandhīyati sineha bhāvena ati
bandhau u vadho ca

original: Bandha-bandhane timasmā ū hoti, bandhassa vadhādeso ca. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attani satthe bandhatīti vadhū-suṇisā, itthīca.
analyzed: bandha bandhane timasmai hoti bandhassa vadha ādesaḥ ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi satthe bandhati iti vadhū suṇisā itthī ca
jamba ādayaḥ

original: Jambūādayo saddāūpaccayantā nipaccante, nipātanaṃ appattassa pāpanaṃ pattassa paṭisedho
analyzed: jambu ādayaḥ nipaccante nipātanam appattassa pāpanam pattassa paṭisedhaḥ

original: ca. Janismā ū, bukāgamo, “manānaṃ niggahīta”nti (5.96) nassa niggahītaṃ, “vagge vagganto”ti
analyzed: ca jani smai u buka āgamaḥ manānam niggahītanti nassa niggahītam vagge

original: (1.41) niggahītassa mo, jāyati, janīyatī vā jambū=rukkho. Bhamissa amalopo, bhamati
analyzed: niggahītassa maḥ jāyati janīyatī vā jambu rukkhaḥ bhamissa ama lopaḥ bhamati

original: kampatīti bhū=bhamu. Karotismā ū, tassa kandhuña ca, “pararūpamayakāre byañjane”ti
analyzed: kampati iti ca para rūpam a yakāre byañjanā iti

original: (5.95) dhātvantassa byañjanassa pararūpattaṃ, rudhiruppādaṃ karotīti kakkandhū=badarī.
analyzed: dhātu antassa byañjanassa rudhira uppādam karoti iti kakkandhūbadarī

original: Lamba-avasaṃsane, āpubbo, saṃyogādilopadīgharassā, ālambati avasaṃsatīti alābū=tumbi.
analyzed: lamba avasaṃsane āpubbaḥ saṃyoga ādi lopa dīgha rassā ālambati avasaṃsati iti alābū tumbi

original: Sara-gati hiṃsācintāsu, ūmhi abhuka abuka ca, sarati gacchatīti sarabhū=ekā mahānadī.
analyzed: hiṃsā cintāsu ca sarati gacchati iti sarabhūekā mahā nadī

original: Sarati pāṇe hiṃsatīti sarabū=khuddajantukaviseso. Camaadane, camati bhakkhati nivāpanti
analyzed: sarati pāṇe hiṃsati iti cama adane camati bhakkhati nivāpanti

original: camū=senā. Tana-vitthāre, tanoti saṃsāradukkhanti tanu=sarīraṃ, evamaññepi payogato daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: camū senā tana vitthāre tanoti saṃsāra dukkhan ti tanu sarīram evam aññe pi payogataḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: 5. Tapusa vi dha kura putha mudā ku.
analyzed: tapusa vi dha kura putha mudā ku

original: Tapa-santāpe, usa-dāhe, vidha-vedhane, kura-sadde, putha patha-vitthāre, muda-tose,
analyzed: tapa santāpe usa dāhe vidha vedhane kura sadde putha patha vitthāre muda tose

original: etehi ku, hoti. Kakāronubandho “na te kānubandhanāgamesū”ti (5.85) eonamabhāvattho.
analyzed: etehi hoti kakāraḥ anubandhaḥ na te ka anubandhana āgamesu iti

original: Tapa iti niddesatova assa ittaṃ, tāpīyatīti tipu=lohaviseso. Usati dāhaṃ karotīti
analyzed: tapaḥ iti niddesato va assa tāpīyati iti tipu loha visesaḥ usati dāham karoti iti

original: usu=saro. Vedhati raṃsīhi timiranti vidhu=cando. Kurati kiccākiccaṃ vadatīti kuru=rājā,

original: kuravo=janapado. Puthati mahanthabhāvena patthiratīti puthu=vitthiṇṇo, modanaṃ, mudīyatīti vā mudu=athaddho.

kama padā ṇukaḥ

original: Kama-icchāyaṃ, pada-gamane, etehi ṇuko hoti. “Ṇiṇāpīna”nti (5.160) yogavibhāgā ṇilopo. Kāmetīti kāmuko=kāmayitā. Pajjati yāti etāyāti pādukā=pādopakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: pada gamane etehi ṇukaḥ hoti yogavibhāgāḥ yogavibhāgāḥ yogavibhāgāḥ kāmeti iti kāmukā u kāmayitā pajjati yāti pādukā pāda upakaraṇam
maṇḍa salā ṇūkaḥ

original: Maṇḍa-bhūsane, sala-gamanattho daṇḍako dhātu, etehi ṇūko hoti. Maṇḍeti jalaṃ bhūsetīti maṇḍūko=bheko, salati gocaratta mupayātīti sālūkaṃ=uppalakaṇḍo.
analyzed: maṇḍa bhūsane daṇḍakaḥ dhātu etehi ṇūkaḥ hoti maṇḍeti jalam bhūseti iti maṇḍūkaḥ bhekaḥ salati gocarattam upayāti iti
ulūka ādayaḥ

original: Ulūkādayo saddā ṇūkantā nipaccante. Ula-gavesane, ottābhāvo nipātanā, ulati gavesatīti
analyzed: ulūka ādayaḥ saddāḥ nipaccante ula gavesane nipātanā ulati gavesati iti

original: ulūko=kosiyo. Mana=ñāṇe, nassa dhattaṃ, maññatīti madhūko=rukkho. Jala-dittiyaṃ,
analyzed: ulūka ukosiyaḥ mana ñāṇe nassa dhattam maññati iti madhūka urukkhaḥ jaladittiyam
jalati iti evam aññe pi
kasā sako
sakaḥ hoti kasati iti
karā tikaḥ

original: Karotismā tiko hoti. Karonti kīḷaṃ etthāti kattiko=bāhulo.
analyzed: karotismā tikaḥ hoti karonti ettha ati kattikobāhulo
isā ṭhakana

original: Isa siṃsa-icchāyaṃ, iccasmā ṭhakana hoti. Icchīyatīti iṭṭhakā=mattikāvikāro.
analyzed: iccasmā hoti icchīyati iti
samā kho

original: Sama-upasamakhedesu, etasmā kho hoti. Sameti upasametīti saṅkho=kambu.
analyzed: sama aupasama khedesu etasmai kho hoti sameti upasameti iti
mukhāḥ dayaḥ

original: Mukha ādayo khantā nipaccante. Mu-bandhane, ottābhāvo nipātanā, munanti bandhanti
analyzed: mukhe ādayaḥ khantāḥ nipaccante mu bandhane nipātanāḥ munanti bandhanti

original: etenāti mukhaṃ=lapanaṃ. Si-sevāyaṃ, ettā bhāvo nipātanā, sayanti ettha ūkā kusuma-dayo
analyzed: etena ati mukhaṃlapanam bhāvaḥ nipātanā

original: cāti sikhā=cūḷā. Vipubbassa sissa, visatissa vā, visesena sayanti ettha, pavisantīti
analyzed: ca ati sikhācūḷāḥ vipubbassa sissa visatissa vā visesena sayanti ettha pavisanti iti

original: visikhā=racchā. Kana-dītti gati kantīsu, nipubbo, anabhāgalopo, kanati dibbatīti
analyzed: visikhā racchā kanati gati kantīsu nipubbaḥ an a bhāga lopaḥ kanati dibbati iti

original: nikkho=suvaṇṇavikāro. Mayaiti gamanattho daṇḍako dhātu, khassa ūña, mayati yātīti
analyzed: nikkhosuvaṇṇa vikāraḥ mayā eti gamana atthaḥ daṇḍakaḥ dhātu khassa yāti iti

original: mayūkho-kiraṇo. Lū-chedane, otthābhāvo, lunāti chindati sobhanti lūkho=asiniddho.
analyzed: lū chedane lū chedane lūkha uasi niddhaḥ

original: Ara-gamane, aranti yanti etenāti akkho=sakaṭāvayavā, pāsako ca. Yasa-payatane, yassati
analyzed: ara gamane aranti yanti etena ati akkhosa kaṭa avayavā pāsakaḥ ca yasa payatane

original: payatati balimāharaṇatthāyāti yakkho=amanusso, ruha-janane, ruhati jāyatīti rukkho=pādapo,
analyzed: payatati balim āharaṇa atthāya ati yakkhaḥ amanussaḥ ruha janane ruhati jāyati iti rukkha upādapaḥ

original: usa-dāhe, usati dahati kāmaggināti ukkho=balībaddo. Saha-marisane ‘halopo, sahati
analyzed: usa dāhe usati dahati kāmagginā ati ukkhobalībaddaḥ saha marisane ha lopaḥ sahati
attani kata aparādham khamati iti sakhā sahāyaḥ evam aññe pi

original: 32. Aja vaja muda gada gamā gaka.
analyzed: aja vaja muda gada gamā gaka

original: Aja vaja-gamane, muda-tose, gada-vacane, ama gama-gamane, etehi gaka hoti. Ajati
analyzed: aja vaja gamane gada vacane ama gama gamane etehi hoti ajati

original: gacchati seṭṭhabhāvanti aggo-seṭṭho. Vajati samūhattaṃ gacchatīti vaggo=samūho. Mudanti
analyzed: gacchati seṭṭha bhāvanti aggo seṭṭhaḥ vajati samūha ttam gacchati iti vaggo samūhaḥ mudanti

original: etenāti muggo=dhaññaviseso. Gadatīti gaggo=isi. “Manānaṃ niggahīta”nti (5.96) massa
analyzed: etena ati muggodhañña visesaḥ gadati iti gaggoisi manānam niggahītanti
niggahītam gacchati iti gaṅgā asurāpagā
siṅga ādayaḥ

original: Siṅgaādayo saddā gakaantā nipaccante. Sī-saye, niggahītāgamo, rassattañca, sayati
analyzed: siṅga ādayaḥ saddāḥ ga ka antāḥ nipaccante niggahīta āgamaḥ ras sattam ca

original: pavattati matthaketi siṅgaṃ=visāṇaṃ. Phura-calane, limuṅa, phurati calatīti puliṅgo=jalitaṅgā
analyzed: pavattati matthaka iti siṅgam visāṇam phura calane phurati calati iti

original: rāvayavo. Cala-kampane, upubbo, calassa cāliṃ, uccalati kampatīti uccāliṅgo=sukkakīṭo,
analyzed: cala kampane upubbaḥ calassa uccalati kampati iti uccāliṅga usukka kīṭaḥ

original: kala-sadde, imuka, kalati abhinādaṃ karoti bahurajjatāyā ti kaliṅgo=dakkhiṇāpatho.
analyzed: kala sadde kalati abhinādam karoti bahu rajja tāya ti kaliṅgaḥ dakkhiṇāpathaḥ

original: Bhama-anavaṭṭhāne, assa ittaṃ, bhamatīti bhiṅgo=bhamaro. Paṭa aṭa-gamane, paṭissa
analyzed: bhama anavaṭṭhāne assa ittam bhamati iti bhiṅgobhamaro paṭa aṭa gamane

original: amuka, aka ca. Paṭati patanto gacchatīti paṭaṅgo, paṭago=salabho, evamaññepi.
analyzed: ca paṭati patantaḥ gacchati iti paṭaṅgo paṭagosalabho evam aññe pi
a gāḥ gi

original: Aga-kuṭilagamanetīmasmā gi hoti. Agati kuṭilo hutvā gacchatīti aggi=pāvako.
analyzed: aga kuṭila gamana iti imasmai hoti agati kuṭilaḥ hutvā gacchati iti aggi pāvakaḥ
yāvalā gu

original: Yā-pāpuṇane, vala valla-saṃvaraṇe, etehi gu hoti. Yātīti yāgu=peyyā. Valīyati saṃvarīyatīti vaggu=manuñño.
analyzed: yā pāpuṇane vala valla saṃvaraṇe etehi hoti yāti iti valīyati saṃvarīyati iti
phegga ādayaḥ

original: Pheggu ādayo guantā nipaccante. Phala-nipphattiyaṃ, assa ettaṃ, phalati niṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pheggu ādayaḥ gu antāḥ nipaccante phala nipphattiyam assa ettam phalati niṭṭhānam

original: gacchatīti pheggu=asāro. Bhara-bharaṇe, ralopo. Bharatīti bhagu=isi. Hi-gatīyaṃ,
analyzed: gacchati iti phegguasāraḥ bhara bharaṇe ra lopaḥ bharati iti higatīyam

original: niggahītāgamo, hino ti pavattatīti hiṅgu=rāmaṭhajaṃ. Kama-icchāyaṃ, kāmīyatīti kaṅgu=dhaññaviseso, evamaññepi.
analyzed: niggahīta āgamaḥ ti pavattati iti hiṅgu rāmaṭha jam kāmīyati iti evam aññe pi
janā gho

original: Jana-jananetīmasmā gho hoti. “Manānaṃ niggahīta”nti (5.96) nassa niggahītaṃ, jāyati gamanametāyāti jaṅghā=pāṇyaṅgaviseso.
analyzed: gha u hoti manānam niggahītanti nassa niggahītam jāyati jaṅghā pāṇi aṅga visesaḥ
megha ādayaḥ

original: Meghaādayo ghantā nipaccante. Miha-secane, halopo, mehati siñcatīti megho=ambudo.
analyzed: megha ādayaḥ nipaccante miha secane ha lopaḥ mehati siñcati iti

original: Muha-mucchāyaṃ, halopo, muyhanti sattā etthāti mogho=tuccho. Sī-saye, ettābhāvo,
analyzed: ha lopaḥ sattāḥ ettha ati mogha utucchaḥ

original: seti lahu hutvā pavattatīti sīghaṃ=āsu. Aha-bhasmīkaraṇe, nipubbo, halopadīghā, nidahatīti
analyzed: sā iti lahu hutvā pavattati iti aha bhasmīkaraṇe nipubbaḥ ha lopa dīghā nidahati iti

original: nidāgho=gimho. Mahīssa halopo, mahīyati pūjīyatīti maghā=nakkhattaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: mahīssa ha lopaḥ mahīyati pūjīyati iti maghā nakkhattam evam aññe pi
iti ka vagga paccaya vidhānam
cu sara varā caḥ

original: Cu-cavane, sara-gati hiṃsā cintāsu, vara-varaṇa sambhattīsu, eyehi co hoti. Cavati
analyzed: cucavane saragati hiṃsā cintāsu varavaraṇa sambhattīsu eyehi caḥ hoti cavati

original: rukkhāti cocaṃ=upabhuttaphala- viseso. Sarati āyatiṃ dukkhaṃ hiṃsatīti saccaṃ=avitathaṃ.
analyzed: sarati āyatim dukkham hiṃsati iti saccam avitatham
vāreti
marā cuīcī ca

original: Mara-pāṇacāge tīmasmā cuīcī honti co ca. Maraṇaṃ maccu=maraṇaṃ. Māreti andhakāraṃ vināsetīti marīci=raṃsi, migataṇhikā ca. Maratīti macco=satto.
analyzed: honti co ca maraṇam maccu maraṇam māreti andhakāram vināseti iti marīci raṃsi miga taṇhikā ca marati iti maccosatto
kusa pasā chika

original: Kusa-akkose, pasa-bādhane, etehi chika hoti. Kusīyati akkosīyatīti kucchi=udaraṃ. Pasīyati bādhīyati etthāti pacchi=bhājanaviseso.
analyzed: kusa akkose pasa bādhane etehi hoti kusīyati akkosīyati iti kucchi udaram pasīyati bādhīyati ettha ati pacchibhājana viseso
kasa usā chuka

original: Kasa-vilekhane, usa-dāhe, etehi chuka hoti. Kasanti vilekhanti etthāti kacchu=pāmaṃ. Usati dahati santāpanti ucchu=rasālo.
analyzed: kasa vilekhane usa dāhe etehi hoti kasanti vilekhanti ettha ati kacchu pāmam usati dahati santāpanti ucchura sālaḥ

original: 43. Asa masa vada kuca kacā cho.
analyzed: asa masa vada kuca kacā cho

original: Asa-khipane, masa-āmasane, vada-vacane, kuca-saṃkocane, kaca-bandhane, etehi cho
analyzed: asa khipane masa āmasane vada vacane kuca saṃkocane kaca bandhane ete hi cho

original: hoti. Asati chipatīti accho=bhallūko. Masati jalanti maccho=mīno. Vadatīti vaccho=nelako.
analyzed: asati chipati iti acchobhallūkaḥ masati jalanti macchomīnaḥ vadati iti vacchonelakaḥ

original: Kucīyati saṃkocīyatīti koccho=bhaddapīṭṭhaṃ. Kacīyati bandhīyatīti kaccho=tanupadeso, anūpo ca.
analyzed: kucīyati saṃkocīyati iti kocchobhaddapīṭṭham kacīyati bandhīyati iti ca
guccha ādayaḥ

original: Gucchaādayo chantā nipaccante. Gupa-gopane, ottābhāvo, gopīyatīti guccho=thavako.
analyzed: guccha ādayaḥ chantā nipaccante gopīyati iti

original: Tusa-tuṭṭhimhī, tusanti etenāti tucchaṃ=musā. Pusa-posane, posanti tanumanenāti puccho=vāladhi, evamaññepi.
analyzed: tusa tuṭṭhimhī tusanti etena ati tucchaṃmusā pusa posane posanti tanumanena ati evam aññe pi
arāḥ ju ñaṭa ca

original: Ara-gamanetīmasmā ju hoti, arissa uṭa ca. Ṭakāro sabbādesattho, arati akuṭilabhāvena pavattatīti uju=avaṅko.
analyzed: hoti arissa hoti arissa ca ṭakāraḥ sabba ādesa atthaḥ arati akuṭila bhāvena pavattati iti uju avaṅkaḥ
rajju ādayaḥ

original: Rajjuādayo juantā nipaccante. Rudha-āvaraṇe, ussa attaṃ, rundhanti etenāti rujju-yottaṃ. Mana-ñāṇe, amaññitthāti mañju=mañjulaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: rajju ādayaḥ nipaccante rudha āvaraṇe attam rundhanti etena ati mana ñāṇe amaññittha iti mañju mañjulam evam aññe pi
gidhā jhaka
hoti gedhati iti
vañjha ādayaḥ

original: Vañcyaādayo jhaka antā nipaccante. Vana-yācane, vanoti attānaṃ anubhavituṃ yācatīti
analyzed: vañcya ādayaḥ jhaka antāḥ nipaccante vana yācane vanoti attānam anubhavitum yācati iti

original: vañjho=aphalarukkho, vañjhā=apasavā itthī, assa ittaṃ viñjho=pabbato, saṃja-saṅge,
analyzed: vañjho aphala rukkhaḥ vañjhā apasavā itthī asse ittam viñjho pabbataḥ saṃjasaṅge
niggahīta lopaḥ evam aññe pi
kama ya jāḥ ñaḥ

original: Kama-icchāyaṃ, yaja-devapūjāsaṅgatikaraṇadānesu, etehi ño hoti, massa niggahītavaggantā, kāmīyatīti kaññā=kumārī. Jassa pararūpattaṃ, yajantyanenāti yañño=yāgo.
analyzed: yaja deva pūjā saṅgati karaṇa dānesu etehi ñaḥ hoti massa niggahīta vaggantā kāmīyati iti kaññā kumārī jassa para rūpa ttam yajanti anena ati yañ yāgaḥ
puññam

original: Punāti puṇatismā vā ñoottābhāvo ca nipaccante. Punāti, puṇati sundarattaṃ karotīti vā puññaṃ=kusalaṃ.
analyzed: punāti puṇati smā vā ñaḥ o tta a bhāvaḥ ca nipaccante punāti puṇati sunda rattam karoti iti vā puññaṃkusalam
ara hā aññaḥ hāssa hira ca

original: Ara-gamane, vā-cāge, etehi añño hoti, hāssa hirañcādeso. Arīyate gamyateti araññaṃ=vanaṃ. Jahāti sattānaṃ hīnattanti hiraññaṃ=dhanaṃ, suvaṇṇañca.
analyzed: ara gamane vācāge etehi aññaḥ hoti ha assa hirañca ādesaḥ arīyate gamyate iti araññaṃvanam jahāti sattānam hiraññaṃdhanam suvaṇṇam ca
iti ca vagga paccaya vidhānam
kira tarā kīṭo

original: Kira-vikiraṇe, tara-taraṇe, etehi, kīṭo hoti. Sobhetumettha ratanāni vikirīyantīti kirīṭaṃ=makuṭaṃ. Taraiti niddesā assa ittaṃ, taranti yanti surūpatta manenāti tirīṭaṃ=veṭṭhanaṃ.
analyzed: kira vikiraṇe tara taraṇe etehi kīṭaḥ hoti sobhetum ettha ratanāni vikirīyanti iti kirīṭam makuṭam tara eti niddesāḥ assa taranti yanti tirīṭam veṭṭhanam
saka ādi hi aṭaḥ

original: Saka-sattiyaṃ, kasa-gamane, kara-karaṇe, makka iti suttiyo dhātu, deva-devane, kama-icchāyaṃ,
analyzed: sakasattiyam kasa gamane kara karaṇe makkaḥ iti suttiyaḥ dhātu deva devane

original: evamādihi aṭo hoti. Saṇṇoti bhāraṃ vahitunti sakaṭo=yānaṃ. Akasi nirojattaṃ agamīti
analyzed: evamādihi aṭaḥ hoti bhāram vahitunti sa kaṭoyānam akasi nirojattam agami iti

original: kasaṭaṃ=nirojaṃ. Karoti amanāpanti karaṭo=kāko. Makkati calatīti makkaṭo=vānaro.
analyzed: karoti karaṭokākaḥ makkati calati iti makkaṭovānaraḥ

original: Devīyati pūjīyatīti devaṭo=isi. Kamati icchati ārohatthanti kamaṭo=vāmano.
analyzed: devīyati pūjīyati iti kamati icchati kamaṭa vāmanaḥ
makuṭāvāṭa kavāṭa kukkuṭā

original: Ete saddā nipaccante. Maṃkismā uṭo, niggahītalopo ca, maṃketi sobhetīti makuṭaṃ=kirīṭaṃ.
analyzed: ete saddāḥ nipaccante uṭaḥ niggahīta lopo ca maṃketi sobheti iti makuṭaṃkirīṭam

original: Avatismā āṭaṇa, avyate khaññateti āvāṭo=kāsu. Ku-saddetīmasmā āṭo, oavādesā yathāyogaṃ,
analyzed: āṭaḥ yathāyogam

original: kavati ravatīti kavāṭaṃ=dvārapidhānaṃ. Kuka vaka-ādānetīmasmā kuṭaka, kukati gocaramādadātīti kukkuṭo=tambacūḷo.
analyzed: kavati ravati iti kavāṭam dvāra pidhānam kuka gocaram ādadāti iti
kamusa kusa kasā ṭhaḥ

original: Kama-icchāyaṃ, usa-dāhe, kusa-akkose, kasa-gamane, etehiṭho hoti, niggahītavaggantā,
analyzed: usa dāhe kusa akkose kasa gamane etehiṭhaḥ hoti niggahīta vagga antā

original: odanādīni kāmetīti kaṇṭho=galo. Okkapararūpādīni, odanādīsu uṇhena usīyatī ti oṭṭho=dantacchado,
analyzed: odana ādīni kāmeti iti odana ādīsu uṇhena ti oṭṭha udantacchadaḥ

original: karabho ca. Kusīyati akkosīyatīti koṭṭho=dhaññanilayo. Kasati yāti vināsanti kaṭṭhaṃ=dāru.
analyzed: karabhaḥ ca kusīyati akkosīyati iti koṭṭhodhañña nilayaḥ kasati yāti vināsanti kaṭṭhaṃdāru
kuṭṭha ādayaḥ

original: Kuṭṭhaādayo saddā ṭhantā nipaccante. Kusismā ṭho, ottābhāvo ca, kusīyati akkosīyatīti
analyzed: kuṭṭha ādayaḥ saddāḥ ṭhantā nipaccante ca kusīyati akkosīyati iti

original: kuṭṭhaṃ=chavirogo. Kuṇa-sadde, pararūpābhāvo ottābhāvo ca, kuṇati nadatīti kuṇṭho=atikhiṇo,
analyzed: kuṭṭhaṃ chavi rogaḥ kuṇa sadde ca kuṇati nadati iti

original: kuṇīyati akkosīyatīti kuṇṭho= chinnahatthapādādiko. Daṃsissa dā, daṃsati etāyāti
analyzed: kuṇīyati akkosīyati iti kuṇṭhaḥ chinna hattha pāda ādikaḥ daṃsissa dā daṃsati

original: dāṭhā=dantaviseso. Kamissa aka ca. Kāmīyāti dīnetīti kamaṭho=bhikkhābhājanaṃ, vāmano,
analyzed: dāṭhā danta visesaḥ kamissa ca kāmīyāti dīneti iti kamaṭhaḥ bhikkhā bhājanam vāmanaḥ

original: kummo ca. Phassissa phuṭo, phassīyatīti phuṭṭho=phasso, evamaññepi.
analyzed: kummo ca phassissa phuṭaḥ phassīyati iti phuṭṭhophassaḥ evam aññe pi
vara karā aṇḍo

original: Vara-varaṇe, kara-karaṇe, etehi aṇḍo hoti. Attani pephaṃ vārayatīti varaṇḍo=mukharogo. Karīyatīti karaṇḍo=bhaṇḍaviseso.
analyzed: vara varaṇe kara karaṇe etehi aṇḍaḥ hoti attani pepham vārayati iti varaṇḍomukha rogaḥ karīyati iti karaṇḍobhaṇḍa visesaḥ
man antā ḍaḥ

original: Makāra nakārantehi kriyatthehi bahulaṃ ḍappaccayo hoti. Sama-upasame, samanaṃ saṇḍaṃ=samūho.
analyzed: makāra nakāra antehi kriyatthehi bahulam ḍap paccayaḥ hoti sama upasame samanam saṇḍam samūhaḥ

original: Kama-padavikkhepe, kamati yātīti kaṇḍo=saro, paricchedo ca, dama-damane, damantvyanenāti
analyzed: kama pada vikkhepe kamati yāti iti paricchedo ca dama damane damantvi anena ati

original: daṇḍo=niggaho. Ama gama-gamane, amanti uppajjanti etthāti aṇḍo=pakkhipasavo, koso
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ niggahaḥ ama gama gamane amanti uppajjanti ettha ati aṇḍa upakkhipa savaḥ kosaḥ

original: ca. Gacchati sūnabhāvanti gaṇḍo=byādhi, vadanekadeso ca. Ramu-kīḷāyaṃ, ramanti etthāti
analyzed: ca gacchati ca ramu kīḍāyam ramanti ettha ati

original: ruṇḍā=vidhavā. Mana-ñāṇe, maññanti etenāti maṇḍo=odanādinissāvo. Khana khaṇa=avadāraṇe,
analyzed: ruṇḍā vidhavā mana ñāṇe maññanti etena ati maṇḍa oodana ādi nissāvaḥ khana khaṇa avadāraṇe

original: khaññatīti khaṇḍo=ucchuvikāra viseso. Lama-hiṃsāyaṃ, lamati hiṃsati sucibhāvanti
analyzed: visesaḥ lama hiṃsā ayam lamati hiṃsati suci bhāvanti
evam aññe pi
kuṇḍāḥ dayaḥ

original: Kuṇḍaādayo ḍantā nipaccante. Kama mana tanānaṃ assa uttaṃ, kāmīyatīti kuṇḍaṃ=bhājanaṃ.
analyzed: kuṇḍa ādayaḥ ḍantāḥ nipaccante kama mana tanānam assaḥ uttam kāmīyati iti kuṇḍaṃbhājanam

original: Maññati hitāhitanti muṇḍo= chinnakeso. Tanoti etenāti tuṇḍaṃ=lapanaṃ. Īra-khepe,
analyzed: maññati hita ahitanti muṇḍaḥ chinna keso tanoti etena ati tuṇḍaṃlapanam īra khepe

original: eraṃādeso. Īrati kampatīti eraṇḍo=byagghapuccho, si-sevāyaṃ, sissa khamuka, sugandhaṃ
analyzed: eraṃ ādesaḥ īrati kampati iti eraṇḍaḥ byaggha pucchaḥ sugandham
sevati iti sikhaṇḍocūḷā evam aññe pi

original: 60. Tija kasa tasa dakkhā kiṇo jassa kho ca.
analyzed: tija kasa tasa dakkhā kiṇaḥ jassa kho ca

original: Tija-nisāne, kasa-gamane, tasa-pipāsāyaṃ, dakkha-vuddhiyaṃ, etehi kiṇo hoti, jassa
analyzed: tija nisāne kasa gamane tasa pipāsāyam dakkha vuddhiyam etehi kiṇaḥ hoti jassa

original: kho ca, tejayitthāti tikhiṇaṃ=nisitaṃ. Kasati pavattatīti kasiṇaṃ=asesaṃ. Tasanaṃ
analyzed: kho ca tejayittha iti tikhiṇaṃnisitam kasati pavattati iti kasiṇaṃasesam tasanam

original: tasiṇā=taṇhā. Dakkhati vuddhiṃ gacchati etāyāti dakkhīṇā=kusalaṃ.
analyzed: dakkhati vuddhim gacchati dakkhīṇa akusalam
vī āditaḥ ṇi

original: Vī-tantasantāne, si-sevāsaṃ, sū-passavane, du-gamane, kī-dabbavinīmaye, sā-tanukaraṇāvasānesu,
analyzed: vī tanta santāne sisevāsam su upassavane du gamane kīdabba vinīmaye sa a tanu karaṇa avasānesu

original: evamādīhi ṇi hoti. Vīyatīti veṇi=kesakalāpo. Sevanaṃ seṇi=sajātīnaṃ kārūnaṃ samūho.
analyzed: evamādīhi hoti vīyati iti veṇi kesa kalāpaḥ sevanam seṇisa jātīnam kārūnam samūhaḥ

original: Nipubbo, nisevīyatīti niseṇi=sopānaṃ. Savati passavatīti soṇi=kaṭi. Davati vahatīti
analyzed: nipubbaḥ nisevīyati iti niseṇi sopānam savati passavati iti soṇi kaṭi davati vahati iti

original: doṇi=kaṭṭhambuvāhanī, nāvā ca. Nadādipāṭhā vimhi soṇī doṇī tipi hoti. Kayanaṃ, kīyate
analyzed: doṇika ṭṭhambuvāhanī nāvā ca nada ādi pāṭhāḥ vimhi soṇī doṇī tipi hoti kayanam kīyate

original: etāyāti vā keṇi=kayo sāti dukkhaṃ tanuṃ karotīti sāṇi=tirokaraṇī, evamaññepi.
analyzed: vā keṇikayo sā ati dukkham tanum karoti iti sāṇitirokaraṇī evam aññe pi
gaha ādi aṇi

original: Gaha-upādāne, ara-gamane, dhara-dhāraṇe, sara-gatiyiṃsā cintāsu, tara-taraṇe, evamādīhi
analyzed: gaha aupādāne ara gamane dhara dhāraṇe sara gati yiṃsā cintāsu tara taraṇe evamādīhi

original: aṇippaccayo hoti. Gaṇhātīti gahaṇi=asitādipācako aggi. Arīyati gamīyatīti araṇi=aggimanthanakaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: hoti gaṇhāti iti gahaṇi asita ādi pācakaḥ aggi arīyati gamīyati iti araṇi aggi manthana kaṭṭham

original: Dhāretīti dharaṇi=mahī. Sarīyati gamīyatīti bharaṇi=maggo. Tarantyanenāti taraṇi=nāvā, sūriyo ca.
analyzed: dhāreti iti dharaṇi mahī sarīyati gamīyati iti bharaṇi maggo taranti anena ati taraṇi nāvā sūriyaḥ ca
rīvībhāhi ṇu

original: Rī-passavane, vī vā-gamane, bhā-dittiyaṃ, etehiṇu hoti. Rīyati passavatīti reṇu=rajo. Veti pavattatīti veṇu=veḷu. Bhāti dibbatīti bhāṇu=raṃsi.
analyzed: rī passavane vī vā āgamane bha ādittiyam hoti rīyati passavati iti reṇu rajaḥ veti pavattati iti veṇu veḷu bhāti dibbati iti bhāṇu raṃsi
khāṇvāḥ dayaḥ

original: Khāṇuādayo ṇuantā nipaccante. Khaṇa khana-avadāraṇe, ṇassa ā, khaññati avadārīyatīti
analyzed: kha aṇu ādayaḥ ṇu antāḥ nipaccante khaṇa khana avadāraṇe ṇassa ā khaññati avadārīyati iti

original: khāṇu=chinnasākho rukkho. Jana-janane, nassa vā āttaṃ, jāyati gamana manenāti jāṇu,
analyzed: rukkhaḥ jana janane vai āttam jāyati

original: jaṇṇu=jaṅghorūnaṃ sandhi. Hara-haraṇe, eka, harīyatīti hareṇu=gandhadabba, evamaññepi.
analyzed: sandhi hara haraṇe harīyati iti hareṇu gandha dabbe evam aññe pi
kva ādi taḥ ṇaḥ

original: Ku-sadde, su-savane, du-gamane, vara-varaṇe, kara-karaṇe, paṇa-byavahārathutisu,
analyzed: kusadde susavane dugamane varavaraṇe karakaraṇe paṇa byavahāra thutisu

original: tā-pālane, lī-nilīyane, evamādīhi ṇo hoti. Kavati nadati etthāti koṇo=assi, vīṇādivādanadaṇḍo
analyzed: tā pālane lī nilīyane evamādīhi ṇo hoti kavati nadati ettha ati vīṇā ādi vādana daṇḍaḥ

original: ca. Suṇotīti soṇo=sunakho, naro ca. Davati pavattatīti doṇo=parimāṇaviseso. Virūpatta
analyzed: ca suṇoti iti soṇo sunakhaḥ naro ca davati pavattati iti doṇo parimāṇa visesaḥ

original: vāretīti vaṇṇo=nīlādi. Savanaṃ karotīti kaṇṇo=savanaṃ. Paṇīyati voharīyatīti paṇṇo=palāso.
analyzed: vāreti iti vaṇṇaḥ nīla ādi savanam karoti iti kaṇṇosavanam paṇīyati voharīyati iti paṇṇopalāsaḥ
lāyati iti tāṇaṃrakkhāḥ nilīyanti ettha ati leṇaṃnilīyana ṭṭhānam
suvīhi ṇaka

original: Su-savane, vī-tantasantāne, etehi ṇaka hoti. Suṇotīti suṇo=sunakho. Vīyatīti vīṇā=vallakī.
analyzed: susavane vītanta santāne etehi hoti suṇoti iti suṇosunakhaḥ vīyati iti vīṇāvallakī
tiṇa ādayaḥ

original: Tiṇaādayo ṇakantā nipaccante. Tija-tejane, jalopo, tejeti etenāti tiṇaṃ=bīraṇādi.
analyzed: tiṇa ādayaḥ nipaccante tija tejane ja lopaḥ teja iti etena ati tiṇaṃbīraṇa ādi

original: Lī liha sāda kledānaṃ lo lavā, līyati rasato sabbattha allīyatīti loṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ,
analyzed: lī liha sāda kledānam lo lavā līyati rasataḥ sabbattha allīyati iti loṇam lavaṇam

original: lehīyatīti loṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ, sādīyatīti loṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ, kledayatīti loṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ, gamissa
analyzed: lehīyati iti loṇam lavaṇam sādīyati iti loṇam lavaṇam kledayati iti loṇam lavaṇam gamissa

original: o, gacchatīti goṇo=go. Hara-haraṇe, ṇassañji, harīyatīti hariṇo=migo. Īra-kampane,
analyzed: o gacchati iti goṇogaḥ hara haraṇe harīyati iti īra kampane

original: rassattaṃ, ṇassa ñica, attano lūkhabhāve sampatte īrati kampatīti iriṇaṃ=ūsaraṃ.
analyzed: rassattam ṇassa ñ i ca attanaḥ lūkha bhāve sampatte īrati kampati iti iriṇaṃūsaram

original: Thu-abhitthave, dīgho, abhitthavīyatīti thūṇaṃ=nagaraṃ, thūṇo=gharatthambho, evamaññepi.
analyzed: dīghaḥ abhitthavīyati iti thūṇam nagaram evam aññe pi
ravaṇa varaṇa pūraṇā dayo

original: Ravaṇa varaṇa pūraṇā dayo aṇappaccayena siddhā. Ravatīti ravaṇo=kokilo. Vāretīti varaṇo=pākāro. Pūrīyate anenāti pūraṇo=paripūrī.
analyzed: ravaṇa varaṇa pūraṇā dayaḥ aṇa ppaccayena siddhāḥ ravati iti ravaṇa ukokilaḥ vāreti iti varaṇa upākāro pūrīyate anena ati pūraṇa uparipūrī
iti ṭa vagga paccaya vidhānam
pāvasā ati

original: Pā-rakkhaṇe, vasa-nivāse, eteti ati hoti. Pubbasaralopo, pāti rakkhatīti pati=sāmī, vasanti etthāti vasati=gehaṃ.
analyzed: pārakkhaṇe vasa nivāse ete iti ati hoti pubba sara lopaḥ rakkhati iti pati sāmī vasanti ettha ati vasati geham

original: 70. Dhā hi si tana jana jara gama sacā tu.
analyzed: dhāḥ hi si tana jana jara gama sacā tu

original: Dhā-dhāraṇe, hi-gatiyaṃ, tana-vitthāre, jana-janane, jara-vayo-hāniyaṃ, ama gama-gamane,
analyzed: dhā dhāraṇe tana vitthāre jana janane jara vayaḥ hāniyam ama gama gamane

original: saca-samavāye, etehi tu hoti. Dhāretīti dhātu=gerukādi. Hinoti pavattāti phalaṃ etenāti
analyzed: saca samavāye etehi tu hoti dhāreti iti dhātu geruka ādi hinoti phalam etena ati

original: hetu=kāraṇaṃ, sevīyati janehīti setu=bandhati (paddhati). Taññateti tantu=suttaṃ.
analyzed: hetu kāraṇam sevīyati janehi iti setu bandhati paddhati tañña tā iti tantu suttam

original: Janīyate kammakilesehīti jantu, jāyati kammakilehīti vā jantu=satto. Jīratīti jattu=aṃsasandhi.
analyzed: janīyate kamma kilesehi iti jantu jāyati vā jantu sattaḥ jīrati iti jattu aṃsa sandhi
gacchati iti gantu gamikaḥ sacati sameti iti sattu yava ādi cuṇṇam
arissuṭa ca

original: Ara-gamanetīmasmā tu hoti, arissa uṭa ādesoca. Arati pavattatīti utu=hemantādi,
analyzed: tu hoti arissa tu hoti arissa uṭaḥ ādesaḥ ca arati pavattati iti utu hemanta ādi
pitu ādayaḥ

original: Pituādayo saddā tuantā nipaccante. Pā-rakkhaṇe, āssa ittaṃ, pāti rakkhatīti pitā=janako.
analyzed: pitu ādayaḥ saddāḥ tu antāḥ nipaccante pārakkhaṇe āsse ittam pāti rakkhati iti pitājanakaḥ

original: Pātissevādissa mo, pāyetīti mātā=jananī. Bhā-dittiyaṃ, bhātīti bhātā=sodariyo. Dhā-dhāraṇe,
analyzed: pātissa iva ādissa mā u pāyeti iti mātā ajananī bhādittiyam bhāti iti bhātā sodariyaḥ dhā dhāraṇe

original: āssa īttaṃ, dhārīyatīti dhītā=puttī. Duha-papūraṇe, ottābhāvo, tussa ñchica. Duhati
analyzed: dhārīyati iti dhītā puttī duha papūraṇe tussaḥ duhati

original: pasave papūretīti duhitā=puttī. Jana-janane, assa āttaṃ, mā cāntādeso. Paputte janetīti
analyzed: pasave papūreti iti duhitā aputtī jana janane assa āttam mā paputte janeti iti

original: jāmātā=duhitupati. Naha-bandhane, nahīyati bandhīyati pemenāti nattā-paputto. Hu-havane,
analyzed: jāmātā duhitu pati naha bandhane nahīyati bandhīyati pemena ati nattā paputtaḥ hu havane

original: havati pūjetīti hotā=yaññako. Pū-pavane, punāti āyatiṃ bhavaṃ pavittaṃ karotīti potā=soyeva.
analyzed: havati pūjā iti iti hotā āyaññakaḥ pūpavane punāti āyatim bhavam pavittam karoti iti potā asoyā iva
jana karā ratu

original: Jana-janane, kara-karaṇe, etehi ratu hoti, rakāro antasarādilopattho. Jāyatīti jatu=lākhā. Karīyatīti katu=sayūpo yañño.
analyzed: jana janane kara karaṇe etehi hoti rakāraḥ anta sara ādi lopa tthaḥ jāyati iti jatu lākhā karīyati iti katu sayūpaḥ yaññaḥ
sakāḥ untaḥ
untaḥ hoti sakkoti iti
kapaḥ o taḥ

original: Kapa-acchādane iccasmā oto hoti. Kapatīti kapoto=pārevato. Ṭo tassa vā hoti kapoṭo=soyeva.
analyzed: kapa a chādane i t o taḥ hoti tassa vā hoti
vasā ādīhi antaḥ

original: Vasa-nivāse, ruha-janane, bhadda-kalyāṇe, nanda-samiddhiyaṃ, jīva-pāṇadhāraṇe, evamādīti
analyzed: vasa nivāse ruha janane bhadda kalyāṇe jīva pāṇa dhāraṇe evamādi iti

original: anto hohi. Vasanti etasmiṃ kāle kīḷāpasutāti vasanto=utu. Ruhati jāyatīti ruhanto=rukkho,
analyzed: antar hohi vasanti etasmin kāle ruhati jāyati iti

original: evaṃnāmako migarājā ca. Bhaddissa saṃyogādilopo, bhajati kalyāṇadhammanti bhadanto=pabbajito.
analyzed: evaṃnāmakaḥ miga rājā ca bhaddissa saṃyoga ādi lopaḥ bhajati kalyāṇa dhammanti bhadanta upabbajitaḥ

original: Nandati etāyāti nandantī=sakhī, nadādipāṭhā vī, evamupari ca. Jīvanti etā- yāti jīvantī=osadhi.
analyzed: nandati etā āyāti nandantī sakhī evam upari ca jīvanti etā yāti

original: Savatīti savantī=nadī. Rodāpetīti rodantī=osadhi. Avati rakkhatīti avantī=janapado.
analyzed: savati iti savantī nadī roda apeti iti rodantī osadhi avati rakkhati iti avantī janapadaḥ
hisīnam muka ca

original: Hi-gatiya, sī-saye, etehi anto hoti muka ca. Kakāro antāvayavattho, himaṃ hinoti pavattati etasminti hemanto=utu, sayanti ettha ūkā kusumādayo cāti sīmanto=kesamaggo.
analyzed: etehi antaḥ hoti ca kakāraḥ anta avayava tthaḥ himam hinoti pavattati etasmin ti sayanti ettha ūkā kusuma ādayaḥ ca ati sīmantokesamaggo
hara ruha kulā ito

original: Hara-haraṇe, ruha-janane, kula-patthāre, eteti ito hoti. Attano sinehaṃ haratīti
analyzed: hara haraṇe ruha janane kula patthāre eta iti itas hoti sineham harati iti

original: harito=vaṇṇaviseso. Ruhatīti rohito=macchaviseso. Ruhati sarīre byāpanavasenāti rohitaṃ,
analyzed: ruhati iti rohita umaccha visesaḥ ruhati sarīre byāpana vasena ati rohitam

original: rassa latte lohitaṃ=rudhiraṃ. Attano guṇaṃ kulati pattharatīti kolito=dutiyaggasāvako,
analyzed: rassa latte lohitam rudhiram attanaḥ guṇam kulati pattharati iti
evam nāmakaḥ maru ca
bhara ādi hi atas

original: Bhara raṃja yaja paca evamādīhi ato hoti. Bharatīti bharato=naṭo. Niggahītalopo, rañjanti etthāhi rajataṃ=sajjhaṃ. Yajitabboti yajato=aggi. Pacatīti pacato=sūpakāro.
analyzed: bhara raṃja yaja paca evamādīhi atas hoti bharati iti bharatonaṭaḥ niggahīta lopaḥ rañjanti ettha hi rajatam sajjham yajitabbaḥ iti yajatoaggi pacati iti pacatosūpa kāraḥ
kira dīhyātaka

original: Kira-vikiraṇe, ala-bandhane, cila-vasane, evamādīhi ātaka hoti, kiratīti kirāto=savaro, rassa lakke ki- lāto=sova. Alatīti alātaṃ=ummukaṃ. Cilatīti cilāto=malacchajāti.
analyzed: kira vikiraṇe ala bandhane cila vasane evamādīhi hoti kirati iti rassa lakke alati iti alātam ummukam cilati iti
am ādi hyat to

original: Ama mā vara kalādīhi atto hoti. Amati kālantaraṃ pavattatīti amattaṃ=bhājanaṃ. Pubbasaralopo,
analyzed: ama mā vara kalā ādīhi attaḥ hoti amati kāla antaram pavattati iti amattaṃbhājanam pubba sara lopaḥ

original: mānaṃ mattaṃ=pamāṇaṃ paricchedo ca. Varantunenāti varattā=yottaṃ. Kalati paricchindatīti kalattaṃ=bhariyā.
analyzed: ca kalati paricchindati iti
vādīhi to

original: Vā-gamane, tā-pālane, tana-vitthāre, dama-upasame, a-magamane, si-sevāyaṃ, su-savane,
analyzed: vā gamane tā pālane tana vitthāre dama aupasame ama gamane sisevāyam su savane

original: pū pavane, gupa-govane, yuja-saṃyame, gaha-upādāne, ata-sātaccagamāna, khipa-peraṇe,
analyzed: pū pavane gupa govane yuja saṃyame gaha upādāne atasa atacca gamāna khipa peraṇe

original: evamādīhi to hoti. Vāyatīti vāto=vāyu. Tāyatīti tāto=pitā. Tanuteti tantaṃ=tantavo.
analyzed: evamādīhi to vāyati iti tāyati iti tāta upitā tanuta iti

original: Damatīti anto=dasano. Amati yātīti anto=osānaṃ, koṭṭhāsasamīpāvayavā ca. Sevīyatīti
analyzed: damati iti antodasanaḥ amati yāti iti antoosānam koṭṭhāsa samīpa avayavā ca sevīyati iti

original: seto=dhavalo. Suṇantunenāti sotaṃ=savanaṃ. Savatīti soto=jalappavāho. Punīyatīti
analyzed: setodhavalaḥ sotaṃsavanam savati iti sotaḥ jala ppavāho punīyati iti

original: poto=bālo. Gopīyatīti gotthaṃ=kalādi. Yojantyanenāti yottaṃ=rajju. Mamāyantehi gayhatīti
analyzed: potaḥ bālaḥ gopīyati iti gottham kalā ādi yojanti anena ati gayhati iti

original: gattaṃ=sarīraṃ. Abādhaṃ nirantaraṃ atati pavattatīti attā=manādi. Khipīyati etthāti khettaṃ=kedāraṃ.
analyzed: abādham nirantaram atati pavattati iti khipīyati ettha ati khettaṃkedāram
ghara ādīhi taka

original: Gara ghara-secane, si-sevāyaṃ, dū-paritāpane, mida-sinehe, cita-sañcetane, pusa-posane,
analyzed: gara ghara secane du paritāpane mida sinehe cita sañcetane pusa posane

original: vida-lābhe, evamādīhi taka 4 hoti, gharati siñcatīti ghataṃ=sappi. Sevīyatīti sito=seto.
analyzed: evamādīhi hoti gharati siñcati iti sevīyati iti

original: Dubbacattā dūyati paritāpetīti dūto=pesarakāro. Mijjati sinehatīti mitto=suhadayo.
analyzed: dubbaca ttā dūyati paritāpeti iti dūta upesara kāraḥ mijjati sinehati iti

original: Cintetīti cittaṃ=viññāṇaṃ cittakammādi ca. Posīyatīti putto=attajo. Vindanti pīti
analyzed: cinteti iti cittam viññāṇam citta kamma ādi ca posīyati iti vindanti
vittam dhanam vara varaṇa sambhattīsu varaṇam vattam brahmacariya ādi
na it ta ādayaḥ

original: Nettaādayo taka parā nipaccante. Nī-pāpane, ettaṃ, tuka ca nipātanā. Nayati pāpetīti
analyzed: na it ta ādayaḥ taka parāḥ nipaccante nī pāpane ettam tuka ca nipātanā nayati pāpeti iti

original: nettaṃ=nayanaṃ, netā ca. Kara-kara-ṇe, assu, karaṇaṃ kuttaṃ=kiriyā. Kamissa assu,
analyzed: nettaṃnayanam netā ca kara karaṇe assu karaṇam kuttaṃkiriyā kamissa assu

original: kamati yātīti kunto=āvudhaviseso. Rama-kīḷāyaṃ, supubbo, sussaniccaṃ dīgho. Suṭṭhu
analyzed: kamati yāti iti kunta āvudha visesaḥ rama kīḍā ayam su pubbaḥ sussa niccam dīghaḥ suṭṭhu

original: ramaṇaṃ, suṭṭhu ramatīti vā sūrato=sukhasaṃvāso. Mihissaissu, mihati siñcatīti muttaṃ=passāvo.
analyzed: ramaṇam suṭṭhu ramati iti vā sūratas sukha saṃvāsaḥ mihissaissu mihati siñcati iti muttaṃpassāvaḥ

original: Pāla=rakkhaṇe āssa rassattaṃ, ñica. Pālīyatīti palitaṃ=kesalomānaṃ jarāya kataṃ setattaṃ,
analyzed: pāla rakkhaṇe jarāya katam

original: saddhādittā akāre taṃ yassa atthi so palito=pumā, palitā=itthī. Mhissa si, mihi ca,
analyzed: saddhā dittāḥ akāre tam yassa atthi saḥ palitopumā palitāitthī mhissa si mihi ca

original: mhayanaṃ sitaṃ=mandahasitaṃ, mhayanaṃ mihitaṃ=tadeva, kusa-akkose tassa īña, kusīyati
analyzed: sitam mandahasitam mhayanam kusa akkose tassaḥ īña kusīyati

original: akkosīyatīti kusīto=alaso, si=bandhane, dīgho, senti bandhanti gharāvāsaṃ etāyāti
analyzed: akkosīyati iti si bandhane dīghaḥ senti bandhanti ghara āvāsam
sītā anaṅgalalekhā evam aññe pi
samādīhi atho

original: Sama-upasame, dara-daraṇe, dama-upasame, kilama klama-gelaññe, sapa-akkose, vasa-nivāse,
analyzed: sama aupasame dara daraṇe dama aupasame kilama klama gelaññe sa paakkose vasa nivāse

original: āpubbo, evamādīhi atho hoti. Sametīti samatho=samādhi. Daraṇaṃ daratho=pīḷā. Damanaṃ
analyzed: evamādīhi atho hoti sameti iti daraṇam darathopīḷā damanam

original: damatho=damo. Kilamanaṃ kilamatho=parissamo. Sapanaṃ sapatho=saccakaraṇaṃ. Āvasanti
analyzed: damatha udamaḥ kilamanam kilamatha uparissamaḥ sapanam sapatha usacca karaṇam āvasanti
ettha ati
upavasā vassoṭa ca

original: Upapubbā vasatismā atho hoti, vassa oṭa cādeso. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho=tithiviseso, navamahatthi kulañca.
analyzed: upapubbā vasatisma atho hoti vassaḥ oṭa ca ādesaḥ upavasanti ettha ati uposatha utithi visesaḥ navama hatthi kulam ca
ramā thaka

original: Ramatismā thaka hoti, kānubandhakaraṇasāmatthiyā ata kārādopi malopo. Ramanti kīḷanti etenāti ratho=sandano.
analyzed: ramatismā thaka hoti ka anubandha karaṇa sāmatthiyā a taḥ ma lopaḥ ramanti kīḍanti etena ati rathosandanaḥ
tittha ādayaḥ

original: Titthaādayo thakaparā nipaccante. Tara-taraṇe, assa ittaṃ, pararūpādi, tarantyanenāti
analyzed: tittha ādayaḥ thaka parāḥ nipaccante tara taraṇe assaḥ ittam para rūpa ādi taranti anena ati

original: titthaṃ=najjādiṃ yenāvataranti taṃ. Sica-rakkhaṇe, secatīti sittaṃ=madhucchiṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: tittham najja ādim yena avataranti tam sica rakkhaṇe secati iti sittam madhucchiṭṭham

original: Hasa-hasane, hasantyanenāti hattho=karo, nakkhattāñca. Gāyatīti gāthā=pajjaviseso.
analyzed: hasa hasane hasanti anena ati hatthokaraḥ nakkhattāñca gāyati iti gāthā pajja visesaḥ

original: Aranti pavattantyanenāti attho=dhanaṃ. Rogaṃ tudati pīḷetīti tutthaṃ=osadhaṃ. Yu-missane,
analyzed: aranti pavattanti anena ati atthodhanam rogam tudati pīḍeti iti tuttham osadham yumissane

original: dīgho, yavatīti yū- tho=sajātikānaṃ tiracchānānaṃsamūho. Gupa-gopane, dīgho, palopo,
analyzed: dīghaḥ yavati iti yū thosa jātikānam tiracchānā naṃ samūhaḥ dīghaḥ pa lopaḥ
paṭikūla ttā gopīyati iti evam aññe pi
vasa masa kusā thu

original: Vasa-nivāse, masa-āmasane, kusa-akkose, etehi thu hoti. Vasanti etthāti vatthu=padattho. Dadhiṃ āmasatīti matthu=dadhimaṇḍo. Kusīyati akkosīyati bhera vanādattāti kotthu=sigālo.
analyzed: vasa nivāse masa āmasane kusa akkose etehi thu hoti vasanti ettha ati vatthu pada tthaḥ dadhim āmasati iti matthu dadhimaṇḍaḥ kusīyati akkosīyati bhera vanādattā ati kotthu sigālaḥ
saka vasā thi

original: Saka-sattiyaṃ, vasa-nivāse, etehi thi hoti. Sakkoti gantumanenāti satthi=ūru. Vasīyati acchādīyatīti vatthi=nābhiyā adho.
analyzed: sakasattiyam vasa nivāse etehi thi hoti sakkoti gantum anena ati satthi ūru vasīyati acchādīyati iti vatthi nābhiyā adhas
vītaḥ thika

original: Vī vā-gamanetīmasmā thika hoti. Vīyanti gacchanti etāyāti vīthi=āvali.
analyzed: vī vīyanti gacchanti
sārismā rati

original: Sārismā ṇyantā rathi hoti. Sāretīti sārathi=ratha-vāho.
analyzed: rathi sāra iti iti sārathi ratha vāhaḥ
tāta ithi

original: Tā-pālane, ata-sātaccagamane, etehi ithi hoti. Tāyati pāletīti tithi=paṭipadādi, atati gacchatīti atithi=abbhāgato.
analyzed: tā pālane atasā tacca gamane etehi ithi hoti tāyati pāleti iti tithi paṭipad ādi atati gacchati iti atithi abbhāgato
isā thī

original: Isatismā thī hoti. Icchati icchīyatīti vā itthī=nārī.
analyzed: thī icchati icchīyati iti vā itthī nārī

original: 95. Ruda khuda muda mada chida sūda sapa kamā daka.
analyzed: ruda khuda muda mada chida sūda sapa kamā daka

original: Etehi daka hoti. Rudatīti ruddo=umāpati. Rassa latte luddo=nesādo. Khudati asahatīti
analyzed: etehi hoti rudati iti ruddoumāpati rassa latte khudati asahati iti

original: khuddo=nīco. Modanti etāyāti muddā=sakkharamaṅguliyaṃ. Majjanti asminti maddo=janapado.
analyzed: modanti etāya ati muddā sakkharam aṅguliyam majjanti asmin ti maddo janapadaḥ

original: Chijjatīti chiddaṃ=randhaṃ. Ūssa rassattaṃ, sūdati sāmikehi bhatiṃ pakkharatīti suddo=vasalo.
analyzed: chijjati iti sūdati sāmikehi bhatim pakkharati iti
kāmīyati iti kando mūla visesaḥ
kunda ādayaḥ

original: Kundaādayo dakaantā nipaccante. Kamissa assu, kāmīyatīti kundo=pupphavidhasaso, maṇissa
analyzed: kunda ādayaḥ daka antāḥ nipaccante kamissa assu kāmīyati iti maṇissa

original: mana, maññateti mando=jaḷo. Vuṇātissa buna, vuṇīyati saṃvarīyatīti bundo=mūlappadeso.
analyzed: mana maññata iti mandojaḷaḥ vuṇātissa vuṇīyati saṃvarīyati iti bundomūla ppadeso

original: Ninda-garahāyaṃ, nalopo, nindīyatīti niddā=soppaṃ. Unda-kiledane, nalopo, undati
analyzed: ninda gara hā ayam na lopaḥ nindīyati iti unda kiledane na lopaḥ undati

original: kiledatīti uddo=jalabiḷālo. Saṃpubbassa undissa ca, sammā undati kiledatīti samuddo=sāgaro.
analyzed: kiledati iti uddo jala biḷālo saṃpubbassa undissa ca sammā undati kiledati iti samuddo sāgaro

original: Pula-mahattahiṃ sāñāṇesu, imuña, pulati hiṃsatīti pulindo=savaro. Evaṃ-maññepi.
analyzed: sā ñāṇesu evaṃmaññe pi
dadā du

original: Dada-dānetīmasmā du hoti. Dukkhaṃ dadātīhi daddu=kuṭṭhaviseso.
analyzed: dadadānā iti imasmai du hoti dukkham dadātīhi daddu kuṭṭha viseso
khanāna dama rama dho

original: Khana khaṇa-avadāraṇe, ana-pāṇane, dama-upasame, rama-kīḷāyaṃ, etehi dho hoti. Ñāṇena
analyzed: khana khaṇa avadāraṇe an apāṇane dama aupasame rama kīḷāyam etehi dhaḥ hoti ñāṇena

original: dhaññateti khandho=rāsi. Anati jīvati etenāti andho=acakkhuko. Dametabboti dandho=jaḷo,
analyzed: dhaññatā iti jīvati etena ati andhoacakkhukaḥ dametabbo ti dandhojaḷaḥ
ramanti ettha sappādayo ti
muddhā dayo

original: Muddhaādayo dhantā nipaccante. Muda-tose, ottābhāvo, modanti ettha ūkāti muddhā=matthako.
analyzed: muddha ādayaḥ dhantā nipaccante mudatose otta abhāvaḥ modanti ettha ūkā ati muddhāmatthakaḥ

original: Ara-gamane, aranti yanti etthāti addhā=maggo, kālo ca, addhaṃ=upaddhaṃ. Gidha-abhi
analyzed: ara gamane aranti yanti ettha ati addhā maggo kālaḥ ca addham upaddham gidha abhi

original: kaṅkhāyaṃ, issa attaṃ, gedhatīti gaddho=gijjho. Vidha-vedhane, ettābhāvo, parivajjhatīti
analyzed: kaṅkhāyam issa attam gedhati iti gaddhaḥ gijjhaḥ vidha vedhane parivajjhati iti
viddham vimalam evam aññe pi
sīto dhuka

original: Setismā dhuka hoti. Sayanti etāyāti sīdhu=surāviseso.
analyzed: seti sma hoti sīdhu surā visesaḥ
vara ara kara tara dara ya maajja mitha sakā kunaḥ

original: Vara-varaṇasambhattīsu, ara-gamane, kara-karaṇe, tara-tara-ṇe dara-vidāraṇe, yama-uparame,
analyzed: vara varaṇa sambhattīsu ara gamane kara karaṇe tara taraṇe dara vidāraṇe yama auparame

original: ajja sajja-ajjane, mitha-saṅgame, saka-sattiyaṃ, etehi kuno hoti. “Rā nassa ṇo”ti
analyzed: ajja sajja ajjane mitha saṅgame etehi ku naḥ hoti rā nassa ṇa iti

original: (5-171) nassa ṇattaṃ, vāretīti varuṇo=evaṃnāmako isi, devarājā, pādapo ca. Arati
analyzed: nassa ṇattam vāreti iti varuṇaḥ evaṃnāmakaḥ deva rājā pādapaḥ ca arati

original: gacchatīti aruṇo=sūriyo, tassa sārathi ca. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakammanaṃ
analyzed: gacchati iti aruṇosūriyo tassa sārathi ca para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya kammanam

original: karotīti karuṇā=dayā. Bālabhāvaṃ atarīti taruṇo=yuvā. “Ṇiṇāpina”nti (5.160) yogavibhāgā
analyzed: karoti iti karuṇā dayā bāla bhāvam yogavibhāgā

original: ṇilopo, vidāretīti dāruṇo=kakkhaḷo. Yameti pāvaṃ nāsetīti yamunā=ekā mahānadī. Ajjati
analyzed: ṇi lopaḥ vidāreti iti dāruṇa ukakkhaḷaḥ yameti pāvam nāseti iti yamunā ekā mahā nadī ajjati

original: dhanasañcayaṃ karotīti ajjuno=rājā, rukkhaviseso ca. Mitho saṅgamo mithunaṃ=pumitthiyugaḷaṃ.
analyzed: dhana sañcayam karoti iti ca mithas saṅgamaḥ
sakkotīti sakuna upakkhī nada ādi pāṭhā vīmhi sakunī
vā sakuṇi
ajaḥ inaḥ

original: Aja vaja-gamane tīmasmā ino hoti. Ajati vikkayaṃ yātīti ajinaṃ=cammaṃ.
analyzed: aja vaja gamane tīmasmai inaḥ hoti ajati vikkayam yāti iti ajinaṃcammaṃ
vipina ādayaḥ

original: Vipinaādayo inantā nipaccante. Vapa-bījanikkhepe, assa ittaṃ, vapanti etthāti vipinaṃ=vanaṃ.
analyzed: vipina ādayaḥ in antāḥ nipaccante vapa bīja nikkhepe assa ittam vapanti ettha ati vipinam vanam

original: Supa-saye, supanti etenāti supinaṃ=niddā, supantena diṭṭhañca. Tuda-byathane, dassa
analyzed: su pa saye supanti etena ati supinaṃniddā supantena diṭṭham ca tuda byathane dassa

original: ho, tudati satte pīḷetīti tuhinaṃ=himaṃ. Kappa-sāmatthiye, kappati ripavo vijetuṃ
analyzed: ho tudati satte pīḍeti iti tuhinaṃhimam kappa sāmatthiye kappati ripavaḥ vijetum

original: samatthetīti kappino=rājā. Kama-padavikkhepe, assa uttaṃ, kamanti ettha mīnādayo
analyzed: samattheti iti kappinorājā kama pada vikkhepe assa uttam kamanti ettha mīna ādayaḥ

original: pavisantīti kuminaṃ=macchabandhanopakaraṇaviseso. Dā-dāne, denti etasminti dinaṃ=divaso, evamaññepi.
analyzed: pavisanti iti dādāne denti etasmin ti dinaṃdivaso evam aññe pi
kira kano

original: Kiratismā kano hoti. Nassa ṇo, kiranti vikirantīti kiraṇā=raṃsiyo.
analyzed: kiratisma hoti nassa no kiranti vikiranti iti kiraṇāraṃsiyaḥ
dī jiimīhi naka

original: Dī-khaye, ji-jaye, i-ajjhenagatīsu, mī-hiṃsāyaṃ, etehi naka hoti. Adesi khayamagamāsīti
analyzed: dīkhaye jijaye etehi hoti adesi khayam agamāsi iti

original: dīno=niddhano. Pañcamāre ajinīti jino=buddho. Esi issarattamagamāsīti ino=sāmī. Mīyate
analyzed: pañca māre ajinī iti jinobuddhaḥ esi iti inosāmī mīyate
hiṃsīyata iti mīnomacchaḥ
sidhāvī iva naḥ

original: Si-bandhane, dhā-dhāraṇe, vī vā-gamane, etehi no hoti. Seti bandhatīti seno=sasādano
analyzed: si bandhane dhā dhāraṇe vī vā gamane sā iti bandhati iti senā usasādanaḥ

original: senā=camū. Dhāretīti dhānā=bhajjitayavo. Veti pavattatīti veno=hīnajāti. Sattesu
analyzed: senā camū dhāreti iti dhānā bhajjita yavaḥ vā iti pavattati iti sattesu
vāti pavattati iti vānaṃtaṇhā
ūna ādayaḥ

original: Ūnaādayo nantā nīpaccante. Ūha-vitakke, halopo, ūhanaṃ ūno=apuṇṇo. Hi-gatiyaṃ, dīghattaṃ,
analyzed: ūna ādayaḥ na ntāḥ nī paccante ūha vitakke ha lopaḥ ūhanam ūna u a puṇṇaḥ hi gatiyam dīgha ttam

original: hesi hīnattamagamīti hīno=nihīno. Ci-caye, dīghattaṃ, cayanti ettha ratanānīti cīno=janapado.
analyzed: hesi hīnattamagami iti cicaye dīghattam cayanti ettha ratanāni iti cīnaḥ janapadaḥ

original: Hanissa jagho, haññatīti jaghanaṃ=kaṭi. Ṭhāssa the ṭhāti pavattatīti theno=coro.
analyzed: hanissa haniḥ haññati iti jaghanaṃkaṭi ṭhāssa the pavattati iti

original: Undissa odo, undīyatīti odano=annaṃ. Annaṃ. Raṃjissa niggahītalopo, aka ca, raṃjate
analyzed: undissa odaḥ undīyati iti odanaḥ annam annam raṃjissa niggahīta lopaḥ ca raṃjate

original: anenāti rajanaṃ=rāgo. Rañjanti etthāti rajanī=ratti. Padissa junuka, pajjati gacchatīti
analyzed: anena ati rajanaṃrāgaḥ rañjanti ettha ati rajanīratti padissa pajjati gacchati iti

original: pajjunno=indo, megho ca. Gamissa gaṅa, gacchanti ettha vihaṅgādayoti gaganaṃ=antalikkhaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: meghaḥ ca gamissa gacchanti ettha vihaṅga ādayaḥ ti evam aññe pi
vī pata tano

original: Vī vā-gamane, pata patha-gamane, etehi tano hoti. Veti pavattati etenāti vetanaṃ=bhati. Patanti etthāti pattanaṃ=nagaraṃ.
analyzed: vī vā āgamane pata patha gamane etehi tanaḥ hoti vā iti pavattati etena ati vetanaṃbhati patanti ettha ati pattanaṃnagaram
ramā tanaka

original: Rama kīḷāyamicasmā tanaka hoti. “Gamādirānaṃ lopontassā”ti (5.109) malopo, ramanti etthāti ratanaṃ=maṇi ādī, hatthamattañca.
analyzed: rama tanaka hoti ma lopaḥ ramanti ettha ati hattha mattam ca
su bhāhi nuka

original: Sū-pasave, bhā-dittiyaṃ, etehi nuka hoti. Pasavīyatīti sūnu=putto. Bhāti dibbatīti bhānu=sūriyo.
analyzed: su upasave bhādittiyam etehi nuka hoti pasavīyati iti sūnu puttaḥ bhāti dibbati iti bhānu sūriyaḥ
dhāsse ca

original: Dhā-dhāraṇetīmasmā nuka hoti, dhāssa e ca. Dhāretīti dhenu=gāvī.
analyzed: hoti hoti ca dhārā iti iti dhenugāvī
vattā ṭāva

original: Vatta-vattane, aṭa-gamanattho, ava-rakkhaṇe, dhama-sadde, asa-khepane, etehi ani
analyzed: vatta vattane aṭa gamanatthaḥ avarakkhaṇe dhama sadde asa khepane etehi ani

original: hoti. Vattanti etenāti vattani=tasaradaṇḍaṃ. Vīmhi vattanī=pantho. Aṭate gammateti
analyzed: hoti vattanti etena ati vattanita sara daṇḍam vīmhi vattanī panthaḥ aṭate

original: aṭani= mañcaṅgo. Satte avati rakkhatīti avani=mahī. Dhamanti etena vīṇādayoti dhamani=sīrā.
analyzed: aṭani mañcaṅgo satte avati rakkhati iti avani mahī dhamanti etena vīṇā ādayo ti dhamani sīrā
daṇḍatthāya asīyate khipīyate iti asani kulisam
yu taḥ ni

original: Yu-missanetīmasmā ni hoti. Yavanti sattā anena etībhāvaṃ gacchantīti yoni=bhagaṃ, aṇḍajādiyoni ca.
analyzed: ni hoti yavanti sattāḥ anena etībhāvam gacchanti iti yoni bhagam aṇḍaja ādi yoni ca
iti ta vagga paccaya vidhānam
camāpa pā vapā po

original: Cama-adane, apa-pāpuṇane, pā-rakkhaṇe, vapa-bījanikkhepe, etehi po hoti. Camanti
analyzed: cama adane apapāpuṇane pārakkhaṇe vapa bīja nikkhepe etehi po hoti camanti

original: adanti etthāti campā=nagaraṃ, apesi īsakamattamagamāsīti appaṃ=abahu. Apāyaṃ pāti
analyzed: adanti ettha ati campā nagaram apesi īsaka mattama gamāsi iti apāyam pāti
rakkhati iti pāpaṃkibbisam vapanti ettha ati vappokedāram
yu thu kūnam dīghaḥ ca

original: Yu-missane, thu-abhitthave, ku-sadde, etehi po hoti, etesaṃ dīgho ca. Dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā
analyzed: yu missane thu abhitthave ku sadde etehi paḥ hoti etesam dīghaḥ ca dīgha vidhāna sāmatthiyā

original: ottābhāvo. Yavanti saha vattanti etthāti yūpo=yaññayaṭṭhi, pāsādo ca. Thavīyatīti
analyzed: yavanti saha vattanti ettha ati pāsādaḥ ca thavīyati iti
thūpocetiyam kavanti nadanti ettha ati kūpoudapānaḥ
khipa supa nīsū pūhi paka

original: Khipa-peraṇe, supa-saye, nī-naye, sū-pasave, pū-pavane, etehi paka hoti. Khapati
analyzed: khipa peraṇe supasaye nīnaye sūpasave pūpavane etehi hoti khapati

original: khayaṃ gacchatīti khippaṃ=sīghaṃ. Supanti ettha sunakhādayoti suppaṃ=papphoṭanaṃ.
analyzed: khayam gacchati iti khippam sīgham supanti ettha su nakha ādayaḥ ti

original: Nayanti etasmā phalanti nipo=rakkho. Savati ruciṃ janetīti sūpo=byañjanaviseso. Pavīyati
analyzed: nayanti etasmai phalanti niporakkhaḥ savati rucim janeti iti pavīyati
marica jīraka ādīhi pavittam karīyati iti pūpam khajjakam
sippa ādayaḥ

original: Sippaādayo pakaantā nipaccante. Sapissa assaittaṃ, sapati anenāti sippaṃ=kalā. Vapissa
analyzed: sippa ādayaḥ nipaccante sapissa assa ettam sapati anena ati sippaṃkalā vapissa

original: assi, vijjaṃ vapatīti vippo=brāhmaṇo. Vassa bo, vapati bahi nikkhamati hadayaṅgatasokenāti
analyzed: assi vijjam vapati iti vippo brāhmaṇaḥ vapati bahi nikkhamati hadayaṅgata sokena ati

original: bappaṃ=assu. Chupa-samphasse, usse, chupati anenāti cheppaṃ=naṅguṭṭhaṃ. Rupa=ruppane,
analyzed: bappaṃ assu chupa samphasse usse chupati anena ati cheppaṃn aṅguṭṭham rupa ruppane

original: palopa dīghā, ruppati vikāramāpajjatīti rūpaṃ-bhūtabhūtikaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: dīghā vikāram āpajjati iti evam aññe pi
sāsā apaḥ

original: Sāsa anusiṭṭhiyamiccasmā apo hoti. Sāsīyanti etenāti sāsapo=vīhiviseso.
analyzed: apaḥ hoti etena ati
viṭapa ādayaḥ

original: Viṭapaādayo apantā nipaccante. Vaṭa-veṭṭhane, assa ittaṃ, vaṭati veṭṭhati etenātiviṭapo=gumbaviseso,
analyzed: viṭapa ādayaḥ apantā nipaccante vaṭa veṭṭhane assa vaṭati veṭṭhati etena ati viṭa pogumba visesaḥ

original: kutha-pūtibhāve, thassa ṇo, akuthi pūtibhāvamagamīti kuṇapo=matako. Maṇḍa=bhūsane,
analyzed: kutha pūti bhāve thassa no a kuthi pūti bhāvam agami iti kuṇapomatakaḥ maṇḍa bhūsane

original: maṇḍeti janaṃ, maṇḍīyati janehīti vā maṇḍapo=janālayo, evamaññepi.
analyzed: maṇḍeti janam maṇḍīyati janehi iti vā maṇḍapaḥ jana ālayaḥ evam aññe pi
gupā phaḥ
gupismā hoti gopīyati iti
gara sara ādīhi bo

original: Garasarādīhi bo hoti. Garati aññe anena pīḷetīti gabbo=abhimāno. Sarati pavattatīti
analyzed: gara sara ādīhi baḥ hoti garati aññe anena pīḷeti iti gabbo abhimāno sarati pavattati iti

original: sabbo=sakalo. Phalakāmehi janehi amīyati gamīyatīti ambo=cūto. Puttena amīyati gamīyatīti ambā=mātā.
analyzed: phala kāmehi janehi amīyati gamīyati iti ambocūto puttena amīyati gamīyati iti ambāmātā
nimba ādayaḥ

original: Nimbaādayo bantā nipaccante. Namissa assi, namati phalabhārenāti nimbo=ariṭṭho. Vamissa
analyzed: nimba ādayaḥ bantā nipaccante namissa assi namati phala bhārena ati nimbaḥ ariṭṭhaḥ vamissa

original: vassa bittaṃ. Pittādayo vamati uggiratīti bimbaṃ=sarīraṃ. Kusissa amuka, tittena
analyzed: bittam pitta ādayaḥ vamati uggirati iti bimba sarīram tittena

original: kusīyati akkosīyatīti kosambo=rukkho. Kadatissa amuka, kadanti etena dvārādīnīti
analyzed: kusīyati akkosīyati iti kosamborukkho kadatissa amuka kadanti etena dvāra ādīni iti

original: kadambo=rukkho. Kuṭissa umuka, janehi koṭīyati pavattīyatīti kuṭumbaṃ=catuppado,
analyzed: janehi koṭīyati pavattīyati iti kuṭumbaṃ catuppadaḥ

original: khettaṃ, gharaṃ, kalattaṃ, dāsā ca. Kaṇḍissa kuḍu. Taṇḍulādayo anena kaṇḍanti paricchindantīti
analyzed: khettam gharam kalattam dāsā ca kaṇḍissa kuḍu taṇḍula ādayaḥ anena kaṇḍanti paricchindanti iti
kuḍubomānam evam aññe pi
darā bi

original: Dara vidāraṇetīmasmā bi hoti. Odanādīni dārenti jatāyāti dabbi=kaṭacchu, vīmhi dabbī.
analyzed: bi hoti odana ādīni dārenti

original: 124. Kara sara sala kala valla vasā abho.
analyzed: kara sara sala kala valla vasā abho

original: Kara-karaṇe, sara-gati hiṃsācintāsu, sala-gamanattho, kala-saṅkhyāne, vala valla-saṃvaraṇe,
analyzed: kara karaṇe hiṃsā cintāsu kala saṅkhyāne vala valla saṃvaraṇe

original: vasa-nivāse, etehi abho hoti. Karotīti karabho=oṭṭhā, pāṇippadeso ca. Sarati gacchatīti
analyzed: vasa nivāse etehi abhaḥ hoti karoti iti pāṇippadeso ca sarati gacchati iti

original: sarabho=migaviseso. Salati gacchatīti salabho=paṭaṅgo. Kalīyati parimīyati vayasāti
analyzed: sarabha umiga visesaḥ salati gacchati iti salabha upaṭaṅgaḥ kalīyati parimīyati vayasā ati

original: kalabho=hatthipotako. Tadaminādipāṭhā ḷatte kaḷabho=sova. Valleti saṃvaraṇaṃ karotīti
analyzed: ḷatte saṃvaraṇam karoti iti
vasanti anena ati
gada rabho
gadati sma rabhaḥ gadati iti gadrabha ukharaḥ
usarāsā kabho

original: Usa-dāhe, rāsa-sadde, etehi kabho hoti. Usati paṭipakkhe dahatīti usabho=seṭṭho. Rāsati nadatīti rāsabho=gadrabho.
analyzed: usadāhe rāsasadde etehi kabhaḥ hoti usati paṭipakkhe dahati iti usabhoseṭṭhaḥ rāsati nadati iti rāsabhogadrabho
i taḥ bha ka

original: I itismā bhaka hoti. Eti gacchatīti ibho=hatthī.
analyzed: i itismā bhaka hoti eti gacchati iti ibhohatthī
garāvā bho

original: Gara ghara-secane, ava-rakkhane, etehi bho hoti. Garati bahi nikkhamanavasena siñcatīti gabbho=pasavo, ovarako ca. Avati satte rakkhatīti abbhaṃ=megho.
analyzed: gara ghara secane avarakkhane etehi bho hoti garati bahi nikkhamana vasena siñcati iti gabbhopasavaḥ ovarako ca avati satte rakkhati iti abbhaṃmegho
sa ubbha ādayaḥ

original: Sobbhaādayo bhantā nipaccante. Sadatissa assa ottaṃ, sīdanti etthāti sobbhaṃ=vivaraṃ,
analyzed: sobbha ādayaḥ bhantā nipaccante sadatissa assa ottam sīdanti ettha ati sobbham vivaram

original: sobbho=jalāsayaviseso. Kamissa assu, kāmīyatīti kumbho=dasambaṇamatto, ghaṭo ca.
analyzed: kamissa assu kāmīyati iti kumbhoda sambaṇa mattaḥ ghaṭaḥ ca

original: (Kena jalena umbhīyati pūrīyatīti vā kumbho=ghaṭo.) Kusissa umuka, kusati avhāyatīti
analyzed: kena jalena umbhīyati pūrīyati iti vā kumbhoghaṭaḥ kusissa avhāyati iti
kusumbham mahārajanam kusumbhokanakam evam aññe pi
usa kusa pada sukhā kumo

original: Usādīhi kumo hoti. Usati dahatīti usumaṃ=uṇhaṃ. Kusati avhāyatīti sukumaṃ=pupphaṃ. Pajjati devapūjādiṃ yātīti padumaṃ=paṅkajaṃ. Sukhayatīti sukhuma=aṇu.
analyzed: usa ādīhi kumaḥ hoti usati dahati iti usumaṃ uṇham kusati avhāyati iti sukumaṃ puppham pajjati deva pūjā ādim yāti iti padumam paṅkajam sukhayati iti sukhuma aṇu
vaṭuma ādayaḥ

original: Vaṭumaādayo kumantā nipaccanthe. Vajissa-ntassa ṭo, vajanti etthāti vaṭumaṃ=patho.
analyzed: vaṭuma ādayaḥ kumantāḥ ni pad canthe vajissantassa ṭaḥ vajanti ettha ati vaṭumaṃpatho

original: Silisassa lisse, silissatīti silesupaṃ=semhaṃ. Kamissa kuṅkādeso, kāmīyatīti kuṅkamaṃ=kasmīrajaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: silisassa lisse silissati iti silesupaṃsemham kamissa kuṅkā deso kāmīyati iti evam aññe pi
gudhā umo

original: Gudha pariveṭṭhanetīmasmā umo hoti. Gudhati pariveṭṭhatīti godhumo=dhaññaviseso.
analyzed: pariveṭṭhane iti imasmai umaḥ hoti gudhati pariveṭṭhati iti
paṭha carā amimā

original: Paṭhaticaratismā ama imā honti yathākkamaṃ. Paṭṭhīyati uccārīyati uttamabhāvenāti paṭhamaṃ=seṭṭhaṃ. Carati hīnattaṃ yātīti carimaṃ=pacchimaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhati carati smai imāḥ honti yathākkamam paṭṭhīyati uccārīyati uttama bhāvena ati paṭhamaṃseṭṭham carati hīnattam yāti iti carimaṃpacchimam
hidhūhi maka

original: Hi-gatiyaṃ, dhū-kampane, etehi maka hoti. Hinoti pavattahīti himaṃ=tuhinaṃ. Dhunāti kampatīti dhūmo=aggipasavo.
analyzed: higatiyam dhū kampane etehi hoti hinoti hi maṃtuhinam dhunāti kampati iti
bhītaḥ rīsanaḥ ca

original: Bhī-bhayetīmasmā rīsano hoti makaca. Antasarādilopo, bhāyanti etasmāti bhīsano=bhayānako. Bhīmo=sova.
analyzed: rīsanaḥ anta sara ādi lopaḥ bhāyanti etasmāt

original: 136. Khī su vī yā gāhi sā lū khu hu mara dhara ghara jamāma samā mo.
analyzed: khī su vī yā gāhi sā lū khu hu mara dhara ghara jamāma samā mo

original: Khī-khaye. Su-savane, vī-tantasantāne, yā-pāpuṇane, gā-sadde, hi-gatiyaṃ, sā-tanukaraṇāvasānesu,
analyzed: khī khaye su savane vītanta santāne yā pāpuṇane gā sadde hi gatiyam sa a tanu karaṇa avasānesu

original: lū-chedane, khu-sadde, hu-havane, mara-pāṇacāge, dhara-dhāraṇe, kara-karaṇe, ghara-secane,
analyzed: lū chedane khusadde huhavane mara pāṇa cāge dhara dhāraṇe kara karaṇe ghara secane

original: jama-adane, ama gama-gamane, sama-upame, etehi dhātūhi mo hoti. Khepanaṃ nirupaddavakaraṇatāya
analyzed: jama adane ama gama gamane sama aupame etehi dhātūhi maḥ hoti khepanam nirupaddava karaṇa tāya

original: khemo=nirupaddavo. Sunotīti somo=cando. Vāyanti etenāti vemo=tantavāyopakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: khemaḥ nirupaddavaḥ sunoti iti somaḥ candaḥ vāyanti etena ati vemotantavāya upakaraṇam

original: Yātīti yāmo=dinassa chaṭṭho bhāgo, aṭṭhamo vā. Gāyanti etthāti gāmo=saṃvasatho. Hinoti
analyzed: yāti iti yāmodinassa chaṭṭhaḥ bhāgaḥ aṭṭhamaḥ vā gāyanti ettha ati gāmosaṃvasathaḥ hinoti

original: pavattatīti hemaṃ=suvaṇṇaṃ. Sāti sundarattaṃ tanuṃ karotīti sāmo=kāḷo. Lūyateti lomaṃ=tanuruhaṃ.
analyzed: pavattati iti hemaṃsuvaṇṇam sā ati sundara ttam tanum karoti iti sāmokāḷaḥ lūyate iti lomaṃtanuruham

original: Khūyate uttamabhāvenāti khomaṃ=atasi. Havanaṃ, hūyate vā homaṃ=huti. Marantyanenāti
analyzed: khūyate uttama bhāvena ati havanam hūyate vā homaṃhuti maranti anena ati

original: mambaṃ=yasmiṃ tāḷite na jīvati taṃ. Attānaṃ dhārente apāye vaṭṭadukkhe ca apatamāne
analyzed: tāḷite na jīvati tam attānam dhārente apāye vaṭṭa dukkhe ca a patamāne

original: katvā dhāretīti dhammo=pariyatyādi. Karaṇaṃ, karīyatīti vā kammaṃ=sukhadukkhaphalādi.
analyzed: katvā dhāreti iti karaṇam karīyati iti vā kammaṃ sukha dukkha phala ādi

original: Sedo paggharati anenāti ghammo=nidāgho. Jameti abhakkhi tabbaṃ adatīti jammo=nihīno,
analyzed: sedaḥ paggharati anena ati ghammonidāghaḥ jameti a bhakkhi tabbam adati iti jammonihīnaḥ

original: anisammakārī ca. Ameti pemena puttakesu pavattatīti ammā=mātā. Samenti anenāti sammā=piyasamudācāro.
analyzed: ca amā iti puttakesu pavattati iti ammā mātā anena ati sammāpiya samudācāraḥ
asma ādayaḥ

original: Asmaādayo mantā nipaccante, pararūpādīnamabhāvo nipātanā. Asa-khepane, assateti asmā=pāsāṇo.
analyzed: asma ādayaḥ mantāḥ nipaccante para rūpa ādīnam abhāvaḥ nipātanā asa khepane assateti asmāpāsāṇaḥ

original: Bhasa-bhasmīkaraṇe, bhasati pakkharatīti bhasmā=chārikā. Usa-dāhe, usati dahatīti
analyzed: bhasa bhasmīkaraṇe bhasati pakkharati iti bhasma āchārikā usa dāhe usati dahati iti

original: usmā=tejodhātu. Visa-pavisane, pavisanti etthāti vesmaṃ=gharaṃ. Bhī-bhaye, massa
analyzed: usmā tejaḥ dhātu visa pavisane pavisanti ettha ati bhī bhaye massa

original: suña, bhāyanti etasmāti bhesmā=bhayānako. Asatissa dhaṅa, assati janehi cajīyatīti
analyzed: bhāyanti etasma ati asatissa dhaṅa assati janehi cajīyati iti

original: adhamo=nihīno. Karotissa assa uttaṃ, karotīti kummo=kacchapo. Evamaññepi.
analyzed: adhamaḥ nihīnaḥ karoti assa uttam karoti iti kummokacchapaḥ evam aññe pi
nī taḥ mi
nayatisma mi hoti nayati iti nemi cakkantam
ūmi bhūmi nimi rasmi

original: Etesaddā miantā nipaccante. Ūha-vitakke, halopo, ūhanti vitakkenti etenāti ūmi=taraṅgo.
analyzed: ete saddāḥ mi antāḥ nipaccante ūha vitakke ha lopaḥ ūhanti vitakkenti etena ati ūmi taraṅgaḥ

original: Bhū-sattāyaṃ ottābhāvo, bhavanti etthāti bhūmi=mahī. Ni-pāpane, ettābhāvo, sugatiṃ
analyzed: bhavanti ettha ati bhūmi mahī sugatim

original: neti pāpetīti nimi=rājā. Rasa-assādane, pararūpābhāvo, rasanti sattā etāyāti rasmi=rajju.
analyzed: na iti pāpa iti iti nimi rājā para rūpa abhāvaḥ rasanti sattā
iti pavagga paccaya vidhānam
mā āchāhi

original: Mā-māne-chā-chādane, etehi yo hoti. Meti parimeti aññena uttamena guṇena attano aguṇanti māyā=santadosa paṭicchādana lakkhaṇā. Cheti chindati saṃsayanti chāyā=paṭibimbaṃ.
analyzed: etehi yaḥ hoti mā iti parimā iti aññena uttamena guṇena attanaḥ māyā santa dosa paṭicchādana lakkhaṇā cheti chindati saṃsayanti chāyā paṭibimbam
janiḥ sa jā ca

original: Janismā yo hoti, janissa jā ca, janetīti jāyā=bhariyā.
analyzed: janismai yaḥ hoti janissa jā ca janeti iti jāyā bhariyā
hadayā dayo

original: Hadayaādayo yantā nipaccante. Harissa daṅa, haratīti hadayaṃ=cittaṃ, manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: hadaya ādayaḥ yantā nipaccante harissa daṅa harati iti hadayam cittam manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: nissayo ca, tanissaaka, attani pemaṃ tanotīti tanayo=putto. Saratissa suri, sarati
analyzed: nissayo ca attani pemam tanoti iti tanayoputto saratissa suri sarati

original: gacchatīti sūriyo=ādicco. Haratissa mmiṅa, sukhamāharatīti hammiyaṃ=muṇḍacchadanapāsādo.
analyzed: gacchati iti haratissa sukham āharati iti

original: Kasa-gamane, kasassa alaka, assa i ca, kasati vuddhiṃ yātīti kisalayaṃ=pallavaṃ, evamaññepi.
analyzed: kasa gamane ca kasati vuddhim yāti iti kisalayaṃ pallavam evam aññe pi

original: 143. Khī si si nī sī su vī kusūhi raka.
analyzed: khī si si nī sī su vī

original: Khī-khaye, si-sevāyaṃ, si-bandhane, nī-pāpane, sī-saye, su-savane, vī vā-gamane,
analyzed: khīkhaye sisevāyam sibandhane nīpāpane sīsaye susavane vī vā āgamane

original: ku-sadde, sū-pasave, etehi raka hoti. Khayati duhanenāti khīraṃ=payo. Kusumādīhi
analyzed: kusadde sūpasave etehi hoti khayati duhanena ati kusuma ādīhi

original: sevīyatīti siro=muddhā. Seti sarīraṃ bandhatīti sirā=dehabandhanī. Neti, parehivānīyatīti
analyzed: sevīyati iti sirā muddhā sā iti sarīram bandhati iti sirā deha bandhanī na iti parehivā ānīyati iti

original: nīraṃ=jalaṃ. Sayatīti sīro=halaṃ. Aniṭṭhaphala- dāyakattaṃ savatīti surā=madirā.
analyzed: nīraṃjalam sayati iti sīrohalam savati iti surā madirā

original: Suṇoti uttamagītādinti suro=devo. Veti uttamabhāvaṃ yātīti vīro=vikkanto. Kavati
analyzed: suṇoti surodevaḥ vā iti uttama bhāvam yāti iti

original: nadatīti kuraṃ=bhattaṃ. Bhayaṭṭitānaṃ paṭhamakappiyānaṃ sūrattaṃ pasavatīti sūro=sūriyo, vikkanto ca.
analyzed: nadati iti kuraṃbhattam bhayaṭṭitānam paṭhama kappiyānam sūrattam pasavati iti sūrosūriyaḥ vikkanto ca

original: 144. Hi ci du minaṃ dīgho ca.
analyzed: hi ci du minam dīghaḥ ca

original: Hi-gatiyaṃ, ci-caye, du-gatiyaṃ, mi-pakkhepane, etehi raka hoti, dīgho cāntassa.
analyzed: higatiyam cicaye dugatiyam mi pa kkhepane etehi raka hoti dīghaḥ ca antassa

original: Hinoti pavattatīti hīraṃ=tālahīrādi. Cayatīti cīraṃ=vakkalaṃ. Dūyati dukkhena gamīyatīti
analyzed: hinoti pavattati iti hīraṃtāla hīra ādi cayati iti cīraṃvakkalam dūyati dukkhena gamīyati iti
dūram anāsannam mīyate pakkhīpīyate iti mīrosamuddaḥ
dhā tān amī ca

original: Dhā-dhāraṇe, tā-pālane, etehi raka hoti, ī cāntādeso. Dhāretītidhīro=dhitimā. Jalaṃ tāyatīti tīraṃ=taṭaṃ.
analyzed: dhā dhāraṇe tā pālane jalam tāyati iti tīram taṭam
bhadrāyo

original: Bhadraādayo rakaantā nipaccante. Bhadda-kalyāṇe, dalopo pararūpābhāvo, bhajīyatīti
analyzed: bhadra ādayaḥ ra ka antāḥ nipaccante bhadda kalyāṇe da lopaḥ para rūpa abhāvaḥ bhajīyati iti

original: bhadraṃ=kalyāṇaṃ. Bhī-bhaye, nadādipāṭhā vī, bhāyanti etāyāti bherī=dundubhi. Cita-sañcetane,
analyzed: bhadram kalyāṇam bhī bhaye nada ādi pāṭhāḥ bhāyanti bherī dundubhi cita sañcetane

original: vipubbo, vicintitabbanti vicitraṃ=nānākāraṃ, yā-pāpuṇane, rassa tuña, gamanaṃ yātrā=yānaṃ.
analyzed: vipubbaḥ vicintitabbanti vicitram nānā ākāram yāpa āpuṇane rassa tuña gamanam yātrā yānam

original: Gupa-gopane, ussa o, passa tañca gopīyatīti gotraṃ=kulādi, bhasa-bhasmīkaraṇe, rassa
analyzed: gupa gopane ussa o passa tat ca gopīyati iti gotraṃkula ādi bhasa bhasmīkaraṇe

original: tuña, bhasati bhakkhaṃ karoti toyāti bhastā-kammāragaggarī. Usa=dāhe, salopo, sokena
analyzed: bhasati bhakkham karoti bhastā kammāra gaggarī usa dāhe sa lopaḥ sokena
tāḷite usati dahati iti uro sarīra eka deso evam aññe pi
mandaṅka sasāsa matha catā uro

original: Manda-jaḷatte, aṅka-lakkhaṇe, sasa-gatihiṃsāpāṇanesu, asa-khepane, matha mantha-viloḷane,
analyzed: manda jaḷatte aṅka lakkhaṇe asa sa gati hiṃsā pāṇanesu asa khepane matha mantha viloḷane

original: cata-yācane, etehi uro hoti. Amandi asundarattā jaḷatthamagamīti mandurā=vājisālā.
analyzed: cata yācane etehi uraḥ amandi a sunda rattā jaḷattham agami iti mandurā vāji sālā

original: Aṅkīyati lakkhīyatīti aṅkuro=bījapasavo. Sasati hiṃsatīti sasuro=jayampatīnaṃ pitā.
analyzed: sasati hiṃsati iti pitā

original: Asīyitthāti asuro=dānavo, arīhi mathīyati āloḷīyatīti mathurā=nagaraṃ. Catīyatīti caturo=dakkho.
analyzed: asīyittha ati asuraḥ dānavaḥ arīhi mathīyati āloḍīyati iti mathurā nagaram catīyati iti caturodakkhaḥ
vidhura ādayaḥ

original: Vidhuraādayo urantā nipaccante. Vidha-vedhane, ettābhāvo, vedhati hiṃsatīti vidhuro=viruddho.
analyzed: vidhura ādayaḥ nipaccante vidha vedhane ettā bhāvaḥ vedhati hiṃsati iti

original: Unda-kiledane, undati kiledatīti unduro=ākhu. Maṃka-maṇḍane, niggahītalopo, maṅkati
analyzed: unda kiledane undati kiledati iti maṃka maṇḍane niggahīta lopaḥ

analyzed: kalaḥ hoti musati etena ati musa loa yoggo
